college_info.college_name: Maharishi Markandeshwar University: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Ranking

highlights.summary:
MMDU is a Deemed to be University and was founded in 1993. It has been approved by UGC and accredited by the NAAC with a Grade ‘A’. The University has two other campuses that are located in Karnal and Solan.
It offers various UG and PG courses across different streams such as Management, Engineering, Dental, Medical, Law, Agriculture, Pharmacy, etc. The flagship courses are BTech, BSc and MBA. It is ranked 14 under the Medical Private category by Outlook 2025 and ranked 26 under the Pharmacy category by the NIRF 2025.
MMDU Mullana University offers scholarships to meritorious and deserving students under various schemes. The university appoints well trained and expert faculty members. The admission is based on merit and entrance exams. It accepts scores of certain entrance exams such as JEE Mains, NEET-UG, MAT, CMAT, GATE, and others. The university has good infrastructure, including smart classrooms, labs, etc. Check below for more details:-

college_info_program.intro:
Maharishi Markandeshwar University offers UG and PG courses across Engineering, Management, Dental, Law, Agriculture, Medical, Science, and others. BTech, BSc, and MBA are among the most popular programmes offered at the university.
MMU Mullana offers a full-time, four-year BTech programme at the UG level. The BTech programme offered at the university covers core courses in the areas of Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics & Communication, Biotechnology, and others. The MBA programme offered by the MMU is a two-year programme. It is offered in several specialisations, including Finance, Human Resources, Marketing, International Business, Hospitality, and others.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering (Software Development)
reviews.review_title: College faculty supporting.

detailed_review.Placements: About 80-90% of students get placed here for Computer Science and Engineering. The highest package offered here is 43 lakhs per annum, the lowest is 3 lakhs, and the average package is 5 lakhs per annum. More than 90% get internship opportunities, and the top roles offered here are Software Engineer, Software Developer, Data Analyst, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and facilities of our university are really good, like Wi-Fi facilities. Classrooms are well organized, and even libraries are available with a strong Wi-Fi connection. The food quality in the mess is awesome compared to various other private universities, but here you will get only vegetarian food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and supportive. They will teach you from scratch and help you when needed. They are knowledgeable regarding the subjects. The course curriculum is highly relevant to the industry requirements, and they will teach you industry-required technology stacks. The semester is not easy but not hard. It is easy to pass the semester, but to score a good CGPA, you need to prepare more.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering (Software Development)
reviews.review_title: Faculties are good, infrastructure is average but for placements take admission on your own risk.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement is almost 100%. The highest package of our college is around 20 LPA. The average package is 3 LPA-4 LPA. Top recruiters are TCS, Infosys, Deloitte, Wipro, etc. Internship programs are well. Top roles are as employees and some higher positions an be achieved.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is average like no Wi-Fi on campus, labs are well-equipped, and library is also good. In classrooms, AC doesn't work sometimes. The rooms of the hostels are nice but the mess is not good and the food quality is low. There are hardly sports facilities. Medical facilities are also good as it has it's hospital nearby.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and helpful. Their teaching quality is nice. There are extra tutorial lectures to clear the spending doubts or any spending topic. Curriculum is not proper to make students industry-ready. Semester exams are quite tough.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I wanted to take computer science as AI is booming. The best thing about this course is it is related to what is trending at this time. Everything should be improved. Scholarships are given on the basis of the 12th percentile. Events are organized but fests are organized hardly.

reviews.course: M.Sc. in Radio Imaging (Radiography)
reviews.review_title: I am dissatisfied with the curriculum and the faculty. There are no placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, there are no placements. The highest salary offered for an assistant professor after M.Sc ranges from Rs. 35,000-40,000 per month. The minimum salary is Rs. 20,000 per month. No internship is needed after this course. The top role offered is assistant professor. There are no recruiting companies and we have to find a job on our own.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are AC all over the place. The infrastructure is good and it's under construction right now. The hostel rooms are good. There is a sports auditorium and there is every sport that we need or want to play. The mess food is bad and the quality is very poor. Students get a 15% discount for medical services. All sports equipment is there.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good but there is no timetable. They just come when they want to teach and there is no proper course curriculum. Subjects they taught are relevant to our course. Semester exams are very easy but lengthy and we have to write more pages than it should be needed. The pass percentage is 50%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I love teaching and I don't like clinical work. To make this course better we have to give students more demo classes rather than just sending them to the field. The timetable or curriculum should be improved. Many events happen on a weekly or monthly basis like dance competitions, quizzes, and an annual fest but this year it's not occurred or the university did not do any fest. There are no extracurricular activities, and students who are interested can participate but there are no such activities.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Programming and Data Science
reviews.review_title: In a nutshell, I am very satisfied.

detailed_review.Placements: I am currently attending college and do not know how many people have gotten internships, as I'm in my first year. According to seniors, the top recruiters would be companies like HCL, EY, PWC, Vivo, and Samsung. An average of 1500 students get placements yearly.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The university is pretty big, with more than 10 hostels for girls. The mess provides a good and healthy balanced meal throughout the semester, with changes in meals according to the season. The college has all the latest books and computers to facilitate students in their studies. Most of the facilities, like the hospital and ATM, are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Two additional exams are taken before the semester end to make sure students perform well in the main exam, which makes the exams easier if you have studied properly. Teachers are quite adept at teaching students and are very supportive and helpful.
detailed_review.Other: The college has many fun events on a regular basis, with the Annual University being the best, where students from various colleges compete and enjoy various activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Comprehensive review about MMDU.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement rate is 70-80% for civil students who are eligible and proactive. Average package is 4 LPA - 9 LPA. The highest package is 30 LPA - 40 LPA. The lowest package is 3 LPA - 4 LPA. Roles offered are site engineering, structural engineer, project manager, and some non-core roles in IT/service.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are separate hostels for boys and girls, AC and non-AC rooms, furnished rooms with bed, study table, chair, almirah, and some with balconies. Mess providing hygienic meals (vegetarian options for international students). Facilities like common room, TVs, and indoor games are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are highly qualified and experienced. Professor's blend of traditional and modern teaching methods (lectures, practical, digital tool) approachable curriculum duration: 4 years (8 semesters) core subject, geotechnical, transportation, environment, examina.
detailed_review.Other: It provides a solid combination of academic infrastructure and practical exposure, faculty support, and placement opportunities, making good choice.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: My college is my best friend, as it taught me so many valuable things.

detailed_review.Placements: As I am pursuing MCA from the college and my passing year is 2026, I am happy to share that I have been given multiple opportunities to sit in placement drives. The college invites reputed companies in different fields so that students get the best of the best opportunities to get placed. Almost half of the students were placed in good companies. The average package being offered here is 5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the university is top-class, whether it's about class or hostels. The college premises are kept very neat and clean. Talking about computer labs, Wi-Fi or libraries, they are properly maintained and are being ensured that students may get the service. The hostel food is also very good, although it can't beat the homemade food, but still it's better.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of the university is very highly educated, having good years of experience, and they also motivate students not only to get theoretical knowledge but also to gain practical exposure. The curriculum being set by the University is relevant and meets the present scenario and demands of the world. The passing marks to get into university are not too tough. If you have read the curriculum, you can easily pass.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course as I want to get into the IT sector and I think it's the best decision of my life that I have chosen MM (DU) as my college to pursue my master's degree. Things on which MM (DU) can improve are making attendance criteria from 90% to 75%.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Summary - College is very good. Infrastructure is good and has good faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: In this college, there are many opportunities given by companies. There are many companies from last year, including national companies or MNCs. Roles are offered by the companies according to the stream or interest of students in good companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are many course, and hostels are very good in quality and condition. It is a very good place. There is a medical course that is in the top 1. This university summary is that all courses and the hostels are very good for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very good. They are very supportive which helps the students to always be motivated for studies. There are also good timetables for students. Exams are very easy to understand and easy to pass. These exams are good.
detailed_review.Other: There are many events but one Universm is the biggest event in this university.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: This university is overall good.

detailed_review.Placements: There are 90% students placed on average every year. Average package for BBA is 6 LPA. About 100% students can get internships from this university. Top roles offered after BBA or MBA are hr, data analyst, etc. Top recruiting companies are Axis Bank, Nestled, Deloitte, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are a lot of facilities given to the students by the campus, like computer labs, centralised AC in classrooms, a beautiful and peaceful environment in the library, etc. The quality of mess food and other facilities for hostel students is much better here.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very good and qualified, from them, we can ask anything if we have any doubts or anything. Course curriculum is so relevant that it makes students industry-ready by giving them short and knowledgeable lectures. There are very few compartments in the semester examination.
detailed_review.Other: I chose BBA because I want to do a job as an hr in an MNC. Course curriculum is interesting as we also read about how the management works.

reviews.course: BCA (Hons.) in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: Really, very good infrastructure and education in this college.

detailed_review.Placements:
95 percent placement, 42 LPA the highest package, 10 LPA average, 4 LPA the lowest. TCS, Wipro, HCL, etc., recruit. 100% internship in an MNC
Developer roles like Python developer, Java developer, etc., are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is very nice, like Wi-Fi is always high-speed, labs are neat and clean, the classroom is fully AC and hitech technologies, the library is very nice, like a 5-star place, hostel facilities are also very good, food is tasty, and everything is clean, medical facilities are free, we have a 16-acre sports field and sports complex.
detailed_review.Faculty: Very highly qualified Ph.D holding professors. His/ her teaching quality is too helpful, too good. Course curriculum is very relevant, it makes the students industry-ready. Semester exam is always medium. Not too tough and too hard, pass percentage is 33%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose it because BCA has good career growth. Nothing to improve, everything is good. Events, Fest, Campus Crowd, Connectivity, Campus Surroundings, Scholarship, Extracurricular Activities, etc., all these things are very nice.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Good and supportive faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: In our university, the placement percentage for the MCA batch is about 70%. With the lowest package starting from 5 LPA and the highest package of 12 LPA. Top and foremost recruiting partners of our university are Deloitte, Accenture, Capgemini, and so on. Out of 60 students in our course, almost 40 students got internships in various companies like Alpha Intern and ProDeskIT. Top roles offered in our course include full stack developer and data science engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a well-planned layout and well-furnished classrooms with air-conditioning in almost every lecture room. The campus of the college has fast, free Wi-Fi connectivity. Our college has a very big central library, which helps in the holistic intellectual growth of students. Hostels are also well-maintained with proper sanitation and water supply.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very supportive and caring. Teachers help students in clearing their doubts easily and provide good advice to the students. Teachers are well qualified with great knowledge not only about their domain but also about other domains too. Curriculum is designed in such a manner that it will cover all aspects of our MCA course and make students industry-ready in every aspect. Semester exams are not so difficult if your basics are clear, and the percentage is 60%.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because it helps in developing an understanding of computer applications and enhances my overall knowledge about the technical world. Campus has a very diverse culture due to the presence of students from Various ethnic groups, not only from the Indian subcontinent but also from outside the subcontinent.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Software Development)
reviews.review_title: Very nice faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students got placed in my course is 7.5 CGPA. The highest package is all about 42 LPA, and the lowest package is 3 LPA. The average package is 4 LPA-5 LPA in my college. Top recruiting companies for my course are TCS, JP Morgan, Tesla, Infosys, and Cognizant. Placement is also good in this course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Nice facilities. The primary responsibility of the mess is quite good, and also the facilities of the mess and the food are good. Medical facilities are also available on our college campus. A lot of chemist shops are available. All good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching quality is one of the most significant factors that influences student learning, growth, and overall success. High-quality faculty, teaching goes beyond the good performance in the placement. It requires a strong resume or CV to sit in the placement.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: Worth of money, go for it.

detailed_review.Placements: About 70-80% of students are placed in my course. The highest package of this course is about 40 LPA - 50 LPA, the average package is 20 LPA, and the lowest package is 10 LPA - 12 LPA. They also provide internships for industrial-based knowledge that help with studying.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are awesome, which means that you have Wi-Fi facilities in both class and hostel so that students don't face any problem with their studies. They provide medical, sports, and games facilities. The food in mess and canteen is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable. They know how to teach and manage the students so that they can achieve in life. They also provide extra-curricular activities so that students can get involved in them with their studies.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Physics
reviews.review_title: If you actually want to learn and achieve something in your life, this is the best option.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 60-70% of students from my course were placed in reputed companies. The highest package offered went up to around 10-12 LPA, while the average was between 3-4 LPA, and the lowest stood at about 2.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies included Infosys, Wipro, TCS, Tech Mahindra, and some core firms, depending on the branch. Around 40% of students got internships in companies like HCL, IBM, and local industries, which helped in building practical exposure. The top roles offered were software developer, analyst, associate engineer, research trainee, and technical support engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus infrastructure is quite good, with spacious classrooms, well-equipped labs, and a large central library with digital resources. Wi-Fi is available in most areas, including classrooms and hostels. The hostel facilities are decent, with clean rooms, regular housekeeping, and 24/7 security. The mess food is average but hygienic, while the canteen offers good snacks at reasonable prices. Medical facilities are available on campus with a 24-hour hospital. The university also provides excellent sports grounds, a gymnasium, and regular extracurricular activities, which make campus life engaging and balancing.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified, supportive, and approachable, making complex topics easy to understand. The teaching quality is good, and many faculty members have both academic and industry experience. The curriculum is regularly updated, covering both theoretical and practical aspects, which makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are of moderate difficulty, focusing more on conceptual clarity than rote learning, and the pass percentage remains high as long as students attend classes and prepare sincerely.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my strong interest in the subject and the opportunities it offers in research and career growth. Best part about the course is the practical exposure through labs, projects, and seminars. However, I wish more industry-oriented workshops and internships are made mandatory to bridge the gap between academics and real-world applications. Campus has a lively crowd, with cultural fests, technical events, and extracurricular clubs that keep student life balanced. Scholarships are available for meritorious students, and the overall environment is safe and welcoming.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Life at MMDU. A blend of learning, living, and growing.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement opportunities being offered by MMDU, Mullana, are very impressive. The rate of students placed in different companies, such as Deloitte, TCS, Infosys, Celebal Technologies, etc. It is quite high. The average package being offered here is around 6 LPA. The highest package being offered here is 12 LPA. Being in a technical profession, here most of the companies come to offer different tech roles to students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: MMDU Mullana offers a vibrant and well equipped campus with modern infrastructure, including spacious classrooms, advanced labs, and a central library. The university provides separate hostels for boys and girls featuring AC and non AC rooms,24/7 security, and all essential amenities. The hostels are clean, safe, and designed to ensure a comfortable stay.  Students enjoy a balanced and enriching residential experience.
detailed_review.Faculty: In MMDU Mullana, the faculty is experienced and well qualified, often blending academic knowledge with practical insights. The teaching quality is interactive and student focused, ensuring conceptual quality and skill development. The curriculum is regularly updated to align with industry standards. Semester exams are moderately difficult but can be managed with constant study. Overall, MMDU offers both academic and professional growth.
detailed_review.Other: I pursued MCA from MMDU. The course offered hands on learning and industry exposure. The campus buzzes with vibrant fests, diverse clubs, good connectivity, and scholarship opportunities that support student growth.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: My best college has fabulous infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: In Civil Engineering, around 80-90% of students get placed, which is pretty good. Highest package offered so far is about 31 LPA (Lacs per annum), while the lowest is around 3 LPA. On average, students get 5 LPA. When it comes to internships, more than 90% of students manage to land one. Main roles offered include Site Engineer, Structural Engineer, Project Manager, and others related to construction and infrastructure.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and facilities at our university are really good. There's Wi-Fi throughout the campus, the classrooms are well-organized, and the library is great with strong internet connectivity. Mess food is actually better than most private universities, though it's purely vegetarian.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is supportive and well-qualified. They explain things from the basics, and they're always ready to help if you have doubts. They also have a good understanding of the subjects and teach based on industry requirements, so you get to learn the relevant tools and technologies used in the field. The course curriculum is up-to-date and matches well with what's needed in the industry. The semesters are manageable. It's not too hard to pass, but if you want a high CGPA, you'll need to put in some extra effort.

college_info.college_name: MMU Mullana Admission 2025: Registration, Application Process, Eligibility and Dates

faqs.question: Is it worth getting admission at Maharishi Markandeshwar University?
faqs.answer: Maharishi Markandeshwar University offers UG, PG and doctoral-level programmes in the fields of Humanities, Medicine, Engineering, Management,  Science, Law, etc. The courses are designed to be delivered in full-time mode. The university has a dedicated training and placement cell that conducts various types of skill development programmes. The university is ranked at 78th place amongst All Government & Private Universities in India. Its Pharmacy and Medical Institutes have also Ranked at 31st and 34th position respectively, all over India.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to appear for placement at Maharishi Markandeshwar University Mullana?
faqs.answer: It varies and depends upon the eligibility criteria set by a respective company to appear for placements at MMU Mullana. However, students are encouraged to maintain 65% or higher marks throughout their Graduation in order to become eligible for placements.

faqs.question: When will CUET result be declared?
faqs.answer: The CUET UG 2025 results were released on July 4, 2025. Candidates can check their CUET UG results from the official website of NTA. Moreover, the CUET UG examination was conducted from May 15 to June 4, 2025. Following the exam, a final answer key was released on July 1, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the last date for filling CUET application form?
faqs.answer: National Testing Agency commenced CUET 2026 registration on January 03, 2026. Soon after the release of the CUET notification candidates candidates can check the important dates pertaining to CUET 2026. The last date for CUET 2026 registration is January 30, 2026 Candidats will be required to fill the CUET application form within the given time frame, failing which no request for extension of the CUET registration last date will be entertained. NTA does not provide the window for late fee payment. CUET 2026 application process is in online mode. No physical copies of the CUET application form must be sent to the authorities.

faqs.question: What is the fee across various BTech specialisations offered by MMDU Mullana?
faqs.answer: MMDU Mullana-Ambala offers BTech specialisations for candidates who wish to pursue the field of engineering. The four-year course is designed to help candidates gather the necessary experience and knowledge to become the leading engineers of tomorrow. The course fee for various BTech specialisations is mentioned below:

faqs.question: What is the opening and closing rank for MBBS at Maharishi Markandeshwar University, Mullana?
faqs.answer: Th opening and closing rank depends on the category and quota of candidates. For general category under All India, the opening rank was 253028 and the closing rank was 407031. Cut offs are different when it comes to other categories or female candidates and even domicile of home state. Admission to Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) in Maharishi Markandeshwar University, Mullana is based on the scores obtained in the entrance exam NEET. Applicants are advised to confirm what category are they applying while checking for cut offs.

faqs.question: Can I get admission to Maharishi Markandeshwar University, Mullana in MBBS if my rank is between 405000 and 410000?
faqs.answer: For last year, the closing rank for Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) was 407031 which is very close to this range. This was for general category under All India quota. Unless the candidate belongs to some other category or domicile, one cannot afford to score less than this. text: Check out more on Maharishi Markandeshwar University Infrastructure in the below video:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: Central Library, Institution Libraries and Departmental Libraries consisting collection of more than 2 lac Books, CDs, Videos, Theses, Standards, Back Volumes, a digital repository of question papers, 9500 print, E-Journals and memberships of INFLIBNET, DELNET, NPTEL. The central library publishes a peer-reviewed quarterly journal “International Journal of Information Dissemination and Technology” since 2011 and provides a seating capacity for more than 1500 readers.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: 13 hostels are available with the options of AC rooms and facilities like attached washrooms, storage, indoor and outdoor games, Internet connectivity through Wi-Fi system and fiber optics, Hygienic mess with wholesome vegetarian & non-vegetarian meals (Non-Vegetarian meal for International Students only) Gymnasium and 24x7 Medical facilities.

facilities.name: Sports Complex
facilities.description: MMU in association with the renowned cricketer Mr. Yuvraj Singh has established “Yuvraj Singh Center Of Excellence” cricket academies at MMU, Mullana Campus and MMU Sadopur Ambala Campus with the-state-of-the-art infrastructure. Apart from YSCE, MMU is an active member of Association of Indian Universities and different sports associations.

highlights.summary:
Mahindra University ranked at 121 by NIRF 2024 in 'Engineering'. Mahindra University Mumbai offers UG, PG, PhD, courses through 8 schools and various departments in Engineering, Journalism, and various other streams. The university is sponsored by Mahindra Educational Institutions (MEI), which is a subsidiary of Tech Mahindra.
Mahindra University in Hyderabad offers placement assistance to students. It has collabed with various companies and organisations including Babson College - USA, Virginia Tech - USA, La Trobe University - Australia, the University of Melbourne, the University of Florida - Gainesville - USA, etc. Mahindra University in Hyderabad has experienced faculty members. Mahindra University in Hyderabad faculty motivates students to work on their knowledge and skills. Mahindra University offers BTech and BSc as flagship courses. Located in Bahadurpally, Hyderabad, this reputed university has received over 25 awards from various awarding bodies. The major highlights of Mahindra University are tabulated below:

college_info_program.intro:
Mahindra University popular programmes are BTech and BSc. The four-year full-time BTech programme and the BSc students are placed in top companies at top positions such as Dell, Amazon, IBM, and others. BTech and BSc students can become Managers, Consultants, and Engineers, or can go for other non-technical streams. BTech students are taught subjects such as Introduction to Electrical Engineering, English, Media Project, and others. The BTech CSE course covers the basic and advanced levels of Algorithms, Database Management systems, Data Structures, Machine Learning, Cryptography, and others. Overall, it is one of the top universities offering quality education to students.

Mahindra University Hyderabad Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: The college is good and worth joining.

detailed_review.Placements: The average package is 6 LPA. Top companies visit the college to hire people. Students with good knowledge will be placed in better positions. Every year many students get passed out with good packages. Students can choose whatever company they want to work with.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Campus is so huge and surrounded by trees. Classrooms are good, and a 24x7 Wi-Fi facility is available. Hostel rooms are so good. Washrooms are clean. There is a Fifa-verified football ground, swimming pool, basketball court, tennis court, etc. Mess food is so good. Medical facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the faculty members are so good. Everyone are well educated and have done their PhD in related courses. Teaching is not traditional method. Faculty members will make us understand things in very easy way. Digital teaching is encouraged here. Tests after completing a big topic will be held.
detailed_review.Other: The college conducts many events and fests. There are fests, which are not only related to enjoyment but also there are few fests related to studies. Aeon is the biggest tech fest which happens at Mahindra University. These is also a fest known as Aether which is the biggest fest in the entire year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Nanotechnology
reviews.review_title: Absolutely crazy college.

detailed_review.Placements: Mahindra University provides good placements and you are guaranteed to be placed in a good company. Mahindra is tied up with big companies and the average package is 10 lakhs per annum with the highest package being 45 lakhs per annum. Your placement depends on your academic performance. The top recruiting companies are Amazon Intel Tech Mahindra and BYJU'S.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure for my Nano technology course is good with well equipped classrooms and labs. The hostel facilities are also good with comfortable cottages and a well stocked library. The mess serves good quality food and there's a clinic on campus with a certified doctor. The total cost of my course is 4.5 Lacs per annum, and the hostel fee is 2 Lacs per annum.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty at Mahindra University are very good and helpful, and they're like family. They're very approachable and communicative, and they provide special hours for doubt clearance sessions. The teaching methods are very good, and Mahindra University is ahead of other colleges in this area. There are also tutorial classes where you can clear out your doubts, which is very helpful for many students. The exams are a bit difficult, to be honest, and we need to be prepared for that. The passing percentage isn't fixed at a certain number because it's based on relative grading in our college.
detailed_review.Other: I chose nanotechnology as my course because I had a good interest in nanoparticles. It turned out to be a good course with interesting subjects. Studying at Mahindra was fun because the faculty were very good and felt like family. I don't think there is anything that could be improved in my course because it is already very good. There are two events per year, one a fest and the other a sports event.

reviews.course: BBA in Applied Economics and Finance
reviews.review_title: A well all-rounded university great for personal and professional growth.

detailed_review.Placements: Our seniors were the first to be placed. They are still in the final stages of the placement cycle. There is an average of 8 Lacs and the highest of 32 Lacs so far for the BBA batch. Big 4 was a major recruiter. Most of the roles were in the hiring department and finance.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everything is great. There is a great variety of food catering to all, including vegetarian and Jains. Facilities are modern and up to date. The taste is very good with a weekly change in the menu. Medical facilities are good. There are nearby restaurants and hospitals catering to needs that may arise any time.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers are highly qualified. The curriculum is exactly what the 2030 goals align to. Exams are easy if prepared well. There is over a 90% pass percentage. This goes to show how such a college is beneficial and is adapting towards changing marketing dynamics, ensuring every student is equally competent.
detailed_review.Other: College life is great. This course is a blend of both finance and economics, which is perfect for me to thrive in a competitive market.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Decent placements are available after course completion.

detailed_review.Placements: As far as I have experienced, the placement report for our college shows that around 80-90% of the students get placements, and the rest still look for jobs or opt for higher studies. Up to 50 companies visit the campus for placements. The highest package offered by the college is 24 LPA, the average package offered is 8 LPA, and the lowest package offered is 2 LPA. Internships are also offered to students from the beginning of the second year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities of our college are pretty good. The facilities available in our college include smart classrooms, sports facilities mainly related to indoor sports, and a medical room. The hostels have decent facilities, and the mess offers good quality food.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum of our college has been designed in a manner that helps us learn and apply new concepts of business. Sometimes the professors are not very helpful, but other times they are helpful and teach us really well. There are two exams that take place in one semester.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: It's a practical-based course curriculum with decent placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Your college has a dedicated placement cell, but only 40-50 companies visit the campus for student placements. Approximately 80% of students in our course secure placements. The median package offered by the college is 6 LPA. Internships are offered, and students with good academics and skills have the opportunity to intern at Mahindra. Other recruiting companies include HTC, TCS, Amazon, Capgemini, IBM, and various startups in Hyderabad.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college campus is not very large but offers many facilities. There are sports grounds where we can play cricket, football, volleyball, tennis, etc. A medical room is available for treatment. CCTV cameras are installed in classrooms and labs. Cafeterias serve good-quality food.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our course, professors have over 20 years of experience, while some have 10+ years. Most use practical techniques, including case studies and examples, to help us understand subjects. The curriculum covers management subjects like marketing, finance, accounting, operations, human resources, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Everything is good.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides excellent placements. The salary packages offered are very low. Top recruiting companies visit our campus. The average salary package offered is 12 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides excellent infrastructure. Two students share a single room. Air-conditioners and two fans are available in the rooms. Wi-Fi is available. The quality of the food in the mess is excellent. They serve a variety of food. The library is good and huge. Many books are available. Labs are excellent.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is excellent. It is an excellent course.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: I am not satisfied because of the difficulty of exams but our campus has good environment.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 25% of students got placed in our course. The highest salary package offered was 28 LPA. The lowest salary package offered varies between 3 LPA - 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Voltas Ltd, Cognizant, Amazon, and Capgemini. Almost 10 students got internships in this course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All facilities are available. Wi-Fi is enabled on campus. Air-conditioners are available in the hostel and college. Library is very good and classrooms are spacious. Around 200 students can sit comfortably in our classrooms. The food served in the mess is better. Medical facilities are also available. Games are conducted in this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is good. Subjects are tough, therefore students cannot understand every topic properly. Semester exams are moderate. The pass percentage is low.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest in it.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: The amount of supplementary exam is too high, i.e. 5k.

detailed_review.Placements:
A drop of 37.77% was observed in the highest package offered in 2021 compared to 2020.
A group of 15 people got into dell internship through hackathons.
People also get placed based on hackathons. People also worked for ISRO projects. Average package offered is 7LPA. Placement rate is 75%. The highest package offered is 28lpa.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
The classrooms are very neat and they can accommodate upto 100 students and in some classrooms upto 200.
The Physics and electrical labs have all equipments working and they are in good numbers. The hostel rooms are spacious and clean. The mess food is hygienic and tasty.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The teachers are helpful. Yes it makes the students industry ready
they are good. The sources offered by the teachers are upto the mark and library has a wide variety of books
the pass percentage is 37 percent
student to teacher interaction is encouraged.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is an excellent college.

detailed_review.Placements: Many students opt for further studies. In our college, many students are placed. The highest salary package offered is 45 LPA and the average salary package offered is 8 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Amazon, Capgemini, etc., visit our campus. Only 10% of students get internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are excellent. Wi-Fi facilities are very good with a very good connection. The food served in the mess and canteen is very hygienic. A variety of food is served. The hospital is open 24X7. There are many sports, including basketball, cricket, football, volleyball, badminton, chess, pool, and table tennis. There are also two gyms open to all.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are well qualified. They teach well in classes but the teaching isn't very good. The first three semesters hold no real relevance as far as industry experience and learning. Exams are relatively easy. The pass percentage is 45%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose ECE because it provides paths to both the fields of electronics and computers.

reviews.course: BBA in Computational Business Analytics
reviews.review_title: Review of Mahindra University.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements provided by the college are good. Top companies visit the campus to get the best candidates. They usually look for students having practical knowledge of what they have learned. The average salary package ranges from 4.5 LPA to 7 LPA. The highest of the packages also go till 25-30 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a good infrastructure. The classrooms are very spacious and are air-conditioned. The college has big lecture halls. The college hostels are well maintained and have a good environment. There are labs for the students as well. There is also a library which has all the necessary books required by students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and always guide the students whenever they face any problems with their course curriculum. All the teachers are Ph.D. holders and are good expertise in their respective fields. The course curriculum is such that the students have to be strict with their study routine.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college provides excellent infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 100% of students are placed. The average salary package offered is around 7.5 LPA, and the highest salary package offered is 45 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Amazon, Byju's, Tech Mahindra, Flipkart, and many other huge companies that visit to hire students. It is an excellent opportunity for students to find their dream jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The food served in the mess is excellent. Our college has all facilities that students would require like, basketball courts, football field, table tennis, gym, volleyball courts, snooker room, etc. It also provides the infrastructure for research and engineering for working on drones, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very friendly and kind. The curriculum is highly relevant, and it helps students to be ready for the industry and what their jobs might require. The semester exams are moderately difficult, and the pass percentage is high.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: 39% percent of students are placed in my course. I heard that many top recruiting companies come for placement. Most of the students studying here opt for higher studies and very few go for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Mahindra university has the best hostels. It's worth the money. The quality of food available in the mess and canteen is very good. The mess is thoroughly maintained. We also have a gym, basketball courts, volleyball court, cricket ground, badminton courts, tennis courts, and a big football ground. We also have a small clinic.
detailed_review.Faculty: All faculty members are Ph.D. holders. They are okay. The course curriculum is relevant. But I don't know if it makes the students industry ready. The semester exams are very difficult here and the results are given based on relative grading. I think the last 8 or 10 percent are required to repeat the course again.
detailed_review.Other: I choose CSE because it is the most happening one right now. The campus life is the best here. You will get to know people from all around India. The fests here are awesome. After the college timings, you will have plenty of time to engage in extra curricular activities. You will also be rewarded scholarship based on your performance.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computation and Mathematics
reviews.review_title: Faculty is average and our college is a good platform to perceive higher studies.

detailed_review.Placements: The average percentage of placements in our college is 80% and my course is introduced by our batch. The highest salary package of the previous year is 27 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Amazon and Mahindra. The top 10 students in each course with a good percentage in main or semester exams get Rs.100000 scholarship. Internship is not provided by the college in 2nd and 3rd years. So many students do private internships. The internships for our course are machine learning, data analyst, data science, and software.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All courses in our college are provided with materials needed in the library, labs, Wi-Fi on campus, and dorms. We have a clinic for medical situations and ambulance in case of emergencies. The hostel room is shared by only 2 people with attached bathroom for girls and common washroom for boys. The food and security is very good. We have various indoor and outdoor sports such as football, tennis, cricket, badminton, volleyball, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most work and knowledge gaining are to be done by the students. Faculty members teach on a high level so you need to be to date with your learning. Sometimes, you may be disappointed with the faculty. The teaching quality is above average. The course is relevant to the BSE computer and maths integrated course provided in many IITs and NITs. We have 7-10 subjects per semester on average. The exams are on a quite difficult level. The pass percentage is 85%.
detailed_review.Other: Our course gives me the opportunity to choose both computers, maths, and data science as my main stream. The best thing about my course is the lab work and the subject knowledge they provide. I wish the number of subjects to be reduced to a maximum of 6 so that I can concentrate on other activities or external courses. We have multiple events per academic year like sports event, cultural event, annual event, and entrepreneur events.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is good if students could not make it to IITs.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 100% of students are placed. The highest salary package offered is 60 LPA. The average salary package offered is around 12 LPA. Many top companies are Mahindra rise, Amazon, Dell, and many dream companies come for selections on-campus. Internships are available in a wide range with appropriate guidance, and international internships are also available.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are good in this college. Mess is good and it is a way far better than any other hostels. It provides a library lawn and classes are very well maintained. Wi-Fi is not that well maintained but can be sufficient for a normal user. A lot of variety of e-books and offline books are also provided in the library.
detailed_review.Faculty: The semester exams are comparably difficult but it is an add-on point for students themselves to improve a lot more and be exceptional. The course is structured in a very well manner with a lot of inputs from tied-up foreign universities. The course structure is a way similar to many foreign universities.
detailed_review.Other: This college is away from the main city, but the transport is easily available. Fests are the best part of MU.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has really good infrastructure and faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost all the students who are eligible to appear for on-campus placements got selected. The highest package offered is 40 LPA, and the average package offered is around 12 LPA for CSE branch. Overall, the placements for CSE are better than other branches.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of Mahindra University is very good compared to all the EAMCET colleges. The hostels are also kept clean and tidy. The food is average. Sports facilities and medical facilities are excellent. The classrooms and labs are well maintained.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members in Mahindra University are the best among the universities in Hyderabad. The course curriculum is relevant and makes the students industry-ready. The teachers and professors are really well qualified and are ready to help the students in any way.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: It is a completely residential college.

detailed_review.Placements: About 90% of the students were placed from our course. Top recruiting companies here are Tech Mahindra, Amazon, Capgemini, Schlumberger, TCS, Byju's, Beehyv, Cyient, Toshiba, CBRE, Cisco and Dell. Some of them get placed as HRs. The highest salary package offered is 45 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 7.5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is a good Wi-Fi facility in our hostels and classrooms. We need to use our personal mobile data when we are not in hostel or classrooms. Our hostel rooms are very good to stay, and the quality of food served is awesome. We can get food 24x7. There is a medical room with a doctor. There are volleyball, basketball, tennis and badminton courts. A gym is accessible for free of cost.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers here are friendly, and all of them are PhD holders. Some of them are retired IIT professors, and they teach everything from basics. The curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready. We will be getting many assignments to do all over the semester. Semester exams can be found a little bit difficult than compared to the problems taught in class.
detailed_review.Other: I chose artificial intelligence because I somehow want to develop India's army using modern technology. The best thing about AI is you can learn something more in the same four years, including CSE. Events such as Aether and Tyohar are organised here. There are many clubs on the campus ranging from music to Engima. The campus crowd is very limited as of now, and it is going to increase in the next few years. There are girl scholarships for academically top 10% of students. The campus is surrounded by greenery all over.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am dissatisfied with the Wi-Fi connection in the college but remaining all is good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements here are fine. Around 905 of the people got placed. The top recruited companies were Tech Mahindra, IBM, Amazon, and Microsoft. The highest salary package offered is 45 LPA, and the average salary package offered is 6 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel rooms are very neat and hygienic. That would be the best place to live in and there is no need to specially say about the classrooms. They are excellent and are very good places to learn more things. I love the classrooms. The food quality is also not bad indeed but should be improved.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the professors are highly experienced and Ph.D. graduates. In the lectures, they teach we gain good confidence and they deliver good content to students. The course will be very well easier and fit students for employment. Semester exams are pretty good enough and will test our knowledge.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: Less number of placements appeared this year.

detailed_review.Placements: Less than 30% of the students were placed in my course. The average package offered is around 6 Lacs. None of the students has got into internship from my course. Actually in our college, most of the companies coming for placements are almost software companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available 24/7. There are many labs for my course and many types of researchers can be done here. The classrooms are so big and nice. The quality of the food available in the mess is average but in the canteen it was good. Medical facilities are provided. There are many sports and games played in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are always helpful and they are also highly qualified but their teaching quality is not up to the high standard but they have huge knowledge about the subject. The course curriculum is relevant. The semester exams are somewhat difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the course based upon my interest.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with this college. It provides good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 100% of the students from our course got placed. The highest salary package offered in 2019 is 35 LPA, and the average salary package offered ranges between 9-10 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 5 LPA. Many students get an internship in the 3rd year. The college is very good at placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In the civil engineering course, there are a lot of facilities for students. There are 4 labs in our department. The infrastructure of the hostel is mind-blowing. The mess services are also very good. The quality of the food served is outstanding.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in our college are very helpful. They help every student to look after them. All the professors are from IIT. They show us the right path in engineering.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: It has the potential to join the club of elite colleges in India if admission standards are raised.

detailed_review.Placements: MEC students from the 2014 batch were interviewed by over 30 international brands, and a majority of students opted for careers found placements among these recruiting companies. These brands included corporate giants from Japan and global leaders like Microsoft, Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd, GAP Inc and Voltas, among others. The average salary package offered was 7.5 LPA, and the highest salary package offered to some students was 30 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: MEC features spacious seminar halls, lecture theatres, lecture halls, and tutorial rooms which is providing the right atmosphere for in-class learning and after-class discussions between teachers and students. There are state-of-the-art labs which enable students to deepen their classroom learning through practical application. The campus is vast and offers recreational facilities like a variety of outdoor and indoor activities. Accommodation and dining facilities at MEC are good than other Indian engineering colleges.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum is relevant. Professors are helpful and highly qualified, and all are PhD holders. MEC has tie-ups with global standards of excellence. Housing laboratories are equipped to effectuate ground-breaking inventions and innovations under the supervision of faculty members who are highly accomplished and dedicated scholars in their respective fields with industry, research and academic experience.

college_info.college_name: Mahindra University Hyderabad Courses Admission 2025: Application Process, Eligibility, Dates & Fee

faqs.question: Can I apply for admission to various courses at Mahindra University?
faqs.answer: Mahindra University admissions are open for all courses. The university offers merit-based admission to all UG, PG, and Doctoral courses. Further, for admission to BTech, candidates are required to appear in one entrance exam i.e. JEE Main and SAT accepted by the college. Candidates seeking admission to Mahindra University must fill out the online application form by visiting the university's official website.

faqs.question: What are the minimum marks required for MBA at Mahindra University 2023?
faqs.answer: Mahindra University does not look for a minimum marks. They put more focus on the consistency of the student in their bachelor's degree, done in a recognised board/university, hence they ask for a detailed report submission during application, if your marks in your bachelor's degree takes an upward graph, that also works in your favour. They also ask for your grades in standardized exams, GMAT, CAT and GRE.

faqs.question: Can I join Mahindra University Hyderabad directly?
faqs.answer: Mahindra University Hyderabad direct admissions are only possible for some courses. For other courses, students will have to appear for the entrance exams. The mode of Mahindra University course admissions is online. Admission to various courses is based on merit and entrance exam scores. The accepted entrance exams are JEE Main , SAT India, and others. Candidates willing to get admission must visit the official website and click on the Apply Now tab. Select the required course and pay the application fee. Fill out and submit the application form with the required information.

faqs.question: Is Mahindra University, Hyderabad best for B.Tech/BE or not?
faqs.answer: Yes, Mahindra Institute, Hyderabad is one of the best institutes for B.Tech/B.E as it offers the highest Placements to its students, Summer internships, and also offers scholarships to students. The Placement rate for B.Tech is quite high. The average placement package for B.Tech at Mahindra Institute is INR 8.60 LPA and the highest Package for B.Tech at Mahindra Institute is INR 38 LPA. The college also focuses on research, and development. The faculty for the B.Tech course is well-qualified and the campus has a world-class infrastructure.

faqs.question: What are the essential qualifications for admission to BTech course at Mahindra University, Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: To be eligible for admission to BTech at Mahindra University candidates are required to Pass Class 12 from a recognised board. Further, candidates must appear for the accepted entrance exam JEE Main and SLAT. After fulfilment of the eligibility criteria, candidates are required to visit the official website of the college to apply online.

faqs.question: How many students can do a B.Tech CSE at Mahindra University, Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: The candidates' All India Ranks are used to determine who gets admitted to the B.Tech programme. This is determined based on the JEE Mains score. The Joint Seat Allocation Authority (JOSSa) will conduct counselling for interested candidates utilising their All India Rank. In accordance with the choices made by the candidate, counselling will be provided during each round of seat distribution. This deemed to be University accepts a total of 270 students for the course B.Tech.

faqs.question: What is the fee for four-year BBA course at Mahindra University?
faqs.answer: The college offers BBA in a full-time mode. The total four-year fee of BBA is INR 12 lakh. To be eligible for admission, applicants are required to pass Class 12 from a recognised board. Further, to get a seat at college candidates are required to pay the fees annually.

faqs.question: What are the selection criteria for BBA at Mahindra University?
faqs.answer: Mahindra University offers entrance-based admission to BBA. To be eligible for admission candidates must pass Class 12 from a recognised board. After filling out the eligibility criteria candidates must apply online for admission.

college_info.college_name: Mahindra University Hyderabad Photos & Videos

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Mahindra University has a state-of-the-art infrastructure. MU currently has around eight functional hostels that offer twin-sharing AC rooms for the various course students. The university has a well-established library and provides various facilities to students. Mahindra University has a mess hall that is operational 24/7 and offers delicious food to staff and students.
For more information about of Mahindra University, Hyderabad infrastructure check out the below video:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: A digital and physical library with vast resources, journals, and e-books to support student learning and research.

data.description: Mahindra University has professional faculty members. Mahindra University faculty motivates students to work on their skills and knowledge. The below-mentioned are Mahindra University faculty details:

college_info.college_name: Manav Rachna International Institute of Research & Studies: Admissions 2025, Courses, Fees

highlights.summary:
Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies is a 1997 established institute. It is also known as MRIIRS and was also known as MRIU. Holding a grade of A++ through NAAC accreditation, MRIIRS is UGC recognised as well. Additionally, the formerly known university has been ranked in the 1401+ Band by QS University Rankings 2026.
MRIIRS courses are approved by AICTE and are offered at the UG, PG and Doctoral levels. Courses such as BTech at MRIIRS is accredited by NBA. Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies courses are offered in various domains such as Engineering & Technology, Allied Health Sciences, Commerce, Management Studies, Computer Applications, and others. Here are some major highlights of MRIIRS:
Check out more on MRIIRS highlights:

college_info_program.intro:
MRIIR provides various courses across UG, PG, and Doctorate levels across different specializations. Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies provides various courses such as BTech, BSc, BBA, BCA, BA, MSc, MA, BDes, BCom, MCom, BArch, BDes, MDes, etc. The popular programmes of the university include MCA, BCA, MBA, BTech and BBA.
