college_info.college_name: IIITDM Jabalpur Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of IIITDM-Jabalpur CSE.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements at my college IIITDM-J are very nice. Around 70-75 percent of students get placed every year from this college, especially in CSE. The highest package is 87.5 LPA, which means it is in India. The average package is around 21.4 LPA. Top recruiters include Google, Adobe, and Nvidia.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: IIITDM-Jabalpur provides top-notch infrastructure for CSE Students, including fully Wi-Fi-enabled labs, modern classrooms, and a digital library with vast resources. Hostels are spacious and clean with good Wi-Fi. It provides 24X7 water facility. The mess is also good and hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members at IIITDM-Jabalpur are highly qualified, supportive, and experienced with most holding PhDs in their field from many reputed institutions. Teaching quality is excellent, focusing both on theory and practical learning. The overall passing percentage is around 90-95 percent.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placements, infrastructure, and balanced college life.

detailed_review.Placements: Most final years from CSE are placed from our institute. ECE students are placed quite good. They are placed in companies like D. E Shaw, Accenture, Flipkart, Meesho, etc. Our college tie-up with Japan for on-campus, so few companies from Japan also visit our college. The highest package of CSE last year was 80 LPA in India. Average package for CSE is around 20 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Institute infrastructure is really good. It has a lecture hall and tutorial complexes for classes. Core lab complex for core courses, library, and computer center. It also has PHC for immediate medical-related issues. Mess food is good. Every hostel has one canteen. We have football, basketball, volleyball, and tennis courts. There are also two indoor badminton courts, chess, carrom, table tennis, and gym rooms. Overall, the infrastructure is excellent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors are well educated from some of the top IITs, NITs, and IIITs. They are approachable and clear students' doubts. Teaching quality and the slides they provide have valuable information. We have 2 semesters in each year, each semester contains 2 quizzes, 1 mid-semester, 1 end semester exams and lab related to those courses. We also have yearlong projects which make us industry ready. We can clear semesters if we follow the lectures and slides properly.
detailed_review.Other: We have two big fests, Tarang cultural fest and Hackbyte as the technical fest. There are also many other events that happen regularly in different clubs.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: IIITDM Jabalpur truthful review.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80 to 90% get placed. Highest package was 82 LPA, and average package was 21.49 LPA. Companies like these, Google, Microsoft, Morgan Stanley, and many more multi-billion dollar companies, and as the college makes you fit for job interviews and internships, so you don't have to suffer at the last minute or last period.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities available in the college are very good and great. Infrastructure is very good and well maintained by the college, and the college has Wi-Fi and many kinds of labs that are maintained by the college very well, which makes the college techified.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very nice and engaging, they teach in a very engaging and light manner, and they give projects as homework, so you don't have to suffer from a lack of experience and knowledge. They also give one-to-one doubt consultancy. I think I am not sure, but course curriculum is relevant, I think.
detailed_review.Other: Fests are going on this year. Our most awaited fest is Tarang, which is full of enjoyment, music, dance, guests, drama, etc., whole night is amazing.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Real talk about IIITDM Jabalpur.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements of our college, i.e., IIITDM Jabalpur, are very good. It is in the top tier, I will say, and the placements were like, highest international package is 80 LPA, and highest Domestic package is  82 LPA. Average package is 21.49 LPA. College makes you fit for the jobs and internships, so you don't have to suffer from that.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities that are available in our college are very top-notch and tier I will say and I think, our college is equipped with very modern things like Wi-Fi, computer labs, fingerprint blocks, and many more. College also has a very clean and well-maintained infrastructure.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers and faculty members are very kind and engaging, and they teach in a very good and light manner, so the students don't feel bored or things like that, and the main thing is that the college prepares you for the jobs and internships. Exams are conducted semester-wise, and the curriculum is fully project-based, I would say. Overall, a catch.
detailed_review.Other: This course at IIITDM Jabalpur has the highest package in the college. I just want a package, and the thing is that the college makes you fit for job interviews and internships by making the learning project-based. Overall, a very good curriculum, study, and faculty members.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: If you are searching for a college for engineering, then this college is best, you can come.

detailed_review.Placements: There are 190 people in my Computer Science and Engineering course. The highest, lowest, and average packages offered are 1 Crore, 30 LPA, and 9 LPA, respectively. Companies like Google and Amazon come to our college for placements. 60% to 70% of students got internships, and the top roles offered were in software engineering, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In every classroom, lab, and library, a 5G Wi-Fi internet connection is available, and all areas are neat and clean. The hostels are good. There are six hostels in my college, and LAN is available in every room. Healthy food is available in the mess, canteen, etc., with two messes: one for vegetarian and one for non-vegetarian food. All clubs for every sport and ground are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful because they assist students in clearing even small doubts, and they are also highly qualified. The teaching quality is very good. This course curriculum is relevant, and students are made industry-ready. Semester papers are not difficult, but there are no gap holidays between exams, as exam papers are conducted continuously.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in becoming a software engineer, and this college is best for coding. The good things about this college include a high percentage of placements, etc. There is nothing to improve about my course because the college provides everything for that course. Every event is conducted in the college. The campus crowd is managed by seniors. Every student receives a scholarship, meaning the percentage to get a scholarship is 95%, so most students get scholarships.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great review of my college.

detailed_review.Placements: I am currently studying in 2nd year. Almost 90% of our college students get placed. The highest package is 1 crore per annum and the lowest package is 10 LPA. Top companies that recruit students from our college are Google, Amazon, Cognizant, etc. Some students got internships in our college in different companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our infrastructure is really good. There are so many good classrooms which we like. The quality of food and canteen is good. The mess is somewhat bad. All facilities are available in our college. All sports are available in our college.
detailed_review.Other: The course is good, so I chose it.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The worst college and the place where I met the most toxic people ever in my life.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement at our year was like okay. About 50% of students did not get placed however recession was also there so you can't blame anyone although I think more efforts could have been made by the placement officer. The highest was 52 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure was good particularly the hostels good the lecture halls and LHTC were great. Professors were just very arrogant and they did not care about the future of students. All they had was ego just pure ego and they did not care about the dignity of the students.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum was outdated. It had nothing to do with modern problem-solving. Some of the faculty were good but most of the professors were either too arrogant or just filled with their delusional egos that they didn't even care about students. Even they used to ignore genuine medical problems.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, enjoyable college life with good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In computer science, around 85 percent of students get placed. The highest package in the CSE branch is 1.10 crore domestically, and the median package is around 18 LPA. Many companies visit the college, like Amazon, Infosys, TCS, Nvidia, etc. Overall, placements are good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: IIIT Jabalpur has a well-developed campus with all the necessary infrastructure and facilities for students. Spread over 300 acres, it has academic buildings, research centers, and well-equipped classrooms. The library has a large collection of books, research papers, and digital materials. The institute provides hostel facilities for both boys and girls, with Wi-Fi, common rooms, and mess services. Faculty and staff also have residential quarters on campus. For sports and recreation, there are playgrounds, a cricket and football field, basketball and tennis courts, and an indoor sports complex with a gym.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some faculty members are very helpful, not only in academics but also in guidance. They help you with whatever questions you ask. But, some faculty members are not good and don't show interest in teaching. Overall, it is decent. Semester exams are like NITs very hard as well as not very easy. In IIIT Jabalpur, there is relative grading.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, the faculty is good, but some are good and some are not. Overall, the college is also good.

detailed_review.Placements: About 80% of our college students got placed through both on-campus and off-campus, with a good package. The recruiting companies are Amazon, Google, Nvidia, etc. Our course consists of core Computer Science and a selection of fields such as Cyber Security, Data Science, and many more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The lab and classrooms are very good, spacious, and clean, with projectors, noise-canceling walls, speakers, and air conditioning. The hostel is good, but not too clean, students have to clean themselves, although there is cleaning on a daily basis. Proper hot water is provided, mess food is decent, and sports facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified with high experience and foreign degrees from reputed universities. The course curriculum is relevant to modern needs, and it makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are of a good level, but easy, if studied properly. The pass percentage is good, as our college has an average grading system.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have interest in computers since childhood and an interest in cybersecurity. The only thing that should be improved is the syllabus, which should be more modern, needs-oriented subjects, such as Engineering Drawing, should not be that important for CS students. Overall, our course is good. There are no big fests in our college, but still, programs by cultural clubs are good. Connectivity is good, with bus service available for visiting the city. The surroundings are beautiful and full of greenery. Scholarship is provided to minority caste students and merit-based scholarships.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college alumni have qualified for UPSC, CAT, and top companies exams.

detailed_review.Placements: The Indian Institute of Information Technology Design and Manufacturing IIITDM Jabalpur has demonstrated commendable placements in recent years. In Mechanical Engineering, 70-80% of students are placed, and mass recruiters are Bajaj Auto, Cummins India, and BEL, like companies with offered 12 LPA average.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The Indian Institute of Information Technology Design and Manufacturing IIITDM Jabalpur has better infrastructure than private colleges. Everything is provided on our college campus like Wi-Fi, Smart labs, Smart classrooms, and a library,  at an affordable fee.
detailed_review.Faculty: The Indian Institute of Information Technology Design and Manufacturing IIITDM Jabalpur has teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. Some courses are from outside India, and professors are also hired from outside India. All teaching is in English. The curriculum is hard whole day classes and labs ongoing.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college experience is good.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement in this college is average for the mechanical branch, but for CSE and ECE, the placements are good. Companies like Google and Amazon visit the campus, but it depends on the skills you have. CGPA matters, but if you are good enough in your skills, you can get good opportunities at this college. The coding culture in this college is very good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are good, and all the equipment is needed for experiments. The mess food offers both non-veg and veg options, and food quality is average. The best part about the mess is that it has a facility for fast food, which is good. The worst part is the hostel, as the infrastructure is good, but the availability of the network is poor. It does not have Wi-Fi, but it has LAN in each room with a speed of 200 Mbps. However, the problem with the LAN is that it sometimes disconnects and stays down for a long time.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching quality is good, and Teachers are knowledgeable enough. The course curriculum is relevant and makes the students industry-ready. The semester exams are very tough, as students who come to the college are JEE clear, so the competition is tough. However, it has relative grading, which makes it easier for students to pass exams. The passing marks of the semester depend on the professor's paper. Sometimes, the whole batch gets a grade in binary, 0, and 1.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Smart Manufacturing
reviews.review_title: College Review of IIITDM Jabalpur.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, 60 percent of students were placed last year. The student strength was around six hundred. The highest package was 6,00,000, and the highest package was around 60 lacs per annum. Many companies came to recruit students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is quite good. It includes lecture halls, libraries, hostels, administration, and labs. Hostel facilities are not that great, and for medical issues, they provide medicine facilities from the primary healthcare center within our campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are highly qualified, most of them holding Ph.D.s from reputed institutions with a strong research background. There are a total of 8 semesters, each lasting six months. In every semester, there are two quizzes, one mid-semester exam, and one final exam.
detailed_review.Other: Overall, the campus life experience is good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Smart Manufacturing
reviews.review_title: Inside view of IIITDM Jabalpur from a 3rd-year student.

detailed_review.Placements: Smart manufacturing is a new branch, so the placements here are less compared to other branches like CSE, ECE, and ME, but last year, in 2024, students from some were placed in Business Analyst roles along with a few being placed in core jobs in Smart Manufacturing. The B.A. role was offered by Meesho, Playsimple Games, and PwC. The highest placement from some was 23 LPA, and the lowest was 13 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The lecture hall and tutorial complex are very nice at IIITDM Jabalpur. All the classrooms are smart classes, and LHTC is Wi-Fi-enabled (more than 70%). The library has more than enough books from all fields of academics in engineering and also has books of fiction. Hostels are also good, and the hostel rent is only 11,000 INR, which is very nominal. First and second-year students are put in Hall 3 and Hall 4, which are triple sharing, whereas for third and fourth-year students, the college provides single rooms in Panini and Hall 1 hostels, respectively.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and have studied from foreign universities across the globe. All the classrooms being smart, the quality of teaching is top-notch in all subjects. My course, Smart Manufacturing, mainly covers present-day hot topics like IoT, IIoT, CPPS, Business Analysis, SolidWorks, etc. These subjects make students industry-ready. Semester exams are not very hard, but it depends on the course and faculty teaching the course. The pass percentage is more than 95%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course at IIITDM Jabalpur because it was the best option available for me based on the rank I acquired in the JEE Main examination. The best thing about my course is that it’s new and focuses on current industry requirements. The practical part of the course can be improved by giving students more practical exams than theory exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Huge campus. Very less fest. Cultural clubs are very active. Good placements in 2023.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 66% of students got placed through college campus interviews last year. In CSE, last to last year 2 students secured salary package of around 40 LPA, and 1 student secured salary package of around 1.1 crore which was off-campus. Companies like FAANG visit the institute. We can get a PPO also from the company. Apart from technical roles many companies of core branches also visit our institute.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All classrooms are air-conditioned. Wi-Fi is available almost everywhere. Classrooms are big and few can accommodate up to 300 students. There are library and computer center where we can go and study and use it also. There is a core complex for all labs like mechanical and ECE. All labs are well-maintained. Hostels are good changes every year for boys and 2 are available for girls. For the first and second years, there are three students per room. Mess is centralized. Canteen is available in every hostel. Medical faculty members are available at the medical center. There is a lot of space for grounds and all games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are Ph.D. holders and well-educated. A lot of them are helpful, while some are not at all. Teaching quality depends on faculty members. Course curriculum is relevant. Some subjects are not useful but it does make students industry-ready said seniors. Semester exams are moderate to tough level, we can prepare the night before the exam. Pass percentage and grading are relative. Pass percentage is 30% to 35%.
detailed_review.Other: Course curriculum is well-structured and choosing CSE means choosing a bright and well-diverse side. Course just gets way more hectic in 2nd year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The Truth of Indian Institute of Information Technology Design and Manufacturing Jabalpur.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package offered for this year is above 90 LPA, and more than 3 got more than 85 LPA. The least package offered for this year is 4 LPA. Top recruiters are Goldman Sachs, Amazon, Myntra, etc. Most of the students are placed on campus, and some have been placed off campus as well.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure of lecture halls and the library. In hostels, we have one chair, a study table, a bed, and a cupboard for each student, and the rooms are three-sharing rooms. Talking about food, it is average; if you want to survive, you have to eat.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well-educated and qualified, and they teach well. The curriculum is relevant to our course, and it helps us well. For an average student, it is very difficult to secure a good grade in exams because this college has relatively strict grading for students.
detailed_review.Other: The best thing about this course is the good placement at this college. There are no fests at this college, and only technical clubs are very active here. The campus is not crowded a lot, but it is a good and non-crowded place.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Smart Manufacturing
reviews.review_title: The college is national, so you can go, but semesters are tough, though clubs here are very good.

detailed_review.Placements: This year, 150 were placed from some 15-20. The highest package is 1.2 Cr, and the lowest is not sure. As the course is new, the coming future is dependent on this. So, you can definitely pursue this as it will help you in the future, and you will be able to beat the coming AI, as this is needed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are good, but Wi-Fi is not there, and the network is weak. Full protection is provided. There are good sports facilities, and the best part is that you have much time during vacations, so you can focus on your skills. However, there is a lot of pressure for the exams, and the marking is also tough.
detailed_review.Faculty: Not really. They are knowledgeable but not helping that much. Obviously, you have to build your own skills. The semester exams are really tough. The clubs and all help us to understand, but we only have to get ready for the industry on our own here. The pass percentage here is very much dependent on the relative grading.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: IIITDM Jabalpur offers great college life with academic excellence and opportunities for growth.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest international salary package offered is 122 LPA. The highest domestic salary package offered is 110 LPA. Over 90 companies made more than 284 offers. The institute allows students to go for project-based internships with a 6-month duration for practical exposure to the corporate working culture.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is quite good. We have academic office building, well-designed lecture hall, tutorial complex, computer lab and library with well-equipped features (like computers, Wi-Fi, books, etc.). Open-air theatre, student activity centers, and playgground are available on campus. There are enough options, we have enough options to eat food. We have canteens in each hostel, besides that, there is a Nescafe shop, Amul shop, Domino's, grocery store, etc., all operating inside the campus until night. About hostels, all of them have LAN connections (sometimes they do not work). There is an Allahabad bank inside the campus. What I liked is we have various footways and roads. The whole campus has tight security, and a lot of security guards are always on duty.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most teachers are highly qualified with deep knowledge in their fields. But, students complain that they are unable to understand sometimes (just like in all other colleges). Curriculum is relevant according to different branches. Academic curriculum and active technical clubs of the college make active students industry-ready. Semester exams are not that difficult. Students who are regular in classes can easily get through them with good grades. Here, a relative grading system is followed, and grade F is considered a fail.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Dissatisfied with infrastructure, but the placements are very good, so you ignore the other defaults

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 80-90% placed. Highest of 110 LPA,Lowest of 3 LPA,Average of 18 LPA. Top recruiters: NVIDIA, Accenture, Oracle,Atlassian, Deloitte,etc. Almost 50-60 % got the internship in companies like Google,Amazon, Accenture, etc. The internship recruitment will be fully done online. There will be very few companies that will come to offer internships. But you can apply off-campus for the internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities provided are Central A.C. in classrooms, labs, and libraries. But, in hotel rooms, there will be no A.C. Students have to buy their own cooler with the permission of the warden and have to pay the current bill. Food in the mess is avg(both veg and non-veg). In the first and second year, students have to share the room with 3 other students, and from the third year, students get their own single room. Every hostel has its own canteen, but only the second year’s canteen has food quality that is nice, and non-veg food is also available. There is a Primary Health Care Centre (PHC) present in the college with an ambulance facility 24/7. There are many sports clubs available, and students can have their own choice to join the club.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very knowledgeable here, and all are qualified to teach here. The teaching quality is excellent. Teachers are very helpful; students can approach them and can clear their doubts anytime. The course curriculum is very relevant to the respective disciplines, and this curriculum is helpful to make students industry-ready. The difficulty level of the exam varies from exam to exam, but overall the difficulty is moderate.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because firstly I have no interest in learning coding, and as the present trend is going towards the semiconductor industry, I chose the ECE course. But in this ECE course also, if you want to go towards the coding side, it’s very easy there as there is a separate club dedicated to improving the coding skills of the students(The Programming Club). Also in my course there are a lot of classes in the second year as compared to other courses;if the classes are less it will be better and the facilities in the lab also should improve. In this college there will be many fests as there are many cultural clubs available in the campus. But the fests will be very small compared to the fests in IITs. The Campus Crowd is very good and the connectivity is very nice among the students here, but the campus surrounding is not nice as the campus is located on top of a hill and in the middle of a forest;you have to travel 10 kms to reach the city.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good campus life and placements, but there's a lot of pressure.

detailed_review.Placements: The Placement cell of our institute helps us get placed in various companies in India and abroad. The average placement package is around Rs. 20 to 25 lakhs per annum, with the highest package crossing over 1 crore this year. Many top companies recruit from our campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The well-designed infrastructure of our campus consists of the LHTC for conducting lectures and classes. There is also a Computer Centre for lab sessions and seminars, along with an administrative block for all the main administrative work. It consists of six hostels for students to stay.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is very experienced. They conduct lab sessions to help us gain practical knowledge. The faculty is friendly and teaches us the latest technologies for extra knowledge, conducting regular tests and exams for the continuous evaluation of students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Decent placements, average to good infrastructure, almost no fest culture.

detailed_review.Placements: The 2023-24 placement season at IIIT Jabalpur concluded successfully, with 65% of placed students securing packages above INR 10 LPA. The highest domestic offer reached INR 110 LPA, while the top international package was INR 122 LPA, with three students receiving international offers. The average package for undergraduate students was INR 19.27 LPA, and for postgraduate students, it was INR 12.54 LPA. A total of 284 offers were made during the placement drive, with participation from over 90 companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The faculties are okay, and the infrastructure of the classrooms and labs is pretty much good as it's only been 15 years since the college started properly, so the infrastructure is maintained. Hostels are better than most of the old NITs; three-seater rooms come with enough space, personal wardrobes, and electricity is almost 24/7, though there can be faults. The canteens and other food stalls are there on campus to provide you with your cravings; the mess is okay, not really good but alright. There are around 14 sports clubs, and the clubs are handled by the students; one can choose the sports according to their interest.
detailed_review.Faculty: Both good and bad faculty can be seen, but overall, at the end, it's up to you. The syllabus and curriculum are alright but can be tough to get a good CGPA compared to the rest of the colleges or NITs. At the end of the BTech, one should have a CGPA of 5+ to be eligible for the degree; otherwise, to sit for good placements, one should have around a 7.5 CGPA.
detailed_review.Other: Well, to be honest, there is no culture in the college if you expect exciting fun events happening in the college; this is not the place for it. Most of the IIITs have no culture to host fests and events; although festivals are celebrated on a good scale over here, you can't expect people to come here to perform. NITs are much better to go for that.

college_info.college_name: IIITDM Jabalpur IIITDM Jabalpur Admission 2025: Cutoff, Fees, Eligibility & Application

faqs.question: Can I get admission in IIIT Jabalpur without JEE?
faqs.answer: No, it is not possible to get admission at IIITDM Jabalpur for BTech without a genuine JEE Main score. Applications have to be made through the JEE Main website and through JoSAA counselling for the allotment of seats. Institute fixes cutoff ranks on the basis of minimum marks obtained by candidates, and within the opening rank and closing ranks, admissions are given. Due to the stiff merit-based criteria followed by IIITDM Jabalpur, JEE Main is compulsory for BTech admission.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for getting into IIITDM, Jabalpur?
faqs.answer: The eligibility criteria for the admission in IIITDM, Jabalpur is Class 12 with 75% for UG and graduation with 60% for PG courses. The offered courses are for full time and duration of three- four years. For better understanding refer the below table: Courses Eligibility BDes Class 12 with 75% Exams: UCEED BE / BTech Class 12 with 75 % Exams: JEE Main/ DASA UG ME/MTech Graduation with 60 % Exams: CCMT MDes Graduation with 60% Exams: CEED

faqs.question: How much rank should I score to get IIIT Allahabad?
faqs.answer: IIIT Allahabad accpets JEE Main score for admission to the BTech courses. As per the IIIT Allahabad cutoff 2023, the Last Round closing rank for BTech ranged between 5924 and 9558 , among which Information Technology was the most competitive specialisation. The Round 1 closing rank for BTech ranged between 4817 and 8428 for BTech. So, considering the previous year Round 1 and the Last Round closing ranks, candidates seeking admission to IIIT Allahabad must secure a rank over and above 4800 and 9600 for the General ALL India category candidates. Candidates can refer to the table given below to check out the 2023 Last Round closing ranks for IIIT Allahabad to get an idea of the ranks required for all the BTech courses offered at this institute:

faqs.question: What to do after JEE Main session 2 result?
faqs.answer: After JEE session 2 is completed, only those candidates who are aiming for IITs need to start preparing for JEE Advanced after clearing JEE Main. Those who are above the 98th percentile should start preparing for JEE Advanced as soon as possible. Those below this, between the 95th and 98th percentile, should focus on attempting more mock tests and previous year question papers so that they have a better chance of clearing JEE Advanced

faqs.question: Is IIITDM, Jabalpur good for BTech?
faqs.answer: The students at IIITDM have access to excellent career opportunities, supportive faculty members, and a great campus life. Admissions to BTech are based on the JEE Main entrance exam. The applicants who score well in the JEE Mains will be considered for admission. The programme offers four specializations that span four years, with a full-time tuition cost of INR 5.22 Lakh. The eligibility criterion requires a minimum of 75% in class 12, and candidates must have a valid score in JEE Mains to be admitted to IIITDM. The average package for undergraduate courses in 2023 was INR 21.63 LPA. MHRD decides the MCM Scholarship amount for general and SC/ST students, with the Institute's Board of Governors approving it. Currently, both categories receive INR 1000/- per month, along with a tuition waiver, also known as Freeship. Check the image below to know NIT Jabalpur BTech course

faqs.question: What is the total fee for BTech at IIITDM, Jabalpur?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for BTech at IIITDM Jabalpur is INR 5.22 lakh for four years for full time. The eligibility for the same is class 12 with 75% and the selection is based on the entrance exam, candidates require a valid score in JEE Mains for admission in IIITDM  Jabalpur. college_info.college_name: IIITDM Jabalpur Placements 2025: Highest Package, Average Package, Top Companies

data.title: IIITDM Jabalpur Placement Report 2025
summary: IT sector emerged as the top recruiting sector that placed 66.3% of students during IIITDM Jabalpur placements 2025. 13 international PPOs were offered in 2025 as well. The overall highest package grabbed by students in 2025 was INR 87.54 LPA . The average package received by UG and PG students in 2025 was INR 21.49 LPA and INR 12.52 LPA , respectively.

As per the 2023 report, 3 international offers were made to the 2024 batch. The highest international package stood at INR 122 LPA. Furthermore, the highest domestic package offered was INR 110 LPA. Over 65% of students received salary packages above INR 10 LPA. The average package recorded for the UG and PG courses was INR 19.27 LPA and INR 12.54 LPA, respectively.

college_info.college_name: PES University: Courses, Fees, Admission 2026, Placements, Scholarships

highlights.summary:
PES University is located in Bangalore and is a UGC-recognised university. It has also been accredited by the NAAC with grade A+. PES Bangalore is ranked 101-150 by NIRF 2025 under the 'Engineering' category. PESU Bangalore was earlier known as PES Institute of Technology. PES University offers facilities such as hostels, a library, and various other facilities are available for students as well as teachers. There are various sports and recreational facilities available at the PES Bangalore campus. There are scholarships available for students.
PES Bangalore University offers placement support to students. Many top recruiters such as Amazon, Flipkart, IBM, and Deloitte, participate in PES University placements. PES University Bangalore has several institutes and departments under it. Through these institutes and departments, the university provides UG, PG, and other programmes to students. The university is known for its flagship programmes, BTech and BSc. The major highlights of PES University Bengaluru are tabulated below:
- 101-150 by NIRF under the Engineering category
- 151-200 by NIRF under the University category

table.details:
- 101-150 by NIRF under the Engineering category

- 151-200 by NIRF under the University category

college_info_program.intro:
PES College Bangalore is famous for its flagship BTech, MBA, & BSc courses. Studying these PESU Bangalore flagship programmes at PES University helps to support the professional and personal growth of the students. This is done through a holistic and immersive learning experience. BTech students engage with the corporate sector on a variety of platforms ranging from industry visits, workshops, hackathons, internships, and industry-wide events such as summits, seminars, conferences, and others.
PES University Bangalore MBA is a full-time, 2-year programme, which consists of a core curriculum along with an internship and various elective courses. PES MBA Bangalore is offered in various major specialisations, including Business Analytics, Finance, Marketing, Human Capital, and Operation Management, among others. The PESU Venture Labs, established by the university, funds the business ideas of students, to help them realise their dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Here is more info around PES Institute Bangalore popular programmes:
