PES University Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: There are a lot of clubs technical and non technical which are worth.

detailed_review.Placements: In electronics and communication the placement was not that good compared to CSE till last year. The placements are decent for ECE but then in the last year there is a slight dip in the placements for CSE. The placement ratio is almost the same as before.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is nice and has a lot of extracurricular sports and a lot of eating spots. There are separate places for the hackathons to be conducted. There are a lot of auditoriums. There are separate blocks of each branch like B.Tech B.Com BBA etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the crowd is dependent on the PPTs and the apps not on the lecturers. The PESU app helps the students a lot. This consists of the syllabus for the given semester. If anyone does not understand they can refer to the app for the given topics.
detailed_review.Other: The placement last year for ECE is less but the labs and all the other things are very nice.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: One of the top colleges in Bangalore, with top-notch infrastructure and faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are really good, mainly because the college is located in a city like Bangalore. Compared to other colleges such as BMS and MSRIT, the placements are much better. They have a median package of 18 to 20 LPA for the AIML course, which is likely to increase in the future.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The canteen and hostel facilities are really good. This might be the best thing about the university. The libraries are of top-notch quality. They have great basketball courts, badminton courts, and other sports facilities. The food available in the canteen is also amazing.
detailed_review.Faculty: I feel that the curriculum is up-to-date. But the exams are a bit too hard. There are a few topics that are not necessary right now. Faculty members are all top-notch. They have graduated from prestigious universities and have deep knowledge.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it is in demand right now. If one thing I would like to improve about my course or college. It is the lesser frequency of assignments, which is a bit hectic. The events and fests are also held less frequently. It should be increased to provide a more relaxing experience for students.

reviews.course: B.B.A. LL.B. (Hons.)
reviews.review_title: I'm satisfied with the infrastructure, but it can include more extracurricular activities.

detailed_review.Placements:
So 80-90% of students from my course got placed in top companies, and most of us managed to get jobs through campus placement. 
The highest salary package offered in our course is around 25 to 26 LPA. The average package is roughly around 11-13 LPA.
Some of the top companies include KPMG, Deloitte, HDFC Bank, TCS, DELL, etc.
Around 80-95% students got internships, and some companies offering internships are Wipro and Accenture. 
The roles offered through placement and internships are legal advisory, business development, legal research, and consulting.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Facilities are quite excellent, including Wi-Fi for all and a specialised library for law. 
The quality of the hostel is also nice, but the food is not so much appreciated in the canteen, and it takes a lot of time to get prepared. 
There are quite a few sports games like football, basketball, badminton, etc. Including the top infrastructure courts for each sport.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are quite helpful and are also qualified, where in the majority of them are professors, while some teachers are too strict and do not understand or think from the students' point of view. Semester exams are quite difficult, and the pass percentage is around 80. Students are pressured for on-time submission for PPT research paper, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Completely worth a one-time investment.

detailed_review.Placements: According to our seniors and the placement information given by them, around 85-90% of the people who were eligible for placements were offered internships/placements. The highest package was around 56-60 LPA last year, the lowest was maybe 3.2 LPA, and the average is 12 LPA. The whole MAANG came itself. Everybody who was eligible got an internship. Software Engineer/ SDE-2, Data Analyst, and Data Engineer roles are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is good, but restricted to one device only, and the internet doesn't come on the campus. Classrooms and faculty are all world-class. I'm a day-scholar, but as per my peeps, hostel food is bad. But the canteen food is top-notch. Sports facilities are also top-notch. Gym (10K for RR campus and 6K for EC campus), both are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers respond in seconds to DMs (doubts only). The curriculum keeps changing every semester. College exams are pretty hard, and per the seniors' evaluation system, they are also hard. If you manage to score 7.75 CGPA, you are most likely to land a job above 12LPA.
detailed_review.Other: Intake is slightly higher, but ample space is available on the campus. Scholarships are also available. Please refer to the pes.edu for more details.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with facilities. It has average placements but good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: There are a total of 1,000 students. The package offered is 10 LPA (2024-2025), which a girl got. I do not remember because I did not focus on placements yet, so it is necessary to do internships. Almost 95% of students got internships, and those who couldn't find internships are working as interns in the department itself.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All necessary requirements are available on the campus. All sports equipment is available. There are e-libraries, many classrooms, and proper accommodation of students with LED screens, TV, projectors, blackboards, recorded classes, online courses, etc. All facilities are good and comfortable to use.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in our college are great. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. It's very easy to crack exams if we study properly because marks are divided into very easy divisions. 50 marks are needed to score in the final examination, and the remaining 50 marks can be easily scored in the internals, so exams are very easy.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the BBA course. Co-curricular activities are held here. All fests organised are good and enjoyable.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: You will experience every feeling in this college, good placements, and good friends.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 250+ companies will come to hire students in our college. In 2024, highest package offered by a company was 52 LPA, and average package was 15 LPA. As our course is computer science, more than 700 students apply for placements, and percentage of getting placed is around 60%. They also offer good internship opportunities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college offers a fine infrastructure with high-speed Wi-Fi and a well-built library to study with all kinds of books. A well-maintained canteen, well-facilitated sports field, and medical facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college takes well-educated faculty members and relevant courses that are necessary for industry. They also offer good hackathons so that students can apply their skills to make projects. Exams in our college are tricky, testing our brains and skills.
detailed_review.Other: Joining my college made me handle difficult times regarding curriculum, and I met good friends who are very talented and good at sports and curriculum as well. Our college conducts a fest every year and offers a good scholarship for students from the government, as well as based on their results. Our college conducts sports tournaments and other activities. Also, our college encourages cultural events during Kannada Rajyotsava and during other special days.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: PES: The real reason why to join PES.

detailed_review.Placements: We are not in that stage yet being first years, but I still heard and believe that PES has a different brand when it comes to placement. As of what I heard, the highest package for this year is somewhere around 1.1 crore, and the average package being around 20 LPA. Most of the students, about 80% got placed in Tier 1 and Tier 2 companies, which is a remarkable response. This is also one of the reasons students join PES.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus life, infrastructure, and both indoor and outdoor places are really well-maintained and well-equipped. This is one of the attractions at PES, where we get to see a huge block just for indoor sports and other co-scholastic activities. Here at PES, students get to play sports whenever they want, there are separate fields for different outdoor sports. One of the most attractive being is the cricket ground.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum at PES is updated or changed every year to cope with the real-world developing technology, which is a really good thing. All the lectures are very well-experienced and know the core of the subject, which is really wanted for a student. Also, at PES, we have a method called mentoring, which is a one-to-one meeting every week. It is mentored by the teacher, which is really required in a student's education lifestyle.
detailed_review.Other: Nothing much, but I would like to tell my juniors who are going to join this following year. There is no need to study from day 1, but whenever you study, keep full focus until it's done. That's it, just believe in yourself and keep control of yourself.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is the best private university, but the fee is too high.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% of students are placed in my course. The highest package on our campus is 56 LPA and the lowest is 3.5 LPA. The average package is between 7 LPA to 12 LPA. Companies like Google, Apple, Microsoft, and a few other MNCs etc. I don't know much about internships as I am in my first year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: For first-year students, the hostel is not on campus, but from the second year, the hostel is on campus. The Wi-Fi in both the college and the hostel is good. Facilities in the college are also good. The food is of good quality and quantity. Everything mentioned above is available in the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, and every student is mentored by one of the faculty members. The teaching is good, though not for everyone. The curriculum is relevant, as it is different from other colleges and prepares students for the industry. The semester exams are easy, as they are taught in the classes.

reviews.course: B.Des. in Product Design
reviews.review_title: Worthy for course but not for money.

detailed_review.Placements: There is a good amount of percentage of placements in my course and it is something about 45% of students got placed last year. The minimum package offered was 4 LPA to 15 LPA. Companies from all the streams come to recruit to our college mainly startups and other new companies. Top roles offered was for industrial designers and web designers from our course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is quite good and aesthetically pleasing. To sit and study we have quite big libraries and Wi-Fi is available but sometimes it is a trouble to connect with them. Moreover, we have a boys hostel inside the college campus and a girl's hostel outside the campus which is contact based and it is taken up by a living space company, for girls hostel which includes food and snacks for the hostellers.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here have knowledge but when it comes to explaining how exams need to be done they have a little less clarity. It makes students industry-ready and they would pass interviews to get the lowest of any salary at least. The difficulty level is quite high and passing needs 35% of the marks at least.
detailed_review.Other: I chose design because I wanted to explore what is the importance of design in today's market. Events and fests are conducted in large sizes once a year for one whole week and we have good concerts and a good amount of crowd can be gathered for our concerts and fests.

reviews.course: B.B.A. LL.B. (Hons.)
reviews.review_title: Totally satisfied with infrastructure and faculty, bit disappoint and concerned about placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Compared to other courses and colleges, our college offers less placements for the law department, as it is still in its budding stage. Even though some students secure good placements with packages around 5 LPA, the number is very less. Also, many students chose higher studies over jobs. Talking about internships, every year our college provides opportunities. Last year, internships were offered at the Karnataka Legal Services Authority, and before that, at an NGO based in Udupi. Our department also provides teacher assistant positions as part of the internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Talking about infrastructure, our college has the best facilities. They provide us all we need, including a study area. We have four different libraries, including one exclusively for the law department, which has a collection of even rare books. There is also a three-storied central library and an international-level moot court hall. We have courts for basketball, volleyball, badminton, and tennis, with a highly structured gym facility for students. There are six canteens that provide clean food at affordable prices. The campus includes one boys’ hostel and four girls’ hostels within walking distance.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college provides the best faculty members, and everyone excels in their fields. We have a filtered curriculum with two internal exams and one end-semester exam. We also have presentations, assignments, and research papers for each subject. The syllabus and grading are of moderate to high difficult.
detailed_review.Other: Ours is one of the few colleges in Bangalore that offer the BBA LL.B. Hons course. We have a great student population of around 12,000 across various programs. Our campus is lively, with events happening almost every day. The college believes in practical studies, so every year we have activities like moot court competitions, client counselling competitions, treaty negotiation competitions, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good Placements, Great Exposure, but Super Difficult Exams.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% were placed and the highest package was like 50 LPA and the lowest was 3 LPA. Top companies like Google, Microsoft, Morgan Stanley, and Siemens. The top roles were SDE and data analyst. Core companies were a little less for mechanical and electrical, but for computer science, it was good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel is pretty much okayish, not so good I would say because I have seen my friends complaining about the hostel food and all, and also they are building a new hostel now. Wi-Fi, sports, and games are always there, but unfortunately, I am not in the hostel, so I don't know what exactly is happening there.
detailed_review.Faculty: The professors are well experienced and knowledgeable, and they are very friendly. The teaching quality is good. But when it comes to the curriculum, it is equivalent to IIT, and the exams are very difficult. Pass percentage is around 90%. So buckle up, folks.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: PES University at Bangalore.

detailed_review.Placements: Considering the students' facilities, internships were arranged by the college itself and they would take care of the students in visiting the industries during the period of internship. We were able to gain a lot of work experience but won’t get any stipend. The highest salary provided to the students was 7.5 Lacs in top core companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: PES University is a wide university including a lot of courses. Specialized lecturers are appointed for all the courses. A higher area is allocated for parking and sports courts. The library, with an extensive collection of books by various authors, was arranged in the college library.
detailed_review.Faculty: Based on the scores in your board exams, seats for various departments are allotted. Entrance exam scores also decide the seat confirmation of the students. So, they are offering excellent academics with diverse opportunities for searching. Lecturers strictly follow the specific schedule for classes.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Slightly expensive for studies.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement classes are conducted more frequently compared to academic sessions. Companies like Hyundai, LG Electronics, and Havells visit for yearly placements. Cracking the placement tests of such companies is really hard, so we undergo rigorous training from the first semester itself.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Students from different places come here to study, but there is no partiality or discrimination among them. The main aim of the college is to showcase the talents and skills of the students and help them succeed in their careers. But I'm not okay with the hostel food, so I would give it four stars.
detailed_review.Faculty: Academic sessions do not occur as often as placement training. Students are mostly asked to research and understand the concepts themselves. Tests and internals are conducted before approaching the semester for practice and to correct our mistakes during the main exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: NammaPesu: An Honest Take.

detailed_review.Placements: Last year, in 2024, around 65 percent of the batch was placed. Top recruiting companies include Apple, DE Shaw, Zomato, and Swiggy. Top roles include SDE, Cloud Associate, and even ML Engineer. The lowest package was around 4 LPA, and the highest was around 60 LPA. Almost 50 percent of the students got internships in companies such as Amazon, Apple, DE Shaw, Expedia, Cisco, and so on.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good in our college. We have ample space for parking, playing cricket, football, and pretty much every outdoor sport. We also have 3 cafeterias, as well as a hospital upcoming in our campus itself. There is also a dedicated room for yoga, as well as a gym room.
detailed_review.Faculty: Curriculum is very good in our college and I consider it one of the best in the state of Karnataka. Teaching quality is okayish because some professors are not qualified to teach at all. In semester assessments, they are family-easy and are doable, but end-sem exams are very hard.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, expensive, average placement experience.

detailed_review.Placements: The college has good connections with the industry. The previous batches (before 2023) had a very good placement experience. But currently, due to poor conditions, companies are not hiring as many as they used to. But PES did their job well. Roughly, 70% of the students were placed this year, which is less for PES. Companies like Apple, DE Shaw, Intuit, Commvault, Couchbase, Over, Cisco, etc. visited the campus. 68 tier 1 companies, 77 tier 2 companies, 61 tier 3 companies, and 2 dream tier companies in total.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: PES is the best when it comes to infrastructure. With its new Golden Jubilee block, every facility is available on campus. Everything is well-maintained, including labs, classrooms, libraries, and auditoriums. There’s Wi-Fi available for all students. The quality of food in the newly built Golden Jubilee block is amazing.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well-qualified and helpful. The teaching quality is good. The courses are well-designed, and appropriate study material is provided. The contents of the courses may not be exactly what’s expected in the industry, but they are definitely helpful in strengthening your basics. The semester exams are of moderate difficulty, and the pass percentage is 35%.
detailed_review.Other: This college is too expensive. They charge money for everything. I even had to pay for my own college fest. We also pay for parking, which is outside the college campus. There’s no playground, just buildings. The college was not very good for me, but it depends from person to person. The crowd is definitely huge, and it’s a good crowd, I’d say.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Psychology
reviews.review_title: College has great infrastructure and a good assessment system. It offers great opportunities and is

detailed_review.Placements: Most students from B.Tech get really good placements. One of the top recruiting companies is Bajaj, which also has a best-at-PESU program. In my course (psychology), many students get internships at NIMHANS and university research associate jobs are also given to a few.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of our college is outstanding. We have a four-story library, student hangout spots, and well-developed classrooms with television and air conditioners. We have four canteens that serve North Indian, South Indian, and continental food, along with mouthwatering desserts. Hostels are good too. The boys' hostel is on the university campus and girls' hostel is 2 kilometers away from the university.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified, and some of them have completed their PhD. Our course provides knowledgeable insights, and faculty members ensures we get all opportunities and updates related to our course. Semester exams are MCQ-based and are quite decent. The passing marks are above 30, which is a combination of ISAs, ESAs, and other assignments.
detailed_review.Other: I chose psychology because I love studying the brain and human behavior. The best thing about this course is the link between philosophy and science. Many events also take place here. Last time, in April, singer Shaan came for a concert at our college for the fest Atmatrisha. The marathon (Samarpana) and music event (Chords) are a few of the major events at PES University.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Great placement and infrastructure but scope is there for curriculum improvements.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement percentage : Above 7.5 CGPA students well placed. Package details : the highest package : INR 33 LPA the lowest package : INR 5 LPA Average Package: Around INR 10-12 LPA Top Recruiting Companies : Phones pe Myntra IBM Accenture Wipro cognizant Capgemini Infosys Google etc. Internship details: students with CGPA above 7 were offered internships. Top internship companies same as above Top roles offered: software engineer data analyst consultant developed project manager product manager etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Course/department facilities include high speed Wi Fi across campus. The lab is well equipped with modern tools for practice and learning. Classrooms are spacious and airconditioned with smart boards. The library has an extensive collection of books, journals and digital resources. Hostel facilities include clean furnished rooms with 24/7 water and electricity. The food is hygienic with a variety of options in the mess and snacks available in the canteen. Medical facilities are available on campus at the health center with emergency care. Sports facilities for indoor and outdoor games like cricket football and badminton as well as gym access are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is good. Teachers are helpful, well qualified and knowledgeable offering both academic and practical guidance. The course curriculum is updated and industry-relevant preparing students for real-world challenges with a mix of theoretical and practical exposure. Semester exams are moderately difficult, focused on understanding rather than rote learning. The passing percentage is generally above 85 percent with consistent support for struggling students.
detailed_review.Other: The best things about the course are the updated curriculum, practical exposure, and knowledgeable faculty. Improvements needed include facilities, more elective options, and hands-on projects. Campus life includes events and fests for culture, tech, and sports, with vibrant participation. The campus crowd is diverse and friendly, with an engaging environment. The college is well-connected by public transport and situated in a peaceful location with basic amenities nearby. Merit-based and need-based scholarships are available. Extracurricular activities are available for arts, sports, etc.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: PES is a well-known college for engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 25% of students got placed in the MBA course. Companies like Deloitte, KPMG, EY, PWC, HPE, Epsilon, etc., visit our college. Various roles are offered by companies in operation, marketing, HR, business analytics, and finance. The highest salary package offered is 8 LPA by HPE for marketing and operations. Top roles offered are tax consultant, sales executive, audit accountant, Talent acquisition manager, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is very good. The hostel facility is good. Our college has comfortable seats and air-conditioned classrooms with digital board and speakers. Luxurious canteen facilities are available. There are massive auditoriums. Overall continuing good infrared facility and parking facility.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are cooperative. Most of the faculty members are from corporate and hold doctorate degrees. There are 6 trimesters, 2 ISA, and 1 ESA each trimester. It includes presentations, research papers, participation, case studies, and extra activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great if you are placement-oriented, mediocre if you care about campus life and sports.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement percentage is probably around 60% owing to the fact that the majority of IT companies are not hiring right now. However, in a normal year, this percentage can go up to 75%. The highest package is around the 50 lac range most years, and the lowest is 4 LPA. The average hovers around 11-12 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Zomato, Google. Around 20% of students get internships, and Swiggy, Nokia, JP Morgan, and Accenture are some of the companies that provide internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel is pretty good, food is above average with good Wi-Fi connectivity. Classrooms are spacious with smart TVs, which are used by the teachers. The library is very well-equipped too, with charging ports on every table, and books from all topics, irrespective of whether it's in the curriculum or not, are available. Food is above average in the mess, and canteen food is very good but paid. Medical facilities are below par as there is only a single doctor on campus who isn't present all the time. Sports facilities are top-notch, with basketball courts, a football turf, a badminton court, and a gymnasium as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are 50/50 to be very honest. Some are exceptional while others are mediocre. However, the majority of the faculty members are very qualified and helpful as well. The course curriculum is updated every 2 years, so it is highly relevant. The semester exams are moderate to slightly difficult. The pass percentage is very high though, 95%+.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: All there is to know about PESU.

detailed_review.Placements: About 35% of the students were placed, the highest being 7 LPA and the lowest being 2 LPA. Companies such as Deloitte, Oracle, TVS, and Microsoft, and many more recruit here. All students get internships; in fact, internships are mandatory. Although most students are eligible to get placed, they don't find the placements desirable and feel they aren't worth it.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Since I don't stay in the hostel, I can only provide reviews from my friends. They said the hostel facilities are good and the food is better than the food provided in PGs, to the point at which my friends who stay in PGs come to the college mess to have food. Wi-Fi and classrooms are amazing on the Ring Road campus, and in the city, it's not bad, but it's not comparable to the Ring Road campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is well-trained and knowledgeable. They know what they are talking about, and if you are a keen learner, they can help you beyond what students can even imagine. The college is very much into making industry-ready students who are ready to face the challenges, through the means of making the students write research papers, perform case studies, and they have worksheets which help the students get an insight into the problems faced in the industry. The exams are pretty simple for the BBA program, and there is not much to worry about, although you cannot just walk in and get good marks. Pay attention in class and read the notes, and you are good to go.
detailed_review.Other: BBA is a simple course, yet the main objective of choosing BBA was to get a chance to make connections and learn the dos and don'ts of the business world. I feel there is a need to be a little more practical as to how the courses' teaching could benefit us in real life and try to foster and build creativity through the means of activities and projects, which will also help build our CVs. The top 5 percent of the students get a 50% reduced tuition fee as a scholarship. The next 10% get a 40% fee reduction. You can choose to join various extracurricular activities; both indoor and outdoor activities are available to a good extent, with the facilities being some of the best I've witnessed.

college_info.college_name: PES University Admission 2026: Dates, Eligibility and Selection Fee & Application

admission.title: PES University Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text: PES University admission 2026 is open for UG, PG and PhD programmes. The private university in Bangalore offers 27 degree courses in various specialisations at UG, PG and doctoral levels. programs are offered in the domains of Engineering, Maedicine, Management and Life Sciences. Interested candidates can register online for admission to the course of their choice. Admission in the university is primarily entrance-based. The university accepts national-level entrance exams like JEE Main, CAT, GATE, KCET, etc. for specific courses. In addition, PES University conducts its in-house entrance exam-PESSAT for UG and PG programmes. The university offers courses only in full time/offline mode. requirements of return on investment for the institution's high fee costs are met with competitive placements.

faqs.question: Is PES University admission open?
faqs.answer: Yes, admissions to the UG and PG programmes conducted at PES University are now open. All applicants have to fill their online application form at the university portal and enroll themselves for entrance tests such as PESSAT or any other entrance test valid throughout the country.

faqs.question: Can I join PES University after Class 12?
faqs.answer: If you qualify the eligibility criteria, then you can get admission to PES University after clearing class 12 and apply for the course you are interested in. Most courses would require to have passed class 12 with a good percentage and apprear in the PESSAT entrace exam. After clearing the entrace exam, you should be able to secure a seat for your preferred course.

faqs.question: Is PESSAT compulsory for PES University?
faqs.answer: Almost all courses in PES University can be admitted to if a student qualifies through PESSAT. It is the only entrance exam that the college looks into and includes for eligibility in their courses. However, in such exceptional cases like direct admission allowed for the high achievers, one may be exempted from the PESSAT process. Therefore, candidates have to clear the PESSAT exam with the prescribed minimum cutoff.

faqs.question: How can I get a seat in PES University?
faqs.answer: For getting seats in PES University, the student must satisfy eligibility criteria, give the PESSAT entrance exam, and then provide rank. Once students qualify for the entrance exam, they are short-listed on the basis of available seats and rank for counseling. Counseling will provide them with seats. So, proper application is to be followed and documents should reach the University in the time frame.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at PES University for BTech?
faqs.answer: For admission to BTech at PES University, the minimum eligibility criteria is to pass Class 12 with 50% aggregate in PCM from a recognised board. Admission to this course is entirely entrance-based. Interested students are required to qualify for either PESSAT or state/ national-level entrance exams such as KCET/ JEE Main with a valid score. Students who get selected by qualifying all the parameters of the admission process are allocated seats based on a counselling session.

faqs.question: Is BTech available at PES University?
faqs.answer: Yes, PES University offers a four-year course of BTech at PES University. This course is taught through the Faculty of Engineering across six specialisations. Check the list below:

faqs.question: What is the fees of PES BTech?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for PES University BTech course range from INR 15.2 lakh to INR 19.2 lakh . This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. The fee exludes one-time non-refundable administrative charges. The course fee is the amount that students need to pay to confirm their seat after selection rounds. Besides, there is a registration fee that aspirants need to pay in the start. The application fee is INR 1,200 for BTech course. Candidates can pay the fee via any of the online payment modes.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure of MBA at PES University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for PES University MBA is INR 14 lakh . This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. The course fee is the amount that students need to pay to confirm their seat after selection rounds. Besides, there is a registration fee that aspirants need to pay in the start. The application fee is INR 1,200 for MBA course. Candidates can pay the fee via any of the online payment modes.

faqs.question: How do you get MBA seats in PES University?
faqs.answer: PES University MBA admission is based on entrance exam score. The university conducts PESSAT for a duration of 180 minutes to shortlisted candidates for MBA programme. Besides, PES also accepts national and state-level Management entrance exams for MBA admission. Follow the below steps to get a seat in MBA programme of PES University: Eligibility: Candidates must complete a bachelor's degree with at least 50% aggregate to register for MBA admission. Eligible aspirants can apply with an application fee of INR 1,200 for MBA. Entrance exam: Aspirants need to qualify CAT, MAT, CMAT, PGCET or any other Management entrance exam. Candidates who have not qualified for any of these, can apply for PESSAT conducted by the university. The selected candidates are then called for GDPI round. Counselling: Once the selection rounds are over, candidates can book their seat by paying the course fee.

faqs.question: Is PES University good for MBA?
faqs.answer: MBA is one of the top courses of PES University. MBA course at PES University comprises of a core curriculum, an internship and elective courses over a time period spanning across two years. Students also get to work as an intern as a part of the course curriculum. Talking about the placement, MBA students have got placed in top companies. The median package offered to MBA students during PES University placements 2022 was INR 5.50 LPA.  An upsurge of almost 16% was recorded in the 2022 placement rate of MBA when compared with 2021. Some of the leading companies who were a part of PES Placement drive are IBM, Flipkart, Amazon, etc.

faqs.question: What is the entrance exam for MBA in PES University?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to pass MAT, CMAT, CAT, GMAT, GRE, etc. for getting admission to PES University MBA. Candidates who have not appeared for any of the accepted entrance exam can apply for PESSAT conducted by the university. PESSAT or People's Education Society Scholastic Aptitude Test is conducted by PES University in online mode. It is a three hours test conducted for shortlisting candidates for MBA admission. The question paper incorporate questions of Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and English. There are four different sections wherein Physics and Mathematics sections will encompass 60 questions each and Chemistry and English section will comprise of 40 and 20 questions respectively.

faqs.question: What is the selection process for MCA at PES University?
faqs.answer: PES University MCA admission is entrance-based. Students who pass graduation with 50% aggregate in either BCA or BSc/BCom/BA are able to apply for this course. The selection is done based on a valid score of either PESSAT, which is conducted by the PES University for admission to all of its PG courses. Another way to get admission is through a state-level entrance exam of PGCET. The university selects students who qualify all the parameters of the selection process and allocates seats based a counselling round.

faqs.question: Is MCA available in PES University?
faqs.answer: MCA is a two-year course offered by PES University at the PG level. The admission to MCA at PES University is based on the Karnataka PGCET (Post Graduate Common Entrance Test) followed by Karnataka PGCET Counselling. Candidates can also appear for PESSAT to get into MCA course. Aspirants also need to meet the eligibility requirements for getting admission. Aspirants need to pass graduation with minimum of 50% aggregate in BSc/ BCom/ BA with Mathematics as one of the subject to apply for MCA course.

faqs.question: What is the qualification for MCA in PES University?
faqs.answer: For admission to MCA at PES University, there is minimum eligibility criteria that needs to fulfil before applying for this course. Interested candidates need to pass graduation either with a minimum 50% aggregate in BSc/BCom/BA with Mathematics as one of the subjects at Class 12 or graduation level or in BCA with a minimum 50% aggregate . Final year students can also apply on a provisional basis, subject to meeting the eligibility criteria at the time of admission. The admission to MCA course will be based on PESSAT or PGCET score.

faqs.question: How much is MCA fee at PES University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for PES University MCA is INR 5 lakh . This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. The fee exludes one-time non-refundable administrative charges. The course fee is the amount that students need to pay to confirm their seat after selection rounds. Besides, there is a registration fee that aspirants need to pay in the start. The application fee is INR 1,200 for MCA programme. Candidates can pay the fee via any of the online payment modes.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for BBA in PES University?
faqs.answer: Yes, PES University conducts PESSAT for providing admission to BBA course. The university also considers the marks obtained in the qualifying examination for admission. In order to get admission to BBA at PES University, student need to pass Class 12 with at least 50% aggregate in the respective subjects as per the minimum eligibility criteria. The final selection is done based on the performance of candidates in the personal interview (PI) round, that is conducted at the university.

faqs.question: What is the fee for BBA in PES University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for PES University BBA ranges between INR 6 lakh and INR 10.4 lakh . This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Candidates need to confirm their seat by paying the course fee after completion of the selection rounds. Apart from the programe fee, aspirants also need to pay a registration fee of INR 1,150. Candidates can pay the application fee via any of the online payment modes.

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for BBA at PES University
faqs.answer: Candidates who want to take admission in BBA at PES University must check their eligibility and appear for the university’s in-house entrance exam, i.e., PESSAT. The PESSAT 2025 exam will be conducted online as a computer-based test at the PES University campus and in 44 cities in the country. The university shortlists candidates based on entrance exam scores. PESSAT results are released within three days from the day of the test. Aspirants preparing for the university exam, must check PESSAT exam pattern and syllabus . Aspirants shortlisted based on the entrance exam score are further called for an interview round.

faqs.question: How is the BBA course in PES University?
faqs.answer: BBA is a popular course of PES University. PES University is ranked at 5 in the Outlook-ICARE India University Rankings 2020 and is the only University in Karnataka to rank in the top 30 . BBA is available in four specialisations at PES, namely Business Analytics, General, Sports Management and Hospitality and Event Management. Besides, the university also conducts a placement drive every year. The 2023 placement data is yet to be released officially. However, as per the data fetched from multiple media reports, the PES University overall the highest package offered during 2023 placements was INR 65 LPA and the average package stood at INR 17.99 LPA .

faqs.question: What is the qualification for MCA in PES University?
faqs.answer: For admission to MCA at PES University, there is minimum eligibility criteria that needs to fulfil before applying for this course. Interested candidates need to pass graduation either with a minimum 50% aggregate in BSc/BCom/BA with Mathematics as one of the subjects at Class 12 or graduation level or in BCA with a minimum 50% aggregate . Final year students can also apply on a provisional basis, subject to meeting the eligibility criteria at the time of admission. The admission to MCA course will be based on PESSAT or PGCET score.

faqs.question: How much is MCA fee at PES University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for PES University MCA is INR 5 lakh . This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. The fee exludes one-time non-refundable administrative charges. The course fee is the amount that students need to pay to confirm their seat after selection rounds. Besides, there is a registration fee that aspirants need to pay in the start. The application fee is INR 1,200 for MCA programme. Candidates can pay the fee via any of the online payment modes.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for BBA in PES University?
faqs.answer: Yes, PES University conducts PESSAT for providing admission to BBA course. The university also considers the marks obtained in the qualifying examination for admission. In order to get admission to BBA at PES University, student need to pass Class 12 with at least 50% aggregate in the respective subjects as per the minimum eligibility criteria. The final selection is done based on the performance of candidates in the personal interview (PI) round, that is conducted at the university.

faqs.question: What is the fee for BBA in PES University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for PES University BBA ranges between INR 6 lakh and INR 10.4 lakh . This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Candidates need to confirm their seat by paying the course fee after completion of the selection rounds. Apart from the programe fee, aspirants also need to pay a registration fee of INR 1,150. Candidates can pay the application fee via any of the online payment modes.

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for BBA at PES University
faqs.answer: Candidates who want to take admission in BBA at PES University must check their eligibility and appear for the university’s in-house entrance exam, i.e., PESSAT. The PESSAT 2025 exam will be conducted online as a computer-based test at the PES University campus and in 44 cities in the country. The university shortlists candidates based on entrance exam scores. PESSAT results are released within three days from the day of the test. Aspirants preparing for the university exam, must check PESSAT exam pattern and syllabus . Aspirants shortlisted based on the entrance exam score are further called for an interview round.

faqs.question: How is the BBA course in PES University?
faqs.answer: BBA is a popular course of PES University. PES University is ranked at 5 in the Outlook-ICARE India University Rankings 2020 and is the only University in Karnataka to rank in the top 30 . BBA is available in four specialisations at PES, namely Business Analytics, General, Sports Management and Hospitality and Event Management. Besides, the university also conducts a placement drive every year. The 2023 placement data is yet to be released officially. However, as per the data fetched from multiple media reports, the PES University overall the highest package offered during 2023 placements was INR 65 LPA and the average package stood at INR 17.99 LPA .

sections.heading: Introduction
text: PES University infrastructure features well-equipped research centres, classrooms with modern facilities, an auditorium, a sports complex, and more. It gives cutting-edge facilities to students in the fields of academics and research. In total, the University has 6 campuses. Spread across 30 acres of land, PES University Bangalore gives several facilities to undergraduate and postgraduate students, such as a central library, hostel, labs, health centre, and other amenities. It has a total of 152 clubs, such as Chef Club, Quiz Clubs, Sports Club, etc. To learn more about the PES University infrastructure, check out the video below.
Check out more on PES University Infrastructure in the video below:

sections.heading: PES University Campus Highlights
text: PES University campus is extensive and boasts world-class infrastructure. The PES University Ring Road Campus, located at 100 Feet Ring Road, BSK III Stage, Bangalore, is the main campus of the university. All campuses are self-contained, with excellent infrastructure and research facilities. The university gives both on-campus and off-campus hostel facilities, separately for boys and girls. It features well-equipped labs to help students gain practical knowledge. To meet academic and research needs, PES University also houses a central library equipped with 40 computers with LAN connectivity and other basic amenities. There are common recreational areas designed to foster camaraderie and long-term bonds among students. For those interested in arts and music, the university gives a well-equipped Music Room with a variety of instruments, and a specially designed Theatre Room for practice sessions. Some key highlights are summarised in the table below:

tables.PES University Campus Highlights: 100 Feet Ring Road, BSK III Stage, Bangalore (Main Campus)
Separate hostels for girls and boys
Library, Cafeteria, Hostel, Sports Complex, Auditorium, Research centres, Medical services, etc.

sections.heading: PES University Hostel Facilities
text: PES University hostels are designed to ensure the comfort of both Indian and international students. The university offers both on- and off-campus hostel accommodations.

PES University hostels are designed to ensure the comfort of both Indian and international students. The university gives both on- and off-campus hostel accommodations. All campuses provide hostel facilities separately for girls and boys. The on-campus hostel rooms are well-ventilated and comfortable, available on a single, double or multi sharing basis. Hostels are equipped with basic amenities such as beds, study tables, chairs, wardrobes, and fans, and are managed by wardens. For safety, all hostels are monitored by surveillance cameras operating 24/7. A modern cafeteria, featuring an open kitchen and an airy patio, serves hundreds of students daily and gives both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options. Several restaurants are also available on the campus of the university that offer a variety of cuisines. Additional hostel facilities include:

sections.heading: PES University Hostel Fees
text: PES University hostel fees vary depending on the type of accommodation and the duration of the course. For BTech, the annual hostel fee is approximately INR 5.1 lakh, inclusive of the meal plan. Candidates can refer to the table below for course-specific hostel fees at PES University.

sections.heading: PES University Library
text: The university has a central library with a vast collection of books, journals, project reports, conference proceedings, and previous years' exam question papers. The library gives a peaceful reading space for students and faculty members. PES University library is very spacious and equipped with all the basic amenities, such as reading tables and chairs. The library is segregated into different sections for each faculty to provide relevant information resources for specific streams. It also features a special collection of Gandhian studies, Kannada books, and Rare books. The library collection of PES University is provided below:

sections.heading: PES University Sports Facility
text: PES University has multiple sports clubs, such as Mastodon Basketball for women, PESU Shuttlers for men, PESU Chess Mates, and PESU Super Smash Bros., among others. These sports clubs are run by PES students. Sports facilities at PES include football, basketball, tennis, cricket, badminton, and more. The university also has a fitness centre with plenty of gym equipment to support students' healthy lifestyles.

sections.heading: Places to Visit in & around the PES University Campus
text: Students have many options to explore both on and around the campus. Popular nearby places include Aquarium Paradise, Bengaluru’s top aquatic attraction; ISKCON Temple; Lalbagh Botanical Garden; Bannerghatta National Park; and Bangalore Palace. To learn more about PES University, check out the videos below:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: The PES University Library has an impressive collection of e-resources, e-journals, and e-books which are handy resources that are accessible to all stakeholders students, faculty and researchers. The information is facilitated in different media like books required for courses, periodicals, comprehensive databases that are accessible through the internet.

data.description: PES University arranges faculty development programmes and has experienced faculty members. Several worship and seminars are arranged for students and teachers. The university also conducts student exchange programmes and faculty exchange programmes. The faculty at PES University Bangalore are diploma, PhD, and degree holders. The university also invites guest faculty for various lectures and events.

college_info.college_name: PSG Itech: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: PSG Institute of Technology and Applied Research is also known as PSG Itech was founded in 2014. It is a private institute and is located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. PSG Itech courses are offered to students at the UG and PG levels. The institute is approved by AICTE and CoA and offers courses in Full Time mode. PSG Itech offers a total of 12 courses in streams such as Engineering and Architecture & Planning. Some of the popular courses offered at the institute are B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech and B.Arch and the total seat intake for the available courses is 640. These courses are offered to students across several specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Structural Engineering and Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning. Further, the fee for all these courses ranges between INR 2,00,000 and 2,50,000 and the average median salary is around INR 5,00,000. Apart from this, the PSG Itech campus has a state-of-the-art infrastructure with all the advanced facilities.
