reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons./ By Research) in Animation, VFX and Gaming Design
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with teaching quality.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are too good. Students got placed with high packages, up to 15 lakhs per annum. 85 percent of students got placed through campus selection. The top role offered in my course is 3D design, and many students got placed in that field, followed by editing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Every facility is available for students who want to read. The library has many facilities and books to help students focus. Food quality is above average, and the hostel infrastructure is very good, with all the necessary facilities for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very helpful. Teachers are helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good and helps students learn well. Passing semester exams is not hard if students attend class regularly and focus on the teachers during lectures.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science and Analytics)
reviews.review_title: Very good college for Medical and Computer Science students.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are very good but Sharda is good for CS placements. The top companies are Amazon, IBM Internships are provided in very good schools to almost everyone. The faculty members are very good and always ready to help. A lot of good opportunities are given to us. Perks of being in Sharda is that they also give internships in good NGOs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college's infrastructure is very good and everywhere on the campus, you can find a shop and Wi-Fi. There are many badminton courts. There is a very big green sprawling ground and 3-4 canteens. Courts for badminton, basketball and football grounds are available. They have many auditoriums as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and they teach very well. The syllabus is designed as per the GATE syllabus. The course curriculum is designed for Industry ready. There are very good teachers in our department. They are helpful and knowledgeable and always encourage us to read more. The curriculum was relevant, nice and interesting. The semester exams are very good. Almost everyone passes the exams.
detailed_review.Other: Sharda is known for its campus lifestyle. If you are a good student then you can easily get scholarship.

reviews.review_title: Not that satisfying according to placements, but other things are good.

detailed_review.Placements: There are no placements. Placements in Sharda University is like water in the moon. Companies come, but do not offer higher packages. Also, the companies which came for placements are not related to our field. If you are doing B.Tech, then companies will come for sales and vice versa. Placement is poor according to me.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of Sharda is good, with a good Wi-Fi connection. The labs and the other rooms are clean, but washrooms are not that clean. Sharda has its own hospital which is good for Sharda people. You can play football and volleyball at night or day also. Hostlers enjoy the most in Sharda.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some faculty of Sharda are very good. They are highly qualified and have very good knowledge of everything. But, some faculty are very poor, even they can't speak English properly. They don't have knowledge at all. Overall, the teaching quality of Sharda is good.

reviews.review_title: You should take admission at Sharda University, because the world is here.

detailed_review.Placements: The Placements at Sharda University are good enough. As I belong to the school of technology, it gives us lot opportunities. Many companies visit Sharda University for the placements, and almost every year the placement percentage reach the maximum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Sharda University has a pretty good infrastructure. All the schools are in different buildings. The lecture halls are well maintained, fully furnished, air-conditioned with AC ducts or air conditioners. The infrastructure provides us with a good and friendly environment.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of each department of every school are highly qualified like in a school of engineering and technology. Almost all the faculty are PhDs. The most of the faculty members are friendly with the students, and a few are strict too, but overall it's good.

reviews.review_title: Satisfied with my choice to select Sharda for my graduation.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest packages go for our B.Sc biotechnology students, which was 4.5 lakhs per annum and the lowest one was 2.20 LPA. I don't know about biochemistry honours course because our seniors are the first one to take biochemistry honours in this university. So, I am looking forward to getting better placement so I can able to get a better amount of package.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. All the faculty members are very cooperative. The labs are good always. The lab assistant and lab teachers are very cooperative. They are always there for us for any help related to experiment. Sharda also provides free Wi-Fi for their students by which students can get their assignment and notice related to their exam and result in Sharda mail. Sharda also provides canteen in its campus for a student in their hostel. Honestly, the facilities are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are good, and courses offered by the university is also good compared to other universities which do not provide all courses. The teachers always took students for an industrial trip to show how work is done there and what is the role of this industry related to our courses.

reviews.review_title: Sharda university - don't fall for it.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements offered was decent, and the placement usually depends on how good you performed on your exams. Few seniors got 10 lacs per annum package, and some got more. The average stayed on 4 lacs per annum. To be honest, most of the students graduated without getting any placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
All those banners are lies told to attract the people. The Wi-Fi facility is not even decent. Sometimes it gives you good speed but most of the time you cant rely on college's Wi-Fi.
The computer labs are worst. CPU's are old ones they use in medieval times. Even for the animation and all. They are slow, many of them won't even run properly. The library will allow issuing maximum 3 books at a time, and you can issue it to maximum 1 week which result in constant reissuing every week + failure to do so have to pay Rs. 5 a day fine. Soo hectic. Overall, the infrastructure is better than most of the colleges in Greater Noida. The first year classes were like heaven, and then you are forced to sit for 3 years where you get sloppy, small classes with an unsettling feeling, and no sunlight.
detailed_review.Faculty:
If you work hard a bit, you can outsmart faculty members here. This would give you a slight idea what kind of faculty they have. 
Few faculty members are eager to teach and are knowledgeable, but most of them here are just to complete their PhDs, and they don't care about your future.

reviews.review_title: Experiences of my friends and I.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are good. Especially, if you are from computer science, EC, MBA, and MBBS, then it is quite well, and most of the new companies come to recruit. If you have a high ability, some companies are available for your level, but they recruit only 2-3 students, which is bad. There are no mass recruiters. Overall, it is good for the CSE, EC, MBA and the MBBS courses.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: When asked about the infrastructure, I will rate it 9.9/10. It has an amazing infrastructure. There is Wi-Fi facility, the labs are good, and all the equipment are in working condition. The hospital of Sharda is available, and there is a sports team, so, overall, it is excellent.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is average, not quite bad or good. For some subjects, it is good whereas, for some subjects, there isn't a single teacher who can teach well. So regarding the faculty, I will rate it 5/10, and it is the truth. The faculty ratio is good, but we want the quality, not the quantity in the education.
detailed_review.Other: There are 4-5 cafeterias in the university, some are average, and some are good. There are some stalls at the gate number 4 that provide the lunch. The Lego house is available on the campus which is a good restaurant. A temple, a basketball court, and a badminton court are also available. For playing, a big cricket ground is present.

reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of great and experienced faculty and because of opportunities given to students.

detailed_review.Placements:
The placement ratio is like 2 out of 5 students gets placed. Last year, 50% of students got placed with a minimum package of 2.95 lakh and the maximum package was 6 lakh. 
Companies like Mahindra, Wipro, Steria, BlackRock, TATA Consultancy Services, OYO Rooms, Amazon, HDFC and many others visit the campus for placement. 
Students are offered various kinds of roles, depending upon the interest of the students. Students can get internships in the college itself with an average stipend of 9000, the lowest stipend offered is 6000 and the highest stipend offered is 12000.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
The campus is spread over 63 acres. This 63-acre campus is enabled with Wi-Fi with a maximum speed of 2 Mbps. 
It has 41 labs for research and studies. All the labs and classrooms have air-conditioners in them. The library is not quite big but it has all the books. 
Sports facilities are great too and students can enrol themselves in the sport they like. 
Sharda University has its own hospitals which make it a plus point. The food in the canteen is of superb quality. It even has a Cafe Coffee Day outlet on the campus. 
A total of 3200 students can be accommodated in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The faculty members are great here. They try their best to reach out to each and every student. And, most importantly they are highly educated with experience. The student teacher ratio is 10:1. 
As all the classrooms are smart classes, teachers make great use of them, too. 
Industry exposure is also given to students. 
The curriculum is useful as it helps students to get a job at the end of the course.
detailed_review.Other:
The Crowd is great here, ragging is too strictly prohibited. Students get to meet students from different countries. Seniors are nice too, they are always to ready to help. You will enjoy the next few years of your life for sure. 
The campus is big enough to hangout with friends.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied. Everything is pretty good, its fest, campus life, placements, infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement is good in comparison to last year. Many known companies came to Sharda. Even some backlog students also got placed with good packages. There is a training and placement cell which helps the students to get placed. This year, about 75% students got placed in reputed companies. The maximum package was 9.5 lacs and the average was 3-4 lacs per annum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Sharda is well known for its infrastructure. There is a library which is open 24*7, Wi-Fi in the whole campus, air-conditioned classrooms. Sharda got his own hospital on the campus. Labs have pretty good PCs.
The hostels are very clean and well maintained. There is a little problem with food. It's hygienic but will surely you will miss your home food.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is damn good. They are very helpful and of course, knowledgeable. They have laptops and projectors to teach. They also take us for industrial visits. The faculty of Sharda also helps the students to get placed and try pool drives in other colleges. Some of them share their own hand written notes better than those available on the internet.

college_info.college_name: Sharda University Course Admissions 2026: Eligibility, Fees, Dates, Application Process

admission.title: Sharda University Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text:
Sharda University admissions are entrance-based for most of the courses. The university accepts scores in national-level entrance exams such as NEET, JEE Main, CLAT, NATA, MAT, XAT, etc. for specific courses. Sharda University also conducts SUAT for admission to UG and PG courses. Aspirants have to participate in other selection rounds for final admission. The university offers programmes at UG, PG and doctoral levels. Candidates can apply online for the preferred course.

Check out the following video for information about Sharda University courses, admission, and more:

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission in Sharda University for BTech?
faqs.answer: To get admission to BTech at Sharda University, students need to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria, which is to pass Class 10 with 60% aggregate & Class 12 with a minimum of 60% to 70% aggregate (60% aggregate in PCM Computer Science/PCB for Biotechnology (without any gap between Class 10 & Class 12 and 50% aggregate in Maths). Sharda University BTech admission is entrance-based. Students need to qualify for either SUAT or JEE Main (All India rank of up to 3 lakh) entrance exams with a valid score. The final selection is done based on the score of the respective entrance exam and the performance of candidates in the Personal Interview (PI) round. Those who apply via SUAT scores are required to appear for a PI round conducted at the School of Engineering Technology. Candidates who applied via JEE Main score are exmepted from both SUAT and PI round. For more details around Sharda University BTech fee, the latest dates and other admission related details, click here .

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission in Sharda University?
faqs.answer: No, direct admission is not possible at Sharda University. Candidates are only selected based on their scores in the entrance exam conducted by Sharda University. Whoever wants to take admission to any of the UG and PG courses at the university, must appear for the SUAT entrance exam, which is a common entrance test conducted by the university for admission of eligible candidates in its UG and PG courses. For Sharda University admissions, candidates can also apply via various national-level entrance exams for the respective courses such as MBA and MBBS. For complete details around Sharda University course admissions, click here .

faqs.question: How can I get admission in BTech at Sharda University?
faqs.answer: A student has to have scored 60-70 percent aggregate in Class 12 the Science stream to be eligible to apply to get admission in the BTech programme at the Sharda University. They should be qualified in either the Sharda University Admission Test (SUAT) or valid JEE Main rank up to 3 lakhs. The university also conducts Personal Interview of an applicant of SUAT. The applicants will be required to do the application process online via the official portal.

faqs.question: What is the date of JEE Main 2026?
faqs.answer: The NTA will administer the JEE Main 2026 test in two sessions. JEE Main 2026 application form session 1 is now available. Because the exam will be given twice, the NTA will issue a different application form for the April sessions. According to the timetable, the Joint Entrance Main Exam 2026 will be held in two sessions: JEE Main 2026 Session 1 will be held between January 21 to 30, 2026 and JEE Main Session 2 Exam 2026 will be held between April 2 - April 9, 2026.

faqs.question: Is BTech available at Sharda University?
faqs.answer: Sharda University offers a UG course of BTech for a duration of four years. This course is taught through the Department of the School of Engineering and Technology at the university. The BTech course is offered across nine main specialisations. These are CSE , IT, EEE, ECE , Mechanical Engineering , Civil Engineering, Biotechnology and Digital Transformation. These specialisations are divided into various sub-specialisations.

faqs.question: What is the fee for BTech at Sharda University?
faqs.answer: The Sharda University fee for BTech course ranges between INR 7.8 lakh - INR 11.4 lakh for all the four-years, which is inclusive of the fee for all BTech specialisations. There are multiple fee components added to the total course fee that candidates are required to pay at the time of admission. It includes the Application Fee, Tuition Fee, Hostel fee, Transportation Fee, Hostel Security Deposit, etc. This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Students are requested to visit the official website to get more details on the Sharda University BTech fee.

faqs.question: What is Sharda University MBA cutoff?
faqs.answer: Sharda University cutoff for the MBA course is based on CAT scores. The university offers admission to MBA through SBS. As per Sharda University cutoff 2024, General category candidates aspiring for the MBA (Dual Specialisation) course must have a valid overall CAT percentile of 60 . Also, for MBA Dual Specialisation a sectional cutoff of 60 Percentile each is required. Check out the table below for more information.

faqs.question: Is MBA available at Sharda University?
faqs.answer: Sharda University offers MBA course for a duration of two years. This course is offered across eight specialisations. Apart from this, the university also offers two other courses, namely MBA in Dual Specialisations and MBA (Dual Specialisation) - Industry Integrated (Experiential Learning) courses. All these Management courses are taught at the School of Business Studies at Sharda University. Find below all Sharda University MBA specialisations: Get here all the details related to the Sharda University MBA fee, placements and full admission process.

faqs.question: How can I get admission in Sharda University for MBA?
faqs.answer: In order to get admission to a two-year full-time MBA course at Sharda University, candidates must follow a selection process. The admission criteria is common for all MBA courses offered at Sharda University. Primarily, aspirants are required to fulfill the basic eligibility criteria as per the university's norms. Those who passed graduation in any stream are eligible to apply for this course. Sharda University MBA admissions 2023 are completely entrance-based. The university conducts Sharda University Admission Test (SUAT) for admission to all its UG and PG courses. Candidates are required to appear for this exam and obtain minimum of 35% aggregate to qualify for SUAT. Another way of admission is to apply via valid scores of any other national-level entrance exam such as either CAT/ MAT/ or XAT. The final selection is done based on the performance of candidates in Group Discussion and Personal Interview (GD&PI) rounds conducted at the university's department.

faqs.question: What is the cutoff rank required for admission to MBBS at Sharda University Noida?
faqs.answer: As per the Medical Council of India, for Sharda University 2023 admission to the MBBS programme, the candidates must be NEET Qualified and allotted through UPDGME Uttar Pradesh Lucknow. Sharda University has not prescribed a specific minimum cutoff percentile for admission to the MBBS programme. However, the NEET UG cut off for admission to Sharda University MBBS courses changes each year.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for admission to BBA at Sharda University?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sharda University admission to BBA is entirely entrance-based. The university accepts a valid score of SUAT, which is an in-house entrance exam of Sharda University. This exam is conducted in online mode for admission to all the UG & PG courses of Sharda University. Those who are willing to get admission to this course must pass Class 12 with 50% aggregate in Commerce/ Mathematics as a subject. The eligible candidates are selected based on their academic merit, valid scores in SUAT along with performances of candidates in the PI round. Find here the step-wise application process to apply for SUAT.

faqs.question: Can I do BBA from Sharda University?
faqs.answer: To get admission to a three-year BBA course at Sharda University, aspirants must fulfil the basic eligibility criteria before applying for the course. To be eligible to apply for BBA at Sharda University, the minimum eligibility is to pass Class 12 with 50% aggregate. They should have studied Mathematics/ Commerce subjects in their Higher Secondary School. Aspirants must be proficient in the English language. Every applicant is required to pass the basic eligibility requirement before applying for the course. Click here to know about the detailed admission process for Sharda University BBA course.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at Sharda University for BBA course?
faqs.answer: To get admission to BBA course at Sharda University, candidates are required to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria in the first place. Those who passed Class 12 are eligible to apply for this course. As per the selection criteria, candidates are selected based on Sharda University's in-house entrance exam, i.e., Sharda University Admission Test (SUAT). Candidates are selected based on their scores in the respective entrance exam. The final selection is done based om the performance of candidates in PI round.

faqs.question: What is the fee for BBA at Sharda University?
faqs.answer: Sharda University BBA fee ranges between INR 6.5 lakh - INR 10.9 lakh. This course fee is valid for all the three-years of BBA. The lowest fee is given for multiple BBA specialisations, while the highest fee is applicable for BBA in Finance and Accounting with ACCA, UK course. This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Students are requested to visit the official website to get more details on the Sharda University BBA fee. There are other fee components that are required to pay at the time of admission. These are Application Fee, Tuition Fee, Hostel fee, Transportation Fee, Hostel Security Deposit, etc.

college_info.college_name: Sharda University Placements 2026: Highest Package, Average Package, Top Companies

data.title: Sharda University Placements Report 2026
summary: The highest package offered at Sharda University has increased by 3 times recently. This year, the highest salary achieved by the students of the University stood at INR 1.7 Cr per annum . Earlier, it was INR 40 LPA. The number of recruiters has also increased from 450 in 2024 to more than 600 in 2025. The University has a record of placing 65% to 100% of its students annually.

faqs.question: Is it true that all students at Sharda University get good placements?
faqs.answer: Sharda University has a decent record of placements for courses like MBA, MCA and BTech, etc. The overall placement percentage is yet to be released. However, the University has placed 100% of the MBA and 91% of the BTech students in the academic year 2024-25.

faqs.question: How many recruiters participated during Sharda University placements?
faqs.answer: As per the latest report, Sharda University attracted more than 600 recruiters participated during Sharda University placements 2025 including 150 MNCs and more than 30 Fortune 500 companies. Some of the top recruiters include Amazon, JP Morgan, MU Sigma, Cognizant, etc.

faqs.question: What are some Industry collaborations of Sharda University?
faqs.answer: Sharda University maintains active industry and academic collaborations that foster research and cooperation in growing fields with a few important collaborators of Sharda University given here: Taipei Medical University Curtin University of Technology Tamansiswa University Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology (RMIT) University of Alexandria Telecom Ecole de Management

faqs.question: Which skills do I need to acquire while pursuing B.A course from SBS Sharda University to get my dream job?
faqs.answer: With increasing competition among job seekers, having only theoretical knowledge of BA subjects might not be enough to thrive in the corporate landscape. Students pursuing BA must equip themselves with important employability skills such as leadership, good communication skills, adaptability, time management, etc. These skills would help students get better-paying jobs with broad horizons. Moreover, students can also develop specific industry-based skills that align with their interests. Listed below are some of the skills demanded in today’s corporate world: Digital Marketing HR Analytics Public Administration Foreign Language Graphic Designing Public Relations Management

ranking_section.title: Sharda University NIRF Rankings 2025
ranking_section.description: Based on the rankings from NIRF, Sharda University Noida outperformed numerous other institutes, securing a higher position, indicating that the institute is considered to be doing better in various factors evaluated by the NIRF ranking system. In the 'Overall' category, the institute's ranks have displayed constancy when compared with the previous year's ranking. In 2025, Sharda University Noida's rank is #101 , the same as last year's rank in the 'Overall' category by the NIRF ranking. It has b Based on the rankings from NIRF, Sharda University Noida outperformed numerous other institutes, securing a higher position, indicating that the institute is considered to be doing better in various factors evaluated by the NIRF ranking system. In the 'Overall' category, the institute's ranks have displayed constancy when compared with the previous year's ranking. In 2025, Sharda University Noida's rank is #101 , the same as last year's rank in the 'Overall' category by the NIRF ranking. It has been observed that the institute has displayed a fluctuating trend in the 'University' category as compared to the ranking of preceding years. In 2025, Sharda University Noida fell 1 rank to #87 rank in the 'University' category by the NIRF ranking. Throughout the preceding two years, the rank has oscillated but is currently stable. In the 'Engineering' category, the institute's ranks have shown a fluctuation when compared with the previous year's ranking. In 2025, Sharda University Noida's rank is #101 , the same as last year's rank in the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF ranking. In the 'Innovation' category, the institute's ranks have shown stability when compared with previous year's ranking. In 2025, Sharda University Noida's rank is #11 , the same as last year's rank in the 'Innovation' category by the NIRF ranking. Check out the latest rankings for other ranking bodies and their categories below. As per the NIRF 2025, Sharda University Noida achieved #101-150 rank under the 'Overall' category. It stands on par with well-known institutions such as AIIMS Bhopal and AIIMS Jodhpur under the NIRF 'Overall' category. Check the year-wise comparison of Sharda University Noida with other leading institutes below. sections.heading: Introduction
text: Sharda University Delhi is spread across 180 acres. The Sharda University Noida is CCTV enabled, has residential facilities and various other facilities to students. Some of the other facilities offered at Sharda University include:
Check out more on Sharda University Infrastructure in the below videos:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: The library is housed in spacious halls, the Libraries are well stocked with textbooks, technical journals, periodicals, and reference material for advanced research and development work. Library facilities include a subscription to DELNET and other internet libraries.

facilities.name: Cafeteria
facilities.description: The university adopts special measures to ensure that the students are provided with healthy and hygienic food. There are about 10 cafeterias located in different blocks of the campus. Apart from cafeterias, the campus also holds mini refreshment joints and Vending Machines etc. Sagar Ratna, Amul Milk Parlour, Bikano, Café Coffee Day, Nestle are already running their outlets on the campus. Lego House is a casual dining restaurant serving Fast Food preparations in Sharda University Campus.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: The university provides accommodation to students on a first-come-first-served basis. The hostel offers excellent lodging and boarding facilities to cater to the needs of both male and female students. A wide range of cultural, athletic and social activities are conducted for the merriment of the students. In addition to the various campus hubs of interaction, the common rooms in every hostel are popular for everyday get-togethers.

facilities.name: Gym
facilities.description: A healthy mind resides in a healthy body. A well equipped Air-conditioned gym having latest state-of-art equipment and machines has ensured availability of excellent fitness and health facilities for the students, faculty and staff members of the University. Instructors and trainers are available throughout the day to train the gym enthusiasts. There are two sections in the gymnasiums. One section is meant for general exercises while the other is meant for weight training. There are separate timings for boys and girls.

facilities.name: Shuttle Service
facilities.description: The University runs a fleet of buses to facilitates its students and staff to commute to and from various places in Delhi, Noida and other NCR areas. All buses are deluxe and high capacity. The University provides transportation from villages as well as cities. The transport facility is provided within a radius of 90 km.

facilities.name: Labs
facilities.description: University provides state of the art laboratory facilities to its students, faculty, and staff for carrying out teaching, research, and practical activities. The University has dedicated labs for various disciplines of engineering, medical, dental sciences and mass communication. These laboratories provide practical exposure to multiple subjects and give an opportunity to the students to experiment with what they have learned in classrooms.

data.description: The faculty of Sharda University is educated and experienced. Most of the faculty members are PhD, masters and higher degree holders. Some of the faculty members of Sharda University are as follows:

faculty.faculty_name: Dr Nirupma Gupta Dean, School of Medical Sciences & Research

qualifications: Ph.D (Comp Sci), Jamia Millia Islamia Central University
Advanced Certification in Design Thinking- MIT USA
Advanced Certification in Digital Transformation, Colombia Business School USA
Bachelor of Arts, Sri Venkateswara University, University Rank, Gold Medal
Post graduation in Mass Communication from A.J.K.Mass Communication Research Centre,University of Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi

paragraphs: Sharda University offers financial help to its students through scholarship programs. The scholarship is provided to students with exceptional academic, social, cultural, or personal achievements and offers financial assistance to the weaker section society of students. Sharda University Admission Test (SUAT) is a national level entrance test for admission offered by Sharda University. The University has offered more than 7220 scholarships to its students. The scholarship amount goes up to round 41 Cr. The University has been providing 100% fee waiver for the eligible students.

Recently, Sharda University has released the SUAT phase 1 scholarship. Candidates must qualify the SUAT online test. The last date to apply for the SUAT Test is Feb end. The scholarship is provided first come first serve basis. Candidates can take a look below at the SUAT eligibility and availment of the scholarship:
The scholarship would be calculated as per the below formula:
SUAT Score of student/ Max Score (either 120 or 150).

college_info.college_name: Shoolini University: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Ranking

highlights.summary:
Shoolini University was established in 2009 and is approved by UGC. Some of the courses provided by the university are accredited by NBA and the university is ISO-certified. The university is accredited with a A+ grade by NAAC. The law programmes provided by this reputed university come under the Law Council of India. The university offers UG, PG, doctoral, and other courses to students across Science, Agriculture, and many other domains via 13 schools. Shoolini University offers 150+ UG, PG, and PhD programs across various streams such as Commerce, Pharmacy, Liberal Arts, Journalism, etc. The flagship courses offered at Shoolini are BTech and BSc.
Shoolini University is ranked 503 by the QS World Rankings 2026 in the 'World University' category. According to The Subjects Rankings 2024, Shoolini is the No.1 Private University in Engineering, Physical Sciences & Life Sciences, and 401-500 in Engineering globally. It is 150th in Asia according to The Asia University Rankings 2024. This reputed university has global alliances with more than 250 colleges, organisations, and universities. Internationally, Shoolini University is ranked 587 by the QS World University Rankings 2025 under the 'World University' category. Shoolini is a recognised member of The Institution of Engineers, India, and certified as a Recognised Social Entrepreneurship, Swachhta, and Rural Engagement Cell (SES REC) Institution.
Shoolini University has 250+ alliances with leading foreign universities in the USA, Australia, UK for faculty and student exchange programs. Some of these are the University of Arkansas, The University of Melbourne, Stanford University, University of Massachusetts, Western Sydney University, Lanzhou University, Gachon University, and the University of Naples.
Shoolini University offers scholarship assistance to UG, PG, and diploma courses students. Shoolini University admission is based on merit and national entrance exams. The university accepts national entrance exams such as JEE Main, CUET, NEET, SAT, and others. During, Shoolini University placements, the highest package offered by the university is INR 42 LPA. Shoolini University students are offered hostel facilities managed by the American MNC Good Host Spaces (GHS). The major highlights of Shoolini University are tabulated below:
Shoolini University Highlights 2025

- 401-500 by THE World University Rankings (Global)

college_info_program.intro:
Shoolini University popular programmes are BTech and BSc. BTech students can look for various career opportunities and can become Computer Science Engineers, Mining Engineers, Lecturers/Professors, Construction Engineers, and others. Shoolini University's BTech CSE in Artificial Intelligence (AI) course is known to combine the fundamentals with algorithms, AI concepts, and applications which enables students to learn and contribute to the advancing AI technology and its implementations in the real world.
Shoolini University helps in developing various research skills and ethical considerations. Shoolini University's BSc course students can look for career opportunities such as Pharmaceutical Salesperson, Clinical Research Assistant, Science Writer, and others. Overall the university is one of the best-ranked universities present in India with a global ranking of 39 by the QS Asian University Rankings - Southern Asia category 2024. reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence) (Lateral Entry)
reviews.review_title: A place to relax and win in life.

detailed_review.Placements: It provides an easy package at our university. They confirm 100 percent placement offers. The lowest package starts from 3 LPA but can go up to 18 LPA. The highest package is 45 LPA, and it is none other than a brilliant student of Shoolini University. Our university provides us with a space to work and win.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It has a very beautiful campus, no honking, no noise, it's all greenery, and peaceful with amazing place to sit and relax. Our hostel is so clean with amazing people working to keep it peaceful, with different events like marathon and yoga sessions in the morning.
detailed_review.Faculty: A very beautiful idea of our university to keep only deserving faculty members. Their knowledge is immense, and they are qualified from either an IIT or an NIT. Some of our faculty own a startup providing us with a better place to learn and be good in our careers, so it's the best.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: The university location is great and peaceful.

detailed_review.Placements: 85 percent of students are placed. The highest package offered is 24 LPA, the lowest package offered is 1 LPA, and the average package offered is 5 LPA. Top recruiters are Accenture, Dell, HCL, and many more. 70 percent in AWS, Accenture, Hitachi, and ITC are some of the companies. Roles offered are senior software developer, General Manager, and AI developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, Wi-Fi, computer labs, and library are available. Top-notch classrooms, electricity, a purified water project, and research labs. Facilities in the hostel are good. The quality of food is nice, and a medical facility is available 24 hours a day at the nearby hospital. Sports and games are average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good, and the teaching quality is nice, according to the teacher. The course curriculum is excellent. The university provides industry experts to guide us. Semester exams are easy to pass and score well. 30 percent would be the pass percentage.
detailed_review.Other: High demand in the market and personal interest. More research work and easy accessibility. In all the co-activities, this university is good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: Great infrastructure, updated curriculum, and more. Come if a remote location is not a problem.

detailed_review.Placements: The real data is that about 90% of all students got placed. The top package this year is about 12 LPA, the lowest is about 3 LPA, and the average package is about 6 LPA. There are no very big names among the companies (on-campus), and the top ones are TCS & Infosys. Most students got internships, including many completing their 1st year. Top roles are related to SDE, Data Science, and AI.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The library is pretty big and useful, with a huge set of books. Wi-Fi is amazing (hostel excluded). You'll find exceptions even on roads while you are walking on campus. Classrooms & labs for this course in the AI building are unarguably one of the best in the country, not exaggerating. Hostel rooms are comparable to the ones from dorms of international universities, with the option of attached washrooms too. Even common washrooms are clean all the time as they're thoroughly cleaned several times throughout the day. Mess is pretty, and food is decent too. We have to pay extra for non-vegetarian food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. Teaching quality is mediocre, though some are great, and some are just pathetic. Curriculum is 100% relevant, and not a single subject is useless. If you decide to study sincerely according to the curriculum, you'll be more than ready for jobs. Semester exams are online and fairly very easy, which is a con for me, as most people secure more than 8CGPA. Pass percentage is over 95%.
detailed_review.Other: B.Tech CSE courses and most other courses, in fact, have a very relevant curriculum to today's industries & development. Things that can be improved, though, are some teachers and exam methods. The campus is one of the cleanest in the country, absolutely gorgeous. There is a lot of scope for every type of extracurricular activity. Scholarships are good, with unique ones like the single parents' scholarship. There are several events & fests. Honesty, you most likely won't even go to half of them after 2 months, but it's a good thing, it brings a lot of opportunities.

reviews.course: BCA  in Full Stack Developer
reviews.review_title: Faculty members are knowledgeable and supportive, always willing to help beyond expectations.

detailed_review.Placements: The program offers decent placement opportunities with reputed companies visiting the campus. While core jobs are available students with good internships have a better chance. The placement cell is supportive but its outreach could improve. This time I understand that my college is good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure for my course is well-developed with spacious classrooms, projectors and access to labs with updated equipment. The hostel is clean and secure offering basic amenities like Wi-Fi and laundry though food quality can improve.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course is easy to understand. We have good teachers. They are supportive mentors. Everything in the college is good. They provide good facilities like online learning, are budget-friendly, and create a good environment. The college helps fulfill your dreams by offering a good job package and a better life.
detailed_review.Other: The course is good and value for money.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: Excellent college and satisfied with the faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement is 100%. The college provides good placement facilities and internship programs, including the opportunity to gain experience and knowledge. Different types of top companies appear for placement in different areas of expertise. In the agriculture course, different companies have different approaches.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure for my course is quite good. It provides well-furnished smart classes with projectors. Different labs according to subjects are provided with the necessary chemicals and equipment. The different equipment is provided for good knowledge.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. They are very helpful in gaining different knowledge. They are very supportive and guide the students in every situation. The quality of teaching is very good and easily understandable; the way of teaching is also very good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: This university is good for your overall development.

detailed_review.Placements: The college offers good placements, especially in B.Tech CSE and Biotechnology. They provide a minimum package of 4-8 LPA in this field, and the highest package might be 42 LPA in 2026. So, the placement is good. Companies like TCS and Infosys come to the university. The university also provides internships on campus and out of the university too.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has modern infrastructure, and the hostels provide very good services, especially in my hostel, for village students. The boys' hostel is located off the campus, and the girls' hostel is on the campus. There is 24 hour Wi-Fi service available. The labs are good, and there is an Apple lab in the AI block.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good because they solve every doubt of students in the class as well as on other mediums like WhatsApp. The courses are designed according to industrial needs and modern requirements. For example, I am from B.Tech CSE AI, so I need to be industry-ready always.
detailed_review.Other: Campus life is good, not too good, but there is a good atmosphere. You are surrounded by mountains, and especially in the rainy season, you feel like you are in the clouds. The fests are awesome, especially Moksh, because it's the biggest fest in the universe.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Good college and my college offers a great.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, around 70-80% of the students from our batch are placed. The highest package offered is around 10 LPA. The lowest salary is 3 LPA, and the average package ranges between 4.5 LPA to 5.5 LPA. Top recruiters included TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Capgemini, and Cognizant, along with a few startups.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure for my course is well-developed, with spacious classrooms, high-speed Wi-Fi, and well-equipped labs that support practical learning. The department also has access to a good library with relevant reference materials and digital resources. Hostel facilities are decent, with clean rooms and regular maintenance.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are well-qualified, supportive, and knowledgeable in their respective fields. They are approachable and often encourage interactive learning. The curriculum is updated regularly and aligned with current industry standards, including practical and project-based assessment.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Food Technology
reviews.review_title: It has great labs for research and a peaceful campus.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement cell works great at our university. I heard from my seniors about their placements and they referred to it as good. Some of my seniors got placed in ITC, BON, etc. The average package ranges from 5-6 LPA. The highest package ranges from 12-14 LPA. About 80-85% of students got placed in our university.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is well-equipped with different facilities. For food technology students, there are advanced labs for research. The university itself carries many patients which helps a lot in research programs. It has modern classrooms with Wi-Fi ensuring a seamless learning experience. The hostel is good here. There is an indoor cafe built in girls' hostel. It has different games and modernized infrastructure which make it feel like our second home.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are well-experienced. They are PhD holders. Many of them have international exposure and advanced qualifications. In the curriculum, B.Tech. in Food Technology is four years. In this different aspects of food are taught to us like food reservation, biochemistry, microbiology, etc. The examination is designed in such a way that there are 2 mid-terms and one final end-term each semester and also practical exams.
detailed_review.Other: There are different clubs and societies in college to engage students in different fields like dance, music, drama, etc. There are sports facilities with different stadiums like Milkha Singh Sports Complex and Yuvraj Singh Stadium to play different sports like cricket, badminton, table tennis, etc.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com. Hons.)
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: All students who wanted to get placed got placements. The highest package is 7 LPA, the lowest package is 4 LPA, and the average package offered is 5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are IDFC, Kotak Mahindra, and EazyDiner. Almost all students also got internships in companies like ILP Overseas, with some getting internships within Shoolini.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available are good. The washrooms are clean, classrooms are clean and spacious, and there is good Wi-Fi connectivity. The library is also amazing, open 24/7, 365 days a year, which is the best part. The hostel is also good, with good rooms, good food, and medical facilities available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is also good. The course curriculum is relevant and make students industry-ready. Industrial visits happen to give practical exposure. Semester exams are average to difficult. The pass percentage in college is around 85%.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons) in Zoology
reviews.review_title: Excellent campus and reliable faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: We are in our first year, so no one is placed yet. The lowest is 3 LPA and the highest is 6 LPA. Biocon not yet, but sometimes the package exceeds 12 LPA in some cases. Internships are available for all students according to their courses. Many seniors are placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is very bad. Labs are not that bad. Quality of food is okay-okay. Some of the classrooms are very well-facilitated, and some are good ones. Good medical facilities are available. From time to time, game matches are held, and there is a sports complex with a gym also included in it.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, qualified, and pretty good in their knowledge, and the teaching quality is good. If you are interested or want to do this course, it makes students ready to take the course. Exams are not that difficult. Around 50–60% and guidance is nice.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I want to do it. It's already better, so I don't want to improve anything. All events are so good.

reviews.course: BBA  in Digital Marketing
reviews.review_title: Strong digital marketing program with great placement and scenic campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: The top recruiting companies include HCL, Accenture, and Decathlon. A large number of students secured internships in companies like Genpect, ICICI, and Aditya Birla Group. Internship opportunities are offered to nearly 100% of students with companies like Amazon.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our department has smart classrooms and high-speed Wi-Fi. The infrastructure is modern and well-maintained. Hostel is clean. The mess food is decent with a mix of dishes, and the mess offered good snacks. Medical facilities are available on campus, and sports like basketball, volleyball, badminton, and gym are also provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are quite helpful, well-qualified, and have a good knowledge of the subjects. Course curriculum is updated and aligned with current industry trends. It helps students become industry-ready with hands-on training certification and live projects.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my strong interest in the digital space, content creation, and brand marketing. With the rapid growth of online platforms, digital marketing is a future-proof and high-demand career path. The best things about the course are industry-focused curriculum, hands-on project, certification, and placement support campus life. Events and fests like Moksh, workshops, and Sprint are conducted. The surroundings are good. Scholarships are provided. Different clubs like photography, animal, satrangi strokes etc., are available.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: The environment and atmosphere here are really good.

detailed_review.Placements: Well, not every student gets placed obviously because only those who work for it will land a job or placement. But overall getting a good placement is hard, but our batch i.e., B.Tech CSE is providing bootcamps so that we can improve our skill set. The placement cell is trying really very hard to make sure that there are as many as possible placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Well, I would say that the facilities are fairly good and good Wi-Fi speed, and libraries (study rooms) are there. Overall the facilities are good and the hostel is near campus. It is a very big advantage for me at the very least. Also, there are proper labs in my department.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are many helpful teachers who genuinely enjoy when students ask questions. The curriculum and schedule for exams and other relevant events are provided at the beginning of semester. This allows students to plan their studies effectively and stay prepared throughout the year.
detailed_review.Other: I chose my course basically because of my interest in the field of computer and AI. This is the driving force for me to choose this course.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: After so many days of worrying, I finally found my fit.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements have increased in the B.Sc course over the last few years. Especially in the last few years, EdTech has taken a boom. They prefer candidates in the B.Sc courses as we are given very deep knowledge of our subjects. Also, scientific writing firms have also started employment.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My department is very well equipped with laboratories which are really important for my course. Hostel facilities are at par, especially with the dead stories that I have heard from my older cousins. The hostel has been a relief. Moreover, they do listen. Feedback is taken often and acted upon.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members have immense knowledge of the field, academia, and research. I get to learn so much from them. They are always there to help us learn and solve our issues. The exams are fairly easy but the top scores work really hard. The practical classes equipped us with the skills of the world and make us ready for life.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the university for now.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are pretty average. The average package can vary through the years for my course. Most companies are Biocon and depending on the course can range from Swiggy and other pharmacy companies. The highest paid package is around 12 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: They have high-speed Wi-Fi everywhere but in the AI block they have a speed of around 200 Mbps. The food is average and their cleanliness is maintained throughout the university. All the equipment is present in the labs and maintained by the university.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course is pretty great and industry-centric which makes it easier for students to be industry-ready. Faculty members are very helpful and understanding. They increase creativity with different kinds of tests as well as the course curriculum teaching methods including practical methods.
detailed_review.Other: The best part of the university is the surrounding nature as well as the community and the fest that occurs. There are many fests that help us socialize.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com. Hons.)
reviews.review_title: The college is good, they do provide placements, and everything is amazing.

detailed_review.Placements: A few students get placed, mostly those who wanted to surely get. Many companies came to our college, like EazyDiner, IDFC Bank, and Fitelo. Many students get placed. Internships are also given to students who want to do an internship at the university itself.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure are good. I didn't opt for a hostel, so I don't know about it. There are clean washrooms, a 24/7 library, and good Wi-Fi. The classrooms are clean, and the food is average. Medical facilities are available, which are good. There are sports and games, a stadium, a basketball court, and a gym to stay fit.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and knowledgeable. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. Industrial visits are conducted for a practical approach. The exams are easy, and the pass percentage is around 90%.
detailed_review.Other: Fests and events happen regularly, which is good. I chose B.Com (Hons) as it is a valuable course.

reviews.course: B.A. LL.B.
reviews.review_title: University which provides exploration, development, and a peaceful environment.

detailed_review.Placements: Hello! I am currently pursuing a B.A. LL.B. at Shooini University. In our department, there are nearly 300 students who have secured placements. Since I have only been studying law for a few years, I have noticed that our department has recently begun to actively connect with companies for placements in the corporate law sector. While I am not fully sure about the salary packages offered, the roles available are quite impressive. These include internship programs, moot court competitions, seminars, and projects in legal aid.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities in our hostel and campus I can tell you very briefly. In our hostel there are many facilities such as vending machines, a night mess, and a cafe inside the hostel itself the students have a library, laundry, Wi-Fi, and fruit cart facilities the food is made with proper hygiene and many committee-formed for follow ups in the case of our course in each floor. There is Wi-Fi present and smart classes for better learning and understanding our campus has a beautiful library which is open 24X7.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and qualified. They provide us with knowledge in theoretical and practical knowledge. Our course provides inside and deep knowledge about our field and surely makes us ready. There are reasonable criteria for passing exams that's minimum of 33 per in each subject if you listen to the subject and understand the topic given time then there is nothing hard.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college as it's a recommendation and after searching about this we ended up here so as I said in our department there is not much significance of placement so that can be improved. We do have our fest moksha every year intra-department competition takes many clubs for the students to get along and build a social life. Our university is surrounded by hills and greenery so it's a much more peaceful environment and relaxed. We also have a scholarship program summer internship program in a foreign country.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Shoolini unites global students and inspires personal and professional growth.

detailed_review.Placements: It offers a good package, with an average salary of INR 5-8 LPA and the highest salary at INR 16 LPA. The placement rate is almost 100%. Some prominent recruiters include: Bicon, Cipla, Zydus, Indian Immunologicals Ltd, Bharat Biotech, and BrainWave Biotechnology.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has good labs for every field, which I genuinely like the most, which helps to improve our skills in wet labs. Our hostel provides you with 3-time meals in a day and tea time with snacks, also we have night mess facilities and a cafe.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors help us study every course in a very easy and simple way and help make us ready for industrial jobs as well. The course is not such difficult the university has designed this course in such a way that if a student is consistent, regular, and serious about the studies, that student can easily score good marks. Faculty members are amazing. The faculty members are always approachable and consistently available to support us.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm.)
reviews.review_title: There is absolutely lovely quality of life on campus as well as off campus.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 95% of students get placed on campus. The highest package ranges from 5-6 LPA, and the average package ranges from 3.5-4.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are Cipla, Dr. Reddy's Laboratories, Mankind, Sun Pharma, etc. 100% of students get internships and industrial training.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our department, we have well-equipped labs with all the necessary chemicals and instruments for all the corresponding subjects. Classrooms are equipped with projectors and Wi-Fi for all kinds of studies. The whole campus is equipped with Wi-Fi. Qualities provided by the hostel and management give us the perfect feel of home away from home. The mess food and water hygiene is on point along with the taste of food. We have first aid help on campus and in hostels. An ambulance is always ready for any kind of emergency.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers and even the lab attendants are very helpful and well-qualified for their roles. The quality of teaching is really nice when compared to the vastness of the syllabus and the information. The course curriculum is always updated by the PCI which falls directly under the central government. They make sure the syllabus is always in flavor with the needs and demands of the field. Semester exams are a breeze if we revise on a daily basis while being active listeners in classes. The pass percentage is 55%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course as I am fascinated by medical science and its advancements. I am aiming to get into research work in medicinal development. Right now, I can't muster what I wish for the management to improve but I can always update my reviews.

reviews.course: BBA in Computer Science and Entrepreneurship
reviews.review_title: Shoolini University is a university that gives a wing to the students to fly high in their careers.

detailed_review.Placements: As a student of BBA in computer science and entrepreneurship I can say that my university has given its best to bring out my best. The average package is 4 LPA- 5 LPA and the highest is 12 LPA. As an average student from Dehradun, pursuing my BBA in computer science and entrepreneurship at Shoolini University has been a transformative journey. The university's unique blend of business acumen and technical expertise has broadened my horizons, equipping me with skills essential for the modern business world. The Stanford-inspired SPRINT. The program has been instrumental in enhancing my management capabilities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My hostel is the best weather it is food security and safety. I have never had any problem with my hostels "I am a student of BBA in computer science and entrepreneurship and I would like to express my heartfelt appreciation for the exceptional infrastructure provided by our university. The very qualified facilities, including modern classrooms, well-equipped laboratories, and a vast library, have greatly enhanced my learning experience. The campus's Wi-Fi connectivity and advanced technology have enabled seamless access to resources and knowledge. The comfortable and clean hostels, sports facilities, and recreational space have also contributed to a well-rounded university life.
detailed_review.Faculty: My faculty of FMS is one of the most the friendliest faculty I have ever seen. They are available for everyone whenever students need them. "My schooling university teachers have been incredibly helpful throughout my academic journey. They possess a deep understanding of their subjects and convey complex concepts in an engaging and accessible manner. Their guidance, support, and encouragement have been invaluable, helping me overcome challenges and achieve my goals. They take a genuine interest in their students' well-being and success, often going above and beyond to provide individual attention and mentorship.
detailed_review.Other: Sony University has one of the most beautiful campuses. I am happy to be a good part.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review_title: The college has supportive faculty, a great learning environment, and strong placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Most of my seniors are placed in good companies with good packages. The highest package so far is 42 LPA which is very good for a Bachelors student and the average package is around 4-5 LPA. Students get internships within their 7 semesters and companies hire them based on their skills.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is beautiful. The campus has a beautiful title of green campus. The whole structure is amazing they have good AI labs. The most beautiful place is the YKC. The library is the best place to study and to learn new things. They have a Kindle for students who can access to read and they have laptops to be used on the library premises.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good. They are helping and experienced. The quality of teaching is good and the study material they provide is also good to learn new technologies. The semester exams are medium like we have offline exams for which we have to study a particular portion and then score the marks according.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to get connected with AI which is a new requirement of society. Shoolini helped me with a scholarship on the merit basis of my 12th score they have the criteria to have 75% attendance and a good CGPA to follow this for the whole academic year.

college_info.college_name: Shoolini University Course Admission 2025: Eligibility, Selection Process & Dates

faqs.question: Can I join Shoolini University directly?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can apply directly to Shoolini University by following the application procedures. Admission at Shoolini University is decided by both entrance as well as merit. National-level entrance tests such as the SAT India, JEE Main, CUET, CAT, MAT, and so on are accepted by the university. For particular courses, Shoolini University administers the SU-SAT, its own entrance exam. More than 180 UG, PG, and PhD courses in a variety of subjects are available at the institution, including engineering, management, commerce, pharmacy, law, and more. For the engineering branch, it also provides summit research courses and lateral entrance admissions. In addition, the Shoolini University Centre for Distance and Online Education (SCDOE) provides BBA, BCom (Hons), and other courses.

faqs.question: Does Shoolini University conduct entrance exam for course admission?
faqs.answer: Candidates must sit and appear for entrance examinations as per respective courses. Aspirants will be required based on the course selection criteria. Some courses have exams, others have interviews, and some have regulatory requirements. Students can check some of the course selection criteria from the table presented below:

faqs.question: Is it easy to get admission in Shoolini University?
faqs.answer: Shoolini University admission is both merit and entrance-based. The university accepts national-level entrance exams like SAT India,  JEE Main,  CUET,  CAT,  MAT etc. However, the candidate have to meet the educational qualfication set by the university for various courses. Students can check the selection criteria for top courses:

faqs.question: What is the last date of application form of Shoolini University?
faqs.answer: The online application window to apply for various courses at Shoolini University is open now. Till now, no schedule has been released by the university. Once the application portal is live, candidates can apply online for their preferred course. he admission to most of the courses is based on national level entranc exam score such as CUET UG, MAT/ CAT/ GMAT.

faqs.question: How do I get admission in Shoolini University for B.Tech?
faqs.answer: For Shoolini University BTech admission, candidates must have passed Class 12 with any of the two following subjects: Physics/ Mathematics/ Chemistry / Computer Science/ Electronics/ Information Technology/ Biology / Informatics Practices/ Biotechnology/ Technical Vocational/ Agriculture/ Engineering Graphics/ Business Studies/ Entrepreneurship with a minimum 60% aggregate.

faqs.question: What is the total tuition fee for BTech course at Shoolini University?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for the four-year BTech programme at Shoolini University ranges between INR 5.1 Lakhs - INR 12.8 Lakhs. The candidate also have to pay hostel and one-time fee. Check the table below fo rvlarity: The fee mentioned here is taken from the official sources. Candidates are requested to visit the official website for more detailed fee structure.

faqs.question: Does Shoolini University accept any entrance exam for admission to BTech courses?
faqs.answer: Yes, Shoolini University accepts JEE Main, CUET UG or SAT score for BTech admission. The university conducts SU-SAT for aspirants who have not appeared for any of the accepted entrance exams. After completion of the selection rounds, the university releases a merit list to announce the names of the shortlisted candidates. The shortlisted aspirants are called for counselling and document verification. Aspirants need to pay a course fee to confirm their seat in the university.

faqs.question: What is the fee for B.Tech at Shoolini University?
faqs.answer: Hi, The total tuition fee for BTech at Shoolini University is between Rs 5.1 Lacs and Rs 9.4 lakh. This fee amount is for the different three-year lateral entry or four-year courses offered by the university. The BTech course at Shoolini University offers BTech in different streams, for example, BTech in CSE or BTech in Biotechnology Research. Hence, the fee mentioned is also for different courses offered by the university. Apart from the tuition fee, the students who decide to live in the hostel are required to pay the annual hostel charges which are approximately INR 4.4 Lacs and a one-time admission fee is applicable for all the students. I hope this answer is helpful to you.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for MBA at Shoolini University?
faqs.answer: To be eligible for the MBA programme at Shoolini University, the candidate must complete a bachelor's degree in any discipline with at least 50% aggregate. MBA is a two-year full-time residential course divided into four semesters. Shoolini University offers MBAs in 11 specialisations at the PG level. Admission to the MBA course is based on entrance exam scores accepted by the university. CAT, MAT, and GMAT are the accepted entrance exams. The university also considers a letter of intent and faculty interaction for admission. Data science, marketing, business analytics, digital marketing, logistics and supply chain management, and human resources are among the specialisations available.

faqs.question: Is BPharm available at Shoolini University?
faqs.answer: Yes, BPharm is a four-year course available at the UG level. The School of Pharmacy is approved by the AICTE and part of the Pharmacy Council of India colleges. The university also offers lateral entry to the BPharm course. BPharm course at Shoolini University is accredited by National Board of Accreditation.

faqs.question: How to take admission in Shoolini University BPharma course?
faqs.answer: The admission process for Shoolini Uiversity BPharma (Hons) course varies as per the specialisations candidates wants to apply in. However, admission to all the BPharma (Hons) courses is based on the entrance exam. For the BPharma (Hons) courses candidates must have a valid scores in the national & state level exam: CUET/NEET/JEE/ SAT. Students can also apply for the BPharma (Hons) course without the exams, by appearing for the Shoolini University's multiple choice entrance test, and faculty interaction. Eligibile candidates must apply for the BPharma (Hons) course by visiting the official website of Shoolini University. Once the forms are submitted, candidates are shortlisted based on the exams scores. The university releases a merit lists with shortlisted students name. Shortlisted candidates are invited for the counselling round. During this stage, candidates need to confirm their admission by paying the required fee. The Shoolin University BPharma (Hons) fee ranges from INR 5.2 lakh - INR 6.9 lakh. The fee information is sourced from the official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

faqs.question: What is the seat intake for BPharma at Shoolini University?
faqs.answer: The total seat intake for BPharma course at Shoolini University is around 112. The seats are divided among the BPharma (Hons) and BPharma (Lateral-entry). Find below the seat bifurcation of the BPharma seats below:

college_info.college_name: Shoolini University Placement & Salary Insights

data.title: Shoolini University Placement Report 2024
summary: Shoolini University has collaborations with the National Human Resources Development Network (NHRDN), KPMG, ICT Academy, and London Institute of Banking and Finance (LIBF). It is one of the youngest Universities to achieve an h-index of >140. Shoolini University is ranked No.1 Private University by QS World University Rankings 2025 & THE World University Rankings 2025.

During Shoolini University placements 2024, 100% of BTech , MBA , Journalism & Hotel Management students were placed in reputed companies. The highest package offered during Shoolini University placements in 2024 stood at INR 42 LPA. Further, over 500 recruiters participated and presented over 5,000 jobs to the students of the 2024 batch . The top recruiters who participated during the recent placement drives at Shoolini University included IBM, CITRIX, Cognizant, Polaris, LG Electronics, Genpact, Hughes Systique, Tata Hitachi, Code Brew, Net Solution, Nestle, etc.

faqs.answer: The Shoolini University placement cell manages both placement and internship possibilities for students, as well as coordinates with organisations to arrange campus interviews. faqs.question: What is the fee for B.Tech at Shoolini University?
faqs.answer: Hi, The total tuition fee for BTech at Shoolini University is between Rs 5.1 Lacs and Rs 9.4 lakh. This fee amount is for the different three-year lateral entry or four-year courses offered by the university. The BTech course at Shoolini University offers BTech in different streams, for example, BTech in CSE or BTech in Biotechnology Research. Hence, the fee mentioned is also for different courses offered by the university. Apart from the tuition fee, the students who decide to live in the hostel are required to pay the annual hostel charges which are approximately INR 4.4 Lacs and a one-time admission fee is applicable for all the students. I hope this answer is helpful to you.

placement_faqs.question: What is the fee for MBA course at Shoolini University?
placement_faqs.answer: The total tuition fee of MBA at Shoolini University is INR 5.95 Lacs as per the unofficial source. Candidates are required to pay the course fee after completion of all the selection rounds to confirm their seats. In case, a candidate is unable to pay the fee within the specified time, his or her admission will stand cancelled. Aspirants will also need to pay a registration fee to apply for admission. The fee mentioned above only includes the total cost of tuition and does not include the hostel fee or mess fee.

ranking_section.title: Shoolini UniversityNIRF Ranking 2025
ranking_section.description: Shoolini University has been ranked well by the NIRF under the 'Overall' category. Through the years, the NIRF rankings for Shoolini University indicate the institute's strong performance in crucial areas such as the Quality of Education, Conducting Impactful Research, the Expertise of Faculty members, and Overall Institutional Management. These good rankings not only prove the institute's positive reputation but also highlight its excellence across diverse domains, evaluated against the standar Shoolini University has been ranked well by the NIRF under the 'Overall' category. Through the years, the NIRF rankings for Shoolini University indicate the institute's strong performance in crucial areas such as the Quality of Education, Conducting Impactful Research, the Expertise of Faculty members, and Overall Institutional Management. These good rankings not only prove the institute's positive reputation but also highlight its excellence across diverse domains, evaluated against the standards established by the NIRF. When evaluated against the ranking of the past years, it has been noticed that in the 'Overall' category, the institute's ranks have shown a decreasing trend. In 2025, Shoolini University fell 12 ranks to #101 rank in the 'Overall' category by the NIRF ranking. It has been seen that within the category of 'University' , the institute's ranking has scaled up when compared with the previous year's ranking. In 2025, Shoolini University climbed 1 rank to #69 rank in the 'University' category by the NIRF ranking. This is the second consecutive year that the institute has ascended in the rankings. It is to be noticed that the institute has shown a fluctuating trend in the 'Engineering' category as compared to the ranking of preceding years. In 2025, Shoolini University fell 9 ranks to #101 rank in the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF ranking. Throughout the preceding two years, the rank has oscillated but is currently stable. In the 'Pharmacy' category, the institute's ranks have shown a fluctuation when compared with the previous year's ranking. In 2025, Shoolini University fell 14 ranks to #44 rank in the 'Pharmacy' category by the NIRF ranking. Tabulated below are the rankings and categories from various ranking bodies: According to the NIRF ranking 2025, Shoolini University received #101-150 rank in the 'Overall' category. It holds a comparable status to the most prestigious universities such as AIIMS Bhopal, and AIIMS Jodhpur for NIRF rankings under the 'Overall' category. Check out the year-by-year comparison of Tezpur University with other top institutes: RV College of Engineering Rajalakshmi Engineering College Sharda University Shoolini University Siddaganga Institute of Technology School of Technology Management and Engineering Northcap University

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Shoolini University offers various facilities to the students like transportation, a canteen, auditorium, among others. Shoolini University houses an award-winning library, separate hostels for boys and girls, and more than 100 modern laboratories. Apart from this, Shoolini University also offers sports facilities for students. Shoolini University Solan has a basketball court, badminton court, and others.
Check out more on Shoolini University in the below video:

facilities.description: The Yogananda Library, functioning 24/7, serves as a knowledge hub catering to students' academic needs.

These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 857 published reviews , 573 reviews are verified.

paragraphs: Shoolini University offers over 450 scholarships to deserving students every year. The nature of scholarships can be either need scholarships, merit-cum-need scholarships or merit scholarships. The scholarship will be given as a tuition fee waiver and the amount will range from 10% to 100% depending on case to case.
Given below are the different types of scholarships offered at Shoolini University:

Publication Incentives: Students (not applicable for existing Professors/ Research Fellows of Shoolini University) admitted to PhD program can avail of coupons for their research publications as per below. These coupons can be availed after publishing research/ review papers in Scopus-listed journals only.
