college_info.college_name: Thiagarajar College of Engineering Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with my college for placements and the knowledge gained.

detailed_review.Placements: 31 students out of 140 have been placed till now. The average package offered is 4LPA, and the highest package offered is 14LPA. The top recruiting companies are Wipro, TCS, Caterpillar, Zoho, Embed your, and so on. A few got internships in TCS and Fidelity. I do not know about the roles offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi can be a little bit better, but the classes and rooms near the outer get good Wi-Fi. Lawns, classrooms, and the library possess a good infrastructure and also better facilities. The mess and canteen offer only veg food, which is also good. Our college gives importance to both sports and studies.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very knowledgeable, qualified, and also helpful in studies. Courses are prepared by our college staff, as our institute is autonomous and relevant to the present industry. The pass percentage crosses over 90, and the exams are quite easy to clear.
detailed_review.Other: Events are held often, but the big events occur once a semester. I chose this course because of my interest. Overall, a good college for placements and knowledge.

reviews.course: M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Big college with best placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 85% of students got placed. The highest salary package offered is 12 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 4 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Google, Microsoft, and Adobe. The top roles are Project manager and software developer. Around 70% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel facilities are good and the best. The B.Ed rooms are good with attached bathrooms. Washing machines and gym facilities are available. The canteen is also available. The college infrastructure is good. The classrooms and labs are good. We have a huge library. The Wi-Fi facility is also available. The medical facilities are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are good in our college. All faculty members are well qualified and experienced. They have good knowledge. Their teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are difficult, and the pass percentage is 68%.

reviews.course: Master of Architecture (M.Arch.)
reviews.review_title: I am truly satisfied with this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 75% of students got placed. The highest salary package offered is 18 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Anagram Architects and Sanjay Puri Architects. The top roles offered are interior designer and urban planner. Around 65% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel facilities are so nice at this college compared to other colleges. The hotel food is like homemade food. Bedrooms are neat with attached bathrooms. The college infrastructure is above average. Classrooms are in good condition. Facilities are available. The library and labs are good. The canteen is also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: At this college, teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. Teachers are student-friendly. The teaching quality is good. They clarify our doubts. The course curriculum is relevant to the subject. Semester exams are difficult to pass. The pass percentage is 68%.

reviews.course: M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has good placement statistics.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 75% of students were placed in our course. The highest package offered in our course was 22 LPA. The average package was around 6 LPA. Top recruiting companies were Accenture, Capgemini, Cognizant, etc. Around 40% of students got internship offers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure available for our course were really good. The college has a modern computer lab. Wi-Fi was enabled on the campus. The library was well-stocked with books. Food in the hostel was acceptable. A first aid medical facility was available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors of our college were helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. They teach very kindly. The method of teaching of our faculty members was great. The course curriculum was relevant. It's an industry-oriented course. Semester examinations were moderate.

reviews.course: Master of Architecture (M.Arch.)
reviews.review_title: Best and popular college.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 76% of students got placed. The highest salary package offered was 15 LPA. The lowest salary package offered was 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies were Larsen and Toubro and CP Kukreja Architects. Top roles offered were architectural designer and BIM specialist. 65% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure was awesome. Classrooms were neat and clean. The labs were good. Wi-Fi facility was also available. Many technical and financial books were available in the library. Hostel facilities were so nice. The hostel food was like home-made food. The canteen was also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum was relevant, and it made students industry-ready. Teachers were well-talented and had good experience. They were well qualified and knowledgeable. They were very strict and friendly. The teaching quality was good. Semester exams were difficult, and the pass percentage was 62%.

reviews.course: M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, a good college for career growth.

detailed_review.Placements: 80%-85% of students are placed from our college. Lots of companies come with a maximum package of 20 LPA. Top companies are Amazon, TCS, and Wipro. After getting selected, you will get a job. Overall, the placement percentage is good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Great infrastructure with well-natured surroundings. Labs, library, and classroom facilities are available. This college also has a clean food court and separate rooms for girls to rest. The hostel serves only vegetarian food items. The college also supports students to engage in various sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers and professors are highly qualified, professional, and friendly with students. They help students with placements and higher studies. Semester exams are quite easy to score high marks in. The pass percentage is only 50, so students can pass easily.

reviews.course: M.E. in Power System Engineering
reviews.review_title: Thiagarajar College of Engineering, Madurai, M.E. Course.

detailed_review.Placements: This college is best for placement facilities because many companies are interested in this college. Hiring students is based on interview rounds and CGPA to determine the package. These companies offer packages ranging from 4 LPA to 12 LPA, with 12 LPA being the highest package.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: This college provides many facilities to students, but it does not have a hostel facilities. The canteen food is very tasty and hygienic. The college organizes many sports games like kabaddi, cricket, chess, carrom, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: In this college, faculty members and staff are very strict. Teachers are very good and highly educated. In this course, a total of 6 teachers are allocated, and every teacher and professor has high knowledge of the subject. This course has a duration of 1 to 2 years, including the KT exam.

reviews.course: Discontinued (Oct 2022) -M.E. in Wireless Technologies
reviews.review_title: Review of Thiagarajar College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: In this college, every year, a total of 70% of students are placed in companies with competitive salaries. The highest package is 20 lacs, and the lowest package is 5 lacs. There is a two-year agreement to prevent resignation from the company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure quality of this college is very good, and multiple facilities are provided. The sports committee organizes sports and games tournaments every year, but there is a 100-rupee charge for participation. Medical facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in this college are very intelligent and provide excellent teaching. The faculty is highly educated, with Ph.D. scholars included. The college faculty organizes many rules and regulations for the staff and students. This course is a one. This is a master's degree course and a total of 1 to 2 semester exams.

reviews.course: M.E. in Communication Systems
reviews.review_title: Thiagarajar College of Engineering admission in communication system.

detailed_review.Placements: In this course, total 4 to 5 batches are available and one batch is of 80 students. Many students are interested to take admission in this course because there are high opportunities to get a higher package like 4 LPA to 9 LPA packages. For average students it is based on the skills and communication.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In this course, good facilities are provided for the student like canteen facilities are good because there is high quality of food provided and hygienic food are available. Classroom, labs, computer, drinking water machines, etc., facilities are available. Hostel facility is also good because it is nearby the college and has a very low amount of room charges.
detailed_review.Faculty: Course curriculum is relevant and in this college mostly Delhi NCR University qualified teachers are available. Teacher's teaching quality is very good and explanation is very deep. This course is best for scoring marks because there are no hard subjects in this course.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college is great for the future and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: About 75% of students are placed in our college. The highest package is 26 LPA, the lowest package is 3.3 LPA, and the average package is around 5.5 LPA to 8 LPA. Top recruitment companies like TCS, Accenture, and others visit the campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am working in the radio frequency laboratory, and the infrastructure here is good and neat. However, the network is not good in our college. I like the canteen in our college, the infrastructure is nice, and I can enjoy it with my friends in the canteen and on the campus. I like my campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our college, faculty members' teaching is knowledgeable and of high quality, and teachers are helpful. Our college infrastructure prepares students to be industry-ready. The semester exams are not very difficult. They are average, and the pass percentage is 50.
detailed_review.Other: I like ECE, so I choose this course. If I study ECE, I can be placed in core and software roles.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a top college with good placements and environment.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80-90% of students get placed in the top companies. The highest package offered is 20 LPA, and the lowest package is 3.36 LPA. Top recruiting companies of our course are Texas Instruments, Caterpillar Inc., Honeywell, EmbedUR, Econ, MBIT, etc. Around 30% of students got internship offers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is really good. It has a greenish environment. There is a free Wi-Fi facility around the entire area. It has a well-developed library with an advanced collection of books. Labs have all the needed and recent equipment. A lot of computers are available in computer labs. The hostel is also good. It has a calm environment with free Wi-Fi and neatly maintained toilets. The food is vegetarian only but the taste is excellent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the teachers have good knowledge and experience. They actively take the class and interact with students. The course curriculum is more relevant to make students company-ready. It has covered all basics to advance topics. If we follow the class regularly and write good internal. We can easily clear semester exams. The pass percentage is 93%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because the course covers both core and IT fields. We can choose any field we want, and it's a major advantage in ECE. A lot of scholarships are provided for students who need them.

reviews.course: M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Thiagarajar College of Engineering in ME CSE admission in 2025.

detailed_review.Placements: In this college, many companies are interested and provide the highest salary for average students, like 4 Lacs to 7 Lacs per annum salary. Top recruiters are TNS, Anudip Foundation, Accenture, etc. They also provide internships to the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In this college, there are many infrastructure products provided, and many facilities are available. This college provides many facilities like classrooms, labs, Wi-Fi connections, bathrooms, libraries, etc. This college's sports committee is organizing sports and games tournaments.
detailed_review.Faculty: In this course, the curriculum is very relevant, and teachers are providing the best knowledge. They are very educated and very helpful to the students. This course has a total of 2 years of course duration and 2 semester exams. The exams were very difficult.

reviews.course: Master of Architecture (M.Arch.)
reviews.review_title: Review of Thiagarajar College of Engineering in 2025 admission for M.Architecture Course.

detailed_review.Placements: This college has many companies offering internships, like Karan Grover and Associates, Biome Env. Solutions, etc. Companies also offer internships. In this course, recruitment for admission is LC, 12th Marksheet, Domicile, etc. The companies provided packages like 4 lacs to 8 lacs salary for every student.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In this college, mostly high-quality products are used, and the infrastructure is very good. In this college, they are providing many facilities like fast Wi-Fi, a fan, a bathroom, labs, drinking water, Gymkhana, etc. This college and hostel canteen food is very tasty, but it is costly.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college faculty is very strict but very helpful to the student. This faculty is provided by teachers who are very good and very intelligent because there is a high degree of educational qualification completed and are available. This course is a total of 2 to 3 years in duration; it depends on the college because it is autonomous.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure. Lot of facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: In the final year of civil engineering, over 70% of students are placed in IT and core companies. The highest package is 12 LPA and the lowest is 4 LPA. L&T and Sobha are top recruiting companies. Each student gets an internship with various core companies. The top roles offered include site engineer and plan designer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Each block has separate Wi-Fi routers, clean classrooms with good ventilation, and an updated library system with many core books for every department. Hostel food is purely vegetarian, sustainably sourced, hygienic, tasty, and healthy. The hostel has a playground for each year's students, a canteen for snacks and stationery, and an infirmary.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful with various aspects, including doubts about higher studies, preparation for government exams, placements, and aptitude. Our college faculty is well-trained and experienced. The course curriculum is relevant to company placements. The pass percentage for semester exams is 50%.
detailed_review.Other: I was interested in civil engineering, so I searched for the best college in southern Tamil Nadu and found this one, which specializes in civil engineering. Our college conducts many inter-college and intra-college events. Many scholarships are available for students, including government and alumni scholarships.

reviews.course: Master of Architecture (M.Arch.)
reviews.review_title: Comprehensive curriculum and excellent faculty support in M.Arch at TCE.

detailed_review.Placements: The M.Arch program placement rate in the 2022 pass-out batch from Thiagarajar College of Engineering was very good; nearly 70% got placed. The highest package was around 9 lacs per annum, the lowest was 3.5 lacs, and the average package was close to 5.5 lacs per annum. Some of the key recruiters were Larsen & Toubro, C. R. Narayana Rao, and Architect Hafeez Contractor. About 60% of the students got internships at some good firms like RSP Architects and Venkataramanan Associates. Such practical industry exposure was also given to the students. After the completion of the course, graduates were placed mainly as Architectural Designer, Project Architect, and Urban Planner, which fit well into the skills that the student would have obtained during the course. Curriculum and practical exposure helped students fit into the professions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The M.Arch program offers the student state-of-the-art facilities, including modern design studios, advanced architectural computer labs, spacious classrooms, and is Wi-Fi-enabled to connect seamlessly with the online environment, with a good library that holds a great collection of books, journals, and electronic resources in the field of architecture and design. Hostel accommodations are cozy, with all the basic amenities and a homely atmosphere. The mess and canteen serve meals of good quality with different varieties. Medical facilities on campus are available for the health needs of students. The college encourages an active lifestyle with sports grounds and indoor games. This helps both in academic and personal development, thus making it a well-balanced campus for the students.
detailed_review.Faculty: The M.Arch program of Thiagarajar College of Engineering is run by some of the highest-quality faculty members who have extensive experience in their work. The faculty members are helpful and approachable. High quality of mentorship can be seen. Quality teaching in the curriculum includes a mixture of theoretical and practical know-how that responds to contemporary architectural trends. It has a very wide and relevant curriculum. Skills such as sustainable design, urban planning, and the application of sophisticated software were emphasized. Semestral exams are moderate testing because they are applied in conceptual understanding and practical application. Students graduating from the program will surely be ready for industry tests. Pass percentage range between 85% and better, signifying that the programs were carried out in a relatively supportive learning environment and strictly to the very high standards of academics. In any event, the curriculum and guidance by faculty members would make people ready for careers in architecture.

reviews.course: Master of Architecture (M.Arch.)
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with the good teaching faculty and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Exactly 70% of students got placed in my course. The highest salary package offered is 14 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Tata consultancy services and Infosys. Around 65% of students got internships. We are offered major roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is average. The classrooms are in good condition and the facilities are very good. The Wi-Fi facility is available in our college. The books are available in the library. The labs are well equipped with air conditioning. There is a canteen where you can buy some snacks.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty in our college is friendly. The teaching quality was good. Many faculty members are well-trained. They have a lot of experience. They are very good at communication skills; they always clarify our doubts. The course curriculum is relevant. The pass percentage is 60%.

reviews.course: M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The study methods they teach us and the lab.

detailed_review.Placements: The semester is not a problem for the placement in M.Sc. Trigo, TCS, HCl, and many more companies visited our college for internships and interviews. The highest is 12 Lacs per annum. 75 percent of students get placed during campus interviews. TCS, Trigo, HCl, and many more companies offer placement internships and job offers. The minimum salary offer is 350000 per annum, and the maximum salary offer is 12 Lacs per annum. The jobs and roles offered are mostly developers and junior developers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Annual Day and Sangamam are the annual fests. Sangamam is conducted for 3 days for the whole college. Sports Day is also conducted every year. There are NCC and various clubs in our college. Each department has separate clubs and activities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members are caring, with Dr. as a suffix on their names. Highly educated faculty members you meet in this college. Some newly appointed teaching staff are not that good at teaching, though they are caring with N numbers of degrees. Practice makes man perfect, and as time passes, they will improve their teaching style for sure.

reviews.course: Master of Architecture (M.Arch.)
reviews.review_title: One of the popular college and best placements.

detailed_review.Placements: The top recruiting companies are Google, Amazon, and ITC. Above 80% percent of students get placed. The highest salary is 15 Lacs per annum. The lowest salary is 3 Lacs per annum. The top roles offered are project architect and design architect. 60% of students got internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is good in this college. We have Wi-Fi connection, lab rooms, and a big library. The classrooms with comfortable branches for all students. We have a big playground at our college. The hostel facilities are good. Our college has a canteen; it has a good canteen. The medical facilities are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty in our college are friendly. All faculty members are well-trained and well-educated. They have 5 to 8 years experience. They have a lot of knowledge. They are fabulous and they clarify our doubts. The course curriculum is relevant to the subject. The semester exams difficult in this college. The 65% is pass percentage.

reviews.course: M.E. in Structural Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college and best teachers.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 63% of students are placed in our course. The highest package offered is 20 LPA, the lowest package offered is 3 to 5 LPA and the average package offered is 7 to 9 LPA. Recruiting companies are HCC, GAAR, DLF, etc. Internship opportunities are more for the skilled students in our course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have good facilities in our college. We have Wi-Fi facilities with high range on campus. There is an extensive library and a multitude of classrooms. The library has all field books. The labs are well-equipped with all equipment. The hostel facilities are good and the hostel mess food is not much good. But canteen food is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are knowledgeable but some have less experience in teaching. The teaching quality varies. While all the teachers are Masters in their respective subjects, many lack the patience and skills they make us ready for industry. The semester exams are hard to pass. Pass percentage is 78%.

reviews.course: M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Hostel life is filled with lots of fun and happiness on weekends.

detailed_review.Placements: From the 5th and 6th semesters, students are eligible for campus placements. Companies like Godrej, Hitachi, and other MNCs visit and make numerous offers. I do not know the exact number, but the highest package offered in my 3rd year was 22 LPA, and the average is 12 LPA. It depends on how many students have applied for campus placements. This year, the percentage of students who got placements from the total who applied was 70% to 80%. I have completed my degree and am preparing for a government job.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Apart from studies, there are many extracurricular activities like chess, tennis, volleyball, basketball, and football. Interested students can participate, and they also conduct tournaments within or between other colleges to showcase their talents. All festivals are celebrated with our traditional methods, such as wearing ethnic costumes, decorating classrooms, playing games, etc., which was truly amazing and appreciable.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty-to-student ratio is 1:10, and the faculty is very easy to approach, especially in the Botany Department. Although the humanities have far more students than us, their faculty is also easy to approach. Dr. Sunil Dheeman was my favorite because he was so humble and always cared about students. There are 6 semesters, so there are 6 theory exams and 6 practical exams. Hardly 1 or 2 students fail.

college_info.college_name: University College of Engineering, Adikavi Nannaya University: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: University College of Engineering, Adikavi Nannaya University was founded in 2006. It is a public institute and is located in Rajahmundry, Andhra Pradesh. University College of Engineering, Adikavi Nannaya University courses are offered to students at the UG and PG levels. The institute offers courses in both Full Time and Part Time modes. University College of Engineering, Adikavi Nannaya University offers a total of 10 courses in streams such as Engineering and IT & Software. Some of the popular courses offered at the institute are B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech and MCA and the total seat intake for the available courses is 447. These courses are offered to students across several specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Information Technology and Mechanical Engineering. Further, the fee for all these courses ranges between INR 32,600 and 1,40,000 and the average median salary is around INR 4,30,000. Apart from this, the University College of Engineering, Adikavi Nannaya University campus has a state-of-the-art infrastructure with all the advanced facilities.

summary.college_name: University College of Engineering, Adikavi Nannaya University

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has good teaching faculty and good environment.

detailed_review.Placements: In Adikavi Nannayya University College of Engineering, this year more than 300 students joined for B.Tech. The minimum package is 3 LPA, and the highest package is 10 LPA. 80% of students got their internship at Infosys. Our top recruiters are Infosys, Deloitte, and ISRO.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good, and it's developing too. The library and Wi-Fi are very good. The hostel food is superb, and the hostel environment is too good. In summer, it may have some electricity problems for just 1 or 2 hours. They conduct cricket matches every month, and there are sports meets where we have many opportunities to reach the state level or national level.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful in preparing us for our placements and also for the GATE examination. The teaching of the syllabus is very good. The curriculum is relevant to the present generation, but we as students must prepare ourselves for industry purposes. They only teach the subject, not all other things.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: University College of Engineering, Adikavi Nannaya University review.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college placement is very low, and the percentage of placement on campus is 10% because no more drives will happen in my college. For 2016, 2017, these batches got placed on campus. The highest package is 7LPA offered by TCS, and the lowest means 3LPA. Recruiting companies like TCS, Infosys, Google, Accenture, and Cognizant are the companies for my course. Software development roles, IT services, data analysis, data scientist, web development, and software testing roles are offered in my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has computer labs with internet access for my CSE course. The classrooms are good for lectures, and the bathrooms are clean. The hostel does not have Wi-Fi, and the mess is run by the students. The food is sometimes good, but sometimes it is the worst. The college has a health center with a doctor, nurse, and medicine. There is a large ground on campus where an indoor stadium is planned.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty in my course were qualified and knowledgeable. Some of them were very student-friendly. They would teach part of a topic, and we were expected to learn the rest on our own in preparation for industry. Semester exams were easy for those who were in good with the faculty. As an autonomous college, our faculty corrected the papers, and the pass percentage was 80-90%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I'm interested in software engineering, and it pays the highest salaries. My college has a convention center where events are held, including a lot of events for Sankranthi. There is also a club called BIT Club, organized by MCA, that conducts a lot of games. B.Teach students get fee reimbursement and vasati devena for hostelers get money from the government. My college has a peaceful atmosphere because there are a lot of trees planted around it.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: College review by an experienced person.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements at our college are very few. The highest package is 3.6 lacs per annum. In this department, maximum core-side opportunities are there. Nearly 5% were placed on the college campus. Every student can do internships, and everyone gets opportunities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It has good infrastructure for library, for sports, the facilities in hostel are good, and there is Wi-Fi in hostel, library, NTR convention centre, and most of the Wi-Fi is present in college. There is a canteen for food separately, for xerox, for juice, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: While conducting exams, the faculty is very strict. During semesters sometimes the paper is easy, sometimes it is tougher. Before semesters, the faculty complete the syllabus fully, and they help to clear the doubts during semesters anytime.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)( Part-Time)
reviews.review_title: Super excellent  course for IT field

detailed_review.Learning Experience: I have learn for communication skills and soo many skills for good job in IT
detailed_review.Placements: Placements be the super
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are very good and friendlyness
detailed_review.Course Support: MCA will be the best course for IT jobs

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A college with a good environment.

detailed_review.Placements: In our University College of Engineering, according to the current situation, placement drives are very low, and even very low packages in top cities. Even more students are getting placements, but are unsatisfied with their degrees.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good, providing high-speed internet, modern-level computer labs, and a peaceful campus. The hostel food is very good and has a peaceful environment. Nice activities and a clean campus. There is a fast response from higher authorities. A great library is placed in Adikavi Nanna University campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: College of Engineering, according to Computer Science engineering, qualified teachers are taking classes. According to your group curriculum changes, semester exams are difficult. As per government regulations, follow the syllabus, class held on working days.
detailed_review.Other: Students' fees are not satisfying due to the high cost of living in cities.

faqs.question: How can I get into University College of Engineering for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
University College of Engineering has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility M.E./M.Tech Candidate must have passed B.E./B.Tech. in relevant stream and obtained with the above mentioned marks (45% in case of reserved category candidates) from an AICTE/UGC approved institution recognised by the Government of Andhra Pradesh as equivalent thereto.
Final year appearing students may also apply on provisional basis. B.E. / B.Tech Candidates who have passed Diploma in Engineering or any other examination recognised as equivalent there to, from a recognised Institute/ University, Andhra Pradesh/ Telangana are also eligible.
Candidates who have appeared in Diploma in Engineering and who are awaiting their results can also apply on provisional basis.
Candidates should belong to the state of Andhra Pradesh/ Telangana.
Candidate should have completed 16 years of age as of 31st December of the year of admission (2023).
There is no upper age limit. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

highlights.summary: J. K. Institute of Applied Physics and Technology, Allahabad University, is located in Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh. Established in 1949, it is a public institute. J. K. Institute of Applied Physics and Technology, Allahabad University provides 7 UG and PG courses in 3 specialisations, namely Computer Science Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering and Computer Science. Theses programmes are offered in both Full Time mode. B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, B.Sc., M.Sc. and MCA are some of the courses offered at J. K. Institute of Applied Physics and Technology, Allahabad University. Some of the streams in which these courses are offered include Engineering, Science and IT & Software. The total fee at J. K. Institute of Applied Physics and Technology, Allahabad University ranges between INR 1,18,000 and 3,60,000. J. K. Institute of Applied Physics and Technology, Allahabad University has a student intake of 122 for all the courses. The average median package at J. K. Institute of Applied Physics and Technology, Allahabad University is INR 7,28,571. J. K. Institute of Applied Physics and Technology, Allahabad University offers all the infrastructural facilities to students.

summary.college_name: J. K. Institute of Applied Physics and Technology

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: All About Our College JKIAPT.

detailed_review.Placements: Currently, I'm in my final year. There are no placement opportunities available. If you have good technical as well as soft skills, you can try off-campus placement. Only some companies come here. They give around a minimum of 4 Lacs to 10 Lacs. In our previous batch, some students were placed with a package of 6 Lacs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is only one building of our institute. The campus is not so big. All the labs are not well maintained. The campus is fully Wi-Fi. You have to submit your ID card details in the ICT cell. Then you get a unique ID in your email. Hostel facilities are not so good. There is a cleaning issue so much. In the 1st year, you get a sharing room with two people. After that, in the 2nd, 3rd, and 4th year, you get a single room for every student. In that room, you have a Bed, table and a chair. You carry your own light and fan for your room.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers are very well-qualified. If you have any doubts, the teachers are always available to resolve your doubts. All the teachers are very supportive. Our syllabus is very old and not sufficient for industry readiness. It is only suitable for college exams, not real-life projects. Our semester exams are not very hard; they are of median level.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Poor placement and poor faculty. Come to this college if you only want to crack GATE.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement rate is very low in the college, around 30 to 40 percent. The main reason is that most students prepare for GATE examinations. The average package in the college is 5 LPA. The highest package is 8 LPA, and the lowest is about 3 LPA. The top recruiters are HCL and TCS.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very poor. Although the building looks good from the outside, there is only a single building in the name of infrastructure. In some classrooms, the AC is not working. The Wi-Fi is available in the college, but it is off for 5-6 days a month. The library is very small. The SRK hostel, given to B.Tech students, is the worst hostel of Allahabad University. The quality of food is okay.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members do not have proper knowledge of their subjects. Only a few are very good, but most just read from the book during lectures without knowing how to teach. The course curriculum is relevant for GATE preparation but lacks in terms of placement. The semester exams are easy, but the evaluation process is very tough.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Nice infrastructure and environment.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 13 students were placed in CINIF TECHNOLOGY in 2021–22 in my course, and my branch has a total strength of 45, so placements from my branch are good. We can say that around 40% were placed in my course. The highest package: 13 lacs in HCL, the lowest package: 3–4 lacs from Infosys-like companies. Average package: around 8.5 lacs through the data provided by my JK Institute placement cell. Top recruiting companies like: HCL, TCS, INFOSYS, Indiamart, Morgan Stanley, Microsoft, DRDO Labs, ForceBolt, and Emphasis. Internships: Aside from placement, students are also selected for various student-oriented programs like Google Summer of Code (GSOC), Google Develops Student Club (GDSC), Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Engage, etc. Campus placements are offered for students graduating with B.Tech, M.Tech, and also promote higher studies in the same institute as well. Our college is best known for securing double-digit ranks in the GATE exam. In GATE 2024, HRITHIK ROSHAN, our 4th-year senior, got AIR 98 in GATE EXAMINATION 2024.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Spacious and comfortable hostel rooms: JKIAP provides separate girls and boys hostels with rooms designed to provide a home-like environment for students. Well-equipped labs, the institute's labs specific to various fields like physics, basic electronics, digital electronics, and computer programming, are equipped to support practical learning. Classrooms are fully air-conditioned with a 100+ student capacity. Our college has a computer lab with high-end computers and a high-speed internet connection. Our college also has a Wi-Fi connection with 100 Mbps speed. Library with 10,000 books and journals. Hostel Mess is quite good and provides food at cheap rates. For one month, it is around 2500 rupees per month. Medical facilities are also available, like a proper hospital for college students. Sports like basketball, volleyball, cricket, football, hockey, and kabaddi are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified and knowledgeable, but their way of teaching is not good; they know the content but don't know how to convey the message to the student, but they are helpful in projects and all. Our course is totally based on the GATE exam syllabus, and for getting placements, our syllabus makes students industry-ready for off-campus purposes. Semester exams are not that difficult; there are two types of exams held per semester, like mid-semester and end-semester, and hence the semester is finished. Mid-semester exam of 20 marks and have to get 40% marks to get passed. The same goes with the end-of-semester exams; they are 60 marks, and we have to get 40% marks to get passed.
detailed_review.Other: I have an interest in electronics from the 10th standard, so I chose this course. In the future, I have to go for higher studies, so in the GATE exam, electronics students are very few, which results in getting a good rank at low marks as well. Electronics is the future for India. Lab quality should improve in our institution, as should good professor recruitment. Events like: BBL-cricket tournament, sweat, football, AVIRBHAV: cultural festival. Campus crowd: 300+. Connectivity is very good, with a railway station only 6-7 kilometers away. The campus surrounding it has so many trees and no traffic sound. Scholarships like the UP scholarship, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: No placement, poor campus life, bad infrastructure and very bad faculty.

detailed_review.Placements:
The placement status in college is very poor. Only 5-10 percent student get placed only. The highest package is 12 LPA, the lowest package is 4 LPA and average package is 8 LPA. There is very few companies visit college like TCS, HCL
A very few students get online internship only.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very poor. Only a single building is the whole college. The building is very old. The hostel is also very poor. Double rooms are given in the first year and after that single rooms are given. No fans are provided in the room. The quality of the mess food is poor.
detailed_review.Faculty:
A very few teachers are well qualified and teaches good. But most of the teachers are not well qualified and have very poor teaching skills. The course curriculum is not industry based it is mostly related to GATE. The semester exams are not very difficult. 
4 questions have to be solve out of 6 or 7. 
40 percent is passing percentage.
detailed_review.Other: If you want placement don't come to this college. Fest is very poor. Campus location is good but not good campus life.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of J. K. Institute of Applied Physics and Technology, Allahabad University.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 30% of students got placed in our course. The highest salary package offered is 8 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Mahindra, Pep Coding, TCS, etc. Around 5-8% of students got internships in DRDO, Indian Space Research Organisation, etc. A few students got internships in private companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is not much good. Our college provides us with all facilities. All professors have been educated in foreign universities. Many assistant professors are always in the lab. The lab facilities are good. The hostel facilities are good. The food served in the mess is not much good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and knowledgeable. They teach us very well. Assistant professors conduct classes. Students have to score 6 CGPA to pass. Semester exams are not much difficult. If we study well, then we can easily score good marks.
detailed_review.Other: Many events and fests are held in our college. Extracurricular activities are held in our college. They organise various trips.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: You can join here if you want to take CSE or ECE at a low rank.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements were decent, with an average salary package of 8.5 LPA in 2021. Many students prepare for GATE examination and go to IITs, IIITs, NITs, and other top institutes in India.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available 24X7. Our classrooms are air-conditioned. A library is available, but books are limited. You can also go to the central library of University of Allahabad. This college is located on a minor campus. Hostels are quite good, but the mess food is not good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. In the first year of the course, most teachers were guest faculty. The course is relevant and mostly based on GATE syllabus. Semester exams are conducted well, but results get delayed.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: A Complete and Honest Review of JK Institute by Mr Sagar Biswas.

detailed_review.Placements:
Well, if you have an interest in coding then you will get a good package. Last year our senior batch size was around 65 students (CSE+ECE). Among them all those students who had an interest in coding they are placed. Around 35-40 students seats for placement and among them,  13 students get on-campus placement and 7-8 students get off-campus placement. So,  50-60% of students are placed (All the students who were interested in coding are placed, most are from B.Tech CSE). On-Campus Top Recruiters:
IndiaMart - 8.5LPA - 5 Students
HCL - 6LPA - 5 Students
Monotype - 12LPA
Force bolt - 6.3LPA
Emphasis - 4LPA
Mutual Mobile - 7LPA
You Can SEE the highest and the lowest Package. The average Package is around 8LPA
It's a good average but where the other students are of that batch? - Lots of students score very well in GATE (AIR 17, AIR 160, AIR 260, etc.). And doing M.Tech from IIT and NIT. - Some of them get into IIM for MBA through CAT
- And others are just preparing for UPSC (UP, Bihar Students are mad in the name of government job)
In-short: 50% Placed + 30% doing M.Tech from IIT/NIT + 5% doing MBA + 10% Preparing for government Job + 5% are doing baap ka Business
But It's sure if you want a job and does some coding after 4 years surely you will get a good job.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
1. First of All High-Speed free Wi-Fi facilities all over the campus and Hostel. You can learn everything from the internet. 
2. Double room for the first year and from 2nd year, Single Room for every B.Tech student. Rooms are with a table, chair, B.Ed and almari. 
3. Full Green Beautiful campus. 232 Acre Campus Size. 
4. All the classrooms are with ACs and Projector for students. 
5. There is a large auditorium for functions and events for students.
detailed_review.Faculty:
1. Teachers are knowledgeable but you have to do self-study. 
2. Some teachers use PPT and projector for teaching. 
3. The course syllabus is designed just like any IIT syllabus. 
4. There is a Coding Club name E-Code. Students learn and compete here. 
5. Exam pressure is not so much. As in any other engineering college, students only study from exams before the exam day.
detailed_review.Other: Computer Science and Engineering is the top demanding course in the world right now.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: If you want to prepare for higher studies then only select this college .

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package offered was of 16 Lacs and the minimum is 4.5 Lacs The average is 8 Lacs. For ECE students, internships are provided by the college in government organizations like DRDO, AAI, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The department has different types of lab but equipment are not so good. We have been provided with AC classrooms and computer labs etc. The hostel condition is average as this is government hostel the condition is not so good, but the price is less mess food is average.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well qualified and knowledgeable they are ready to help you anytime. The course is very relevant if you want to appear for the GATE exam. Mid-semester exams are easy but the end semester is a bit tough because MNIT Allahabad Sets the paper, which is of a difficult level.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this because the fees is very nominal.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is average for the fee charged.

detailed_review.Placements: The average salary package offered is 8 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Indiamart, HCL, etc., visit our college to hire students. As this college has only two streams in B.Tech i.e computer science and engineering, and electronics and communication engineering. Only 40 student intake in each branch, due to which not many companies visit here. But approximately all students get placed on-campus or off-campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In this college, classrooms are well qualified. It provides fully air-conditioners in classrooms with a smart board. As the institute is very old, the laboratories are newly built both for electronics and communication and computer science. Wi-Fi is enabled 24X7 with high speed. The food served in the mess is not good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified but students should be aware of their studies, and no one is going to torture them for enhancing their skills. Exams are not hard, and straight-forward question is given. But at the end semester, students have to study for passing the semester.
detailed_review.Other: As the campus is under University of Allahabad. There is a good environment, not as an engineering college, but as Allahabad is a coaching hub, and students will feel a competitive environment. The campus is beautiful. Cultural fest i.e Avirbhav, club-code i.e coding club, robotics club, Manasvin i.e cultural club, and photography club are conducted in this college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: Our college is decent with decent placements.

detailed_review.Placements: The average salary package is 8.5 LPA. Around 60 to 70% of students are placed and many have secured good ranks in the GATE examination. Some students go for off-campus placements. Placements are not too good for ECE. The highest salary package is 13 LPA. Companies like HCL, TCS, Wipro, and India Mart offer placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College has a decent infrastructure with good hostel facilities and 24 hours Wi-Fi on the campus and hostel. Air-conditioned classrooms, many books in the library, and fully air-conditioned computer labs are available. Electronics labs are good. Mess food is decent. Medical facilities are not available. Canteen is not available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most teachers are highly qualified, knowledgeable, and helpful. Semester exams are easy. The syllabus is based on the GATE examination. Seniors are very helpful. Disadvantage of this college is, that it is the department of the university of Allahabad, so the process of work is late.
detailed_review.Other: There are clubs like E-code a coding club, robotics club, manasavin club a cultural club and Entiwicklerx. There are fests like avirbhav, exuberance, swat cup, and techno cup.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: No hope of any on-campus placement.

detailed_review.Placements: Jk Institute of Applied Physics and Technology is an esteemed institute present at the Department of Electronics and Communication in Science Faculty, University of Allahabad. However, its glory has remained till past only. Present situation, education is good with highly qualified professors and staffs but with no hope of any on-campus placement. Here you can get immense time for preparation of any further studies as attendance is not an issue here generally. Overall its good place to study but not for those who are looking at lucrative placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Rooms are spacious and with 24/7 facilities of water, electricity and Wi-Fi. You have a medical facility present at AN Jha hostel where any student and get medical diagnosis at free of cost. You have indoor sports facilities and also huge grounds for outdoor activities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified, with above the scope knowledge of their respective fields. You can get immense knowledge but you have to be determined with facility as they can be very moody. Debate semester exams are tough and you have to be prepared for applied knowledge based questions. Practicals are also very tough here and you have to attend labs frequently to understand the concept.
detailed_review.Other: I chose Electronics and communication branch in B.Tech here, and its very knowledgeable course with highly skilled professors. Here, you have 2 major events in a year. Exuberance and Avirbhav. In exuberance, first year students present tier skills in co-curricular activities and have to perform many events under the guidance of tier second year seniors. It is observed by third year students and final year students give immense support and knowledge to tier fellow juniors. Avirbhav is an annual event managed by final year students and every student have to take part in some kind of activities. Professors, staffs and special guests watch the performance in the final evening of the event and it have huge impact on every students college life.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college with good faculty members and better placements.

detailed_review.Placements: It is a good college. Placements in our college are above average. There is a good opportunity for rising students to get a job. The highest salary package offered is 6 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 3.5 LPA. The average salary package offered is 5 LPA. Top companies like BSNL, Infosys, Wipro, etc., visit our college for placements. Almost all students get an internship at the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus life is very good. Electronic and computer labs are available, so there is a good culture for each student. Seniors behave well with every first-year student. Free Wi-Fi facility is available in the college or at the hostel. The quality of the food served is so much better than anywhere.
detailed_review.Faculty: In college, every professor is old and aged, which is a huge problem for every student. Every time, our college conducts class tests, assignments, etc. All teachers are well-qualified and experienced. The course curriculum makes the students industry-ready and on a good path. Semester exams are not so hard.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because it is a professional course of bachelor of technology and it has a master of technology MCA and BCA. Basically, it has 6 subjects every semester, and subjects change every semester. It is a 4 years course with eight semesters. You can get this college through JEE exams, and in each, there is a minimum rank or cutoff that you have to clear. The campus surroundings are positive.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: It is a good college to choose CSE branch if your rank is not very good in JEE Mains.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college is not good for placements. I got this college at a rank of nearly 50,000. Many students prepare for UPSC, and many of us qualified in UPSC also. Students who are good at coding get placed easily. The average salary package offered is nearly 4 LPA, and the highest salary package offered is nearly 10 LPA. If your rank is not good and wants to study further like M.Tech, then you can choose this college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities provided here are quite good. It is a lush green campus with a fresh environment. We interact with many students here and get views of every student. Classrooms are also neat and clean. Wi-Fi facilities are not available in the hostel rooms, but you can get it when you are near to the academic building. The food served by the mess is also quite good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are very helpful and well qualified. Their teaching style is very good, and they try to teach the topic differently and quite easily. They are always ready to help us in every aspect. The course curriculum is relevant and is arranged in such a way that it is easy to understand.
detailed_review.Other: If you want to study further and wants to make a career in CSE, then you can choose this college even though if you do not have a good rank in JEE Main. You can also prepare for UPSC here because the environment is quite good to prepare for UPSC.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good engineering college, and I like it.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 50%-60% of the students get placed every year from our college. The highest salary package offered here is 6 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 3.5 LPA. The average salary package offered is 5 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are BSNL, Infosys, Wipro, etc. About 30% of the students get internships from our course. Top roles offered here are web builders and in the robotics.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is superb, and the facilities provided here are the best than the facilities available in other colleges. Our college is located in the main city, and Wi-Fi facility is available for 24 hours and is free. Classrooms are equipped with air-conditioners, and the library facilities are provided. I really liked the food served in the canteen, and it makes me feel good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members here are experienced and are PhD holders, and there are some guest faculty members. Their way of teaching is very modern, i.e., projector-based. The course curriculum is related to GATE syllabus so that students can easily prepare for it. Students are made here industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because our college is known for electronics course in the past, and top companies of India visited here. Even ISRO visited here for recruitment as well as for internships. Main events organised here are Swatcup, Techno Cup and Avirbhav.

The best thing about our course is students got brilliant minds and knowledge to perform and learn things easily through labs. Some events are conducted here like Swat Cup, Techno Cup, and the biggest event is Aribhav.

I wish regular classes should be decreased so that a student can make himself motivate to self-study rather than relying on teachers. Some events held are Swat Cup, Techno Cup. The biggest event of the college is Avirbhav.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am not much satisfied as it has a good infrastructure but poor facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Maximum of 80% of the students who appeared for placements got placed in the last year. Many companies did not arrive in the college, but companies which arrived are bulk recruiters. IBM, Infosys, Wipro and TCS are the main recruiters of our college. There are no criteria for internships from the college, but they allow us to do an internship. They also inform students about companies to take part in internship programs. Students are mainly placed in railways and software companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has old buildings, but they are well-efficient for students to study. Labs and library facilities are not that good, but our college provides good Wi-Fi and big classrooms for students. Hostel facilities are very poor at our college. I am also a hosteller, so I know about the condition. Quality of mess food and medical facilities is poor.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are good and have good experience and knowledge in teaching in their subjects. Quality of teaching is also good and innovative. The curriculum is relevant as they are providing the facilities to become a good engineer and get all-around knowledge in subjects.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because electronics is a well-demand course in present times and near future. More development of technology in chips for understanding at a lower level should be provided so that students can easily understand the subject. You can get a full scholarship of your fee if you are economically weak. Cultural fest named Avirbhav is organised every year for students of our college by the most senior students and college authority.

college_info.college_name: VJTI Mumbai: Courses, Admission 2025, Fees, Placements, Ranking

highlights.summary:
Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute, also known as VJTI was established in the year 1887. Initially the institute had 2 departments, namely Sir J. J. School of Mechanical Engineering and Ripon Textile School. Under the under the Engineering catgeory, VJTI Mumbai is ranked 101-150 by NIRF 2025.
The institute is affiliated with the University of Mumbai. It offers various UG, PG, Diploma, and PhD courses to its students. These courses are provided across Engineering and various other streams. There are several facilities in the institute including hostels, smart classrooms, labs, library, etc.
The alumni of VJTI Mumbai are placed in prominent companies. The institute provides scholarships as financial assistance to its students. The flagship courses of VJTI Matunga Mumbai are BTech and MCA. The institute also offers placement assistance to the students.
The major highlights of VJTI Mumbai are tabulated below:

college_info_program.intro:
VJTI Mumbai popular programmes are BTech and MCA. BTech is provided in several specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and others. VJTI Mumbai University tries to provide students with a comprehensive knowledge of the various principles of Engineering with a multi-disciplinary approach. Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute Matunga Mumbai tries to establish global leadership in the Technology field and hence develop competent human resources.
VJTI Mumbai MCA students are placed in top companies such as DE Shaw, Amazon, LinkedIn, Texas Instruments, Capgemini, and others.Check out the video below to know more:
