Candidate who have a BE/ BTech degree in the relevant discipline with a minimum 50% aggregate (45% marks in case of SC, ST and Category-I candidates from Karnataka) are eligible to apply for admission to the M.Tech programme. BMS College eligibility criteria for MBA programme is a Bachelor’s degree with a minimum 50% aggregate (45% marks for SC, ST and Category-I candidates from Karnataka) taken together in all the subjects including language subject. Candidate who have passed the Bachelor’s degree examination with Mathematics/ Statistics/ CS/ Computer Application/ Computer Programming/ Business Mathematics or Business Statistics as one of the optional subjects with a minimum 50% aggregate (45% aggregate for SC, ST and Category-I candidates from Karnataka) can apply for BMS College of Engineering MCA admission . sections.heading: Introduction
text: BMS College of Engineering is located in Bangalore, which is about 39 km from Kempegowda International Airport. The nearest metro station is National College Metro Station, located on the Green Line and approximately 1.9 km from the campus. It is about 5 km away from KSR Bengaluru City Junction. BMS College of Engineering is spread across 11 acres of land. The college not only provides academic excellence and the best faculty, but also a vibrant infrastructure so that students can learn and grow with comfort and safety. The campus offers all the basic as well as additional facilities required by students, faculty and other staff members.

sections.heading: BMS College of Engineering Campus Highlights
text: BMS College of Engineering has a vast campus spread over nearly 11 acres of land. The area encompasses several buildings - old and modern, with well-laid roads, playgrounds and lawns. Apart from this, the hostel complex on the southern side of the college campus consists of various hostel blocks. The campus has a beautiful and well-stocked library. Read further to know more about the vibrant campus and its facilities:
Campus View:
Academic Block:

tables.BMS College of Engineering Campus Highli: Classrooms, Hostels, Library, Sports Facilities, Hospital, Data Centre, Counselling Centre and more

sections.heading: BMS College of Engineering Hostel and Residential Facilities
text: BMS College of Engineering (BMSCE) provide accommodation to the students wishing to reside in the hostels. The hostels are an independent unit, and the internal administration is taken care of by the council of wardens and the hostel management. The hostels are located on the southern side, adjacent to the college campus. There is a separate hostel office and mess within the hostel premises. The mess has a centralised modern kitchen and a separate dining hall for boys and girls. The layout of the hostel complex is given below:

HOSTEL UNIT-I: MAIN HOSTEL : The Indian Main Hostel for male students is spread across an area of 39,000 sq. ft.. The area is comprised of the ground floor and two floors with a small basement. The hostel can accommodate 150 pre-final and final year students in single rooms. The facilities in this hostel include

GIRLS' HOSTEL BLOCK UNIT-II : This block accommodates female students and is spread across an area of 42,586 sq. feet. The hostel has a ground floor plus 5 floors, consisting of 125 fully furnished rooms. The rooms at this hostel are offered on a twin-sharing basis. The warden's office, visitors lounge, reading room, kitchen and dining hall are located in the basement. The hostel also has:

Hostel Unit-III : This unit is built to accommodate 288 boys. It has a plinth area of 5,611.29 square meters. The hostel area comprises a basement, ground floor and 5 upper floors. All the rooms at this hostel are on twin twin-sharing basis. The basement offers a vehicle parking facility. Each floor consists of three wings, and in each wing, there are 8 rooms for a total of 24 rooms per floor. Each student is provided with a wardrobe, study table, chair, cot and overhead book-storing cabinet. The facilities offered at the hostel include:

Hostel Unit-IV : This hostel was built to accommodate 117 girl students with a plinth area of 5402 sq. meters. It comprises the basement, ground, and the upper three floors. The hostel has rooms on a triple-sharing basis. There are 9 rooms on each floor, and 10 rooms on each of the upper floors. In the basement, there is a warden's office and a visitors' lounge, along with other amenities. The amenities available at Hostel Unit-IV include:

Main Hostel (Phase 1) : Main Hostel (Phase 1) is a newly constructed hostel exclusively for female students. It has a plinth area of 539 sq meters. It comprises of basement, a ground floor and three upper floors, and can accommodate 76 girls. This hostel has all the rooms on a twin-sharing basis, with attached washrooms. All the rooms have high-speed internet connectivity. The basement is meant for vehicle parking. Each student is offered a wardrobe, a study table, a chair, a cot and book book-storing cabinet. The building has a solar water heating system of 3,000 LPD capacity. Each floor has 10 rooms, out of which nine rooms are twin sharing and one room is single occupancy. Main Hostel (Phase 1) offers:

Main Hostel Dining Block : Apart from these hostels, two separate dining halls are situated for boys and girls. These can accommodate 180 boys and 60 girls at a time. These dining halls have both vegetarian and non-vegetarian centralised modern kitchens. The basement of these dining halls has stores for provisions, vegetables and other commodities. On the western side of the dining block, a branch of Allahabad Bank and an internet centre are located. The board room of the hostel committee, office of the Indian hostels, Secretary and Warden’s chambers and the residence of the assistant warden are located on the first floor of the dining block.

Multi-Purpose Hall : Situated in the hostel complex is a multi-purpose hall, which is used for conducting meetings, seminars, functions organised by the management, cultural programs, farewell functions, get-togethers, food arrangements for examiners, etc. The hall has a stage and can accommodate about 200 people. A green room is attached to the hall, and the required furniture and audio systems are equipped there. This hall is used exclusively for conducting auditions and musical events during UTSAV.

sections.heading: BMS College of Engineering Hostel Life
text: The hostel at BMS College of Engineering provides an advantage to the students to be friends with fellow students from across the globe. This gives them an exposure to different religions, languages and customs of countries. The hostel promotes living in a community, which leads to all-around development of the personality of the hostelite and will go a long way in fostering world-class citizens. The BMSET Hostel is a place to grow and evolve one’s personality. The hostel at BMS College of Engineering offers safety, security, comfort and confidence. Moreover, the general menu of the hostel is decided by the hostelite representatives selected by the hostels. On all the important festivals, special menus are introduced. The mess facilities make sure that food is the least of the worries for students. One of the salient features of the Hostel is its care for students.

sections.heading: BMS College of Engineering Library
text: BMS College of Engineering has a library located in the central place of the campus, and is prominently housed in a big and spacious building with a floor area of 4200 sq. meters. (45200 sq. ft). BMSCE Library aims to seek, create, communicate and preserve knowledge and understanding and carries out this mission in a unified community. It is an information hub of the academic community and a centre of unbridled intellectual inquiry. The objectives of the library are: to develop a collection of documents (both in print and electronic form) and keep them up to date by meeting the needs of users of today and tomorrow; to support the academic programmes of the parent institution by providing necessary reading materials; and to provide individual and group guidance to readers in making maximum use of Library resources. The library also encourages students to develop skills for self-education, which can sharpen their intellect and contribute to their personality development. It also supports teaching staff in their teaching and research activities. User education programmes are conducted to train students and staff in making effective use of Library resources.

The library offers both online and offline resources in abundance. The digital library offers online access to 15 e-resources on Science and Technology for studies and research. It also has access to 7529 e-journals & 25908 e-books on various branches of Science, Technology, Engineering &, and Management. The library also subscribes to 145 National and International printed journals . It offers access to Provide access to all streams of Question Papers through Digital Software–TechFocuz via Intranet. Moreover, it has subscribed to NPTEL lectures that are streamed using the Internet.

sections.heading: BMS College of Engineering Sports Facilities
text: BMS College of Engineering offers top-class sports facilities to its students with an aim to evolve a holistic approach to the all-round betterment of human resources through a harmonious blend of body, mind and spirit. The institute offers a vast number of indoor and outdoor sports facilities, such as: Archery , Badminton , Basketball , Chess , Cricket , Football , Handball , Hockey , Judo , Kabaddi , Kho-Kho , Netball , Powerlifting , Swimming , Tennis , Table Tennis , Throwball , Volleyball , Softball , Yoga , Wrestling and Weight Lifting . The institute has been top-ranked by the VTU for securing the highest points in Sports & cultural Competitions/tournaments. The institute provides special training and coaching from external professionals for the following college teams.

BMSCE provides Indoor & outdoor stadiums and well-equipped gym facilities with International standards. The Majestic Indoor Stadium at BMSCE is the result of the Physical Education Director's vision and hard work, and also the encouragement of BMS Management. One of the missions of the institute is to develop and provide modern amenities in line with the Global standards in the field of sports.
Sports Complex:

sections.heading: Places to visit in & around the BMS College of Engineering Campus
text: BMS College of Engineering is located near many beautiful attractions, such as the Bull Temple , Dodda Ganpati Temple , and Lalbagh Botanical Garden . Gandhi Bazar is one of the vibrant markets for shopping sprees. In Basavanagudi, there are numerous historical temples, parks, and unique eateries which students can explore in their free time.

facilities.description: The library is aesthetically located in a central place near the main entrance of the college and is very prominently housed in a big and spacious building with a floor area of 2625.67 sq. m. The Library has tie-up with INDEST Consortium, access to IEL online resources is available in the library. Library receives 165 numbers of technical journals and arranged area wise in the periodicals section. Library also has access to IEEE, ASCE, ASME, ACM digital library, springer link, and science direct periodicals in digital form through INDEST consortium, IIT Delhi. The library is automating its services and activities through “LIBSYS” package, which gives search facility, reservation facility among other things for the users.

highlights.summary: Bharati Vidyapeeths College of Engineering, is located in Mumbai, Maharashtra. Established in 1990, it is a private institute approved by AICTE. Bharati Vidyapeeths College of Engineering provides 11 UG and PG courses in 8 specialisations, namely Computer Science Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Chemical Engineering and Instrumentation Technology. Theses programmes are offered in both Full Time mode. B.E. / B.Tech and M.E./M.Tech are some of the courses offered at Bharati Vidyapeeths College of Engineering. Some of the stream in which these courses are offered include Engineering. The total fee at Bharati Vidyapeeths College of Engineering ranges between INR 1,98,198 and 3,47,824. Bharati Vidyapeeths College of Engineering has a student intake of 696 for all the courses. The average median package at Bharati Vidyapeeths College of Engineering is INR 5,31,091. Bharati Vidyapeeths College of Engineering offers all the infrastructural facilities to students.

detailed_review.Placements: Students need to get an average CGPA of a of 6.5 to apply for placements. No backlog students can apply for placement. Many companies like Tech Mahindra, Chegg India, Justdial, Acmegrade, and Capgemini visit every year. Companies recruit students for internships and jobs as well. My plan after the degree is to secure a good placement in a good company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college is really good. It is located in a clean area with all facilities available around. Cafes, gyms, and turfs are nearby. College is well-equipped with Wi-Fi, and the library also has Wi-Fi and numerous books for the academic year.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members and staff for our course are good as well. They look after each student well and guide them on time. Two terminal examinations are conducted every semester, apart from external and internal assessments. The difficulty level is moderate to high for exams.
detailed_review.Other: I heard of this college through my family. It's worth joining for an AIML degree. Internships and courses for further studies, along with placement opportunities, are offered by companies. Communication-building courses, aptitude test training, and mock interviews are also conducted in the college before actual recruitment. Events like inaugural programs for each department are held every year. Annual sports and cultural gatherings are also organised in the best way by the college. Apart from traditional festivals like Ganeshotsav, Shiv Jayanti, and Dandiya, celebrations take place.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has very good facilities, qualified teachers and well-managed placements for students.

detailed_review.Placements: The salary package offered varies from 2.5 to 4.5 LPA. Roles offered to the students are production engineer, sales engineer, maintenance engineer, design engineer, site engineer, etc. Around 30% of the students got an internship, and 20% of the students went for higher studies. Placement coordinators are very helpful.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are good with good CAD and analysis software, and workshop machines are also well-maintained. Students are allowed to use labs and tools for SAE competitions. Classrooms are good, and a Wi-Fi facility is also available. In the library, all local authors' books are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum is as per Mumbai University. Faculty members are experienced, and professors help you to understand concepts. They are also very good at teaching practicals. Faculty members are highly qualified and have high teaching experience, which helps students to understand industry requirements.

reviews.course: B.E. in Chemical Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is very nice and students studying here have a very bright future.

detailed_review.Placements:
1. About 30% students got placed in my course. 
2. The highest salary was Rs.85000 per month. The lowest salary was Rs.40000 per month. The average salary was Rs.60000 per month. 
3. Companies-
 Reliance petrochemicals Pvt ltd
 Deepak fertilizers
 Hydrochem Pvt ltd 
4. Roles offered were from the department of production. 
5. The highest package- Rs.920000 per year. The lowest package- Rs.480000 per year. Average package- Rs.720000 per year. 
6. About 70% students got an internship in industries like-
 Gharda Chemicals Pvt Ltd. Nossel Pvt ltd. Indo Amines Pvt ltd 
 Aarti Drugs Pvt Ltd.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
1. The infrastructure of college is very nice, suitable and comfortable for all. Free wi-fi facility is available for students. Labs of our department are up to date. The college has the latest equipment for practicals. The classroom is also comfortable light intensity is also nice. Library of the department is also good. The library has the latest books and also has standard books of chemical engineering. 
2. The college is having its own hostel in its infrastructure and both Boys and Girls hostel is having different buildings. The hostel also has Watchman and caretaker for looking after students problems. The canteen of the college is on average you can get on veg here non-veg is not available but the canteens are clean and food is also tasty. Medical facilities are also provided for students and for girls special hygiene precautions are given. The college has its own ground where students play cricket football and all sports. Sports days are also there in months of January. Interdepartmental sports competition also take place every year. The college also has its own football and cricket team. The overall college also encourages students in sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty:
1. The teaching staff of the department is highly qualified. 3 professors have done Masters in chemical 
 engineering while 2 professors have done PhD in chemical engineering. All the teachers have great knowledge about their subjects and the quality of teachers is also nice and friendly. 
2. Yes, this course curriculum is very relevant and nowadays chemical engineering has lots of scopes. The students passing every year are ready for working in the industry. They gain all sort of knowledge which requires in industry.
detailed_review.Other:
1. I chose this course because my uncle is already a 
 chemical engineer and also used to love the subjects related to chemical engineering. Nowadays lots of students are taking admission in this course. The best thing about this course is that it's very interesting. 
2. According to my things to be improved in the course would be that the course should give more importance to the practicals than the theories. This course implies more on your practical knowledge rather than your theoretical. 
3. Every year college conducts sports events, technical events such as poster presentation, paper presentation, different innovations in industries. The crowd of the campus is also nice and comfortable for all types of students. The campus of the college is also big and it has sports ground toilets water facilities are also nice.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good college. I had good memories.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 80% of students got placed in top companies, including software and hardware, in our course. The highest package offered was 27 LPA and the lowest package offered was 12 LPA. Recruiting companies included Amazon, Flipkart, Cognizant, TCS, and Wipro. The percentage of students who got internships in our course was 93%. In Wipro, many of them got apprenticeships with a Rs.10,000 stipend.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure was amazing. The building was old and memorable. Facilities in our college included Wi-Fi, and labs were well-equipped. The canteen food was tasty but more costly. The dosa was Rs.60, so I didn’t like it. The quality of food available in the mess included dosa, idli, poori, rice, sambar, etc. Sports were conducted on a grand scale.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching staff was very good. Most of them supported me. Teachers were very helpful in academics, and the teaching quality was good. They had more knowledge. The course curriculum was relevant. It made students ready for the industry. The semester exams were hard to pass. The pass percentage was 73%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Bharathi Vidyapeeth's College of Engineering for B.Tech course Admission in the year 2025-26.

detailed_review.Placements: At this college, a placement cell is available. Every year, about 40% of students get placed in companies. The college has agreements with three companies to ensure that students do not resign easily. These companies offer packages ranging from 2.5 to 8 LPA, with the highest salary being 8 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: This college does not provide high-quality products, but it uses good-quality infrastructure. The college provides facilities such as Wi-Fi, classrooms, bathrooms, lifts, labs, and drinking water machines. These facilities are available for students. The sports committee organizes sports and games tournaments during every festival.
detailed_review.Faculty: In this college, faculty and staff have good behaviour. They behave well towards students. Teachers are very intelligent and solve complicated questions immediately, as well as fix errors during practical sessions. This course takes a total of 4 to 5 years to complete. Scoring passing marks in this course is very difficult and hard for every student because difficult questions are asked.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Placements offered in our course are very good.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students who get placed in our course is 83%. The highest package offered is 6 LPA, and the lowest package offered ranges from 2-3 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are Amazon, Genpact, Cognizant, and TCS. 74% of students got internships with a good package.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of my college is very good. Facilities are very good. Wi-Fi and lab facilities are available. Classrooms are clean and neat. Library facilities are provided. The quality of facilities in our hostel is very good. The mess food is very good, and the canteen food is also good. Medical facilities are provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching staff members are very good. They are more helpful and qualified with master's and PhD degrees. The teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant to ECE. They make students industry-ready. Semester exams are hard to pass. The pass percentage is 73%.

college_info.college_name: CMRIT Bangalore: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Ranking

highlights.summary:
CMRIT is ranked 186th by Business Today 2024 for MBA, 156th by NIRF 2024 under the Engineering category, and 72nd by Times 2024 for BTech. Established in 2000, CMR Institute of Technology (CMRIT), Bangalore is a private Engineering institute that works under CMR Jnanadhara Trust. CMRIT is approved by the AICTE and is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University. The institute is accredited by NBA and NAAC with a Grade of 'A++'. CMRIT College is recognised by the Government of Karnataka. CMR Institute of Technology has signed numerous MOUs with national and international organisations and institutes. The college is known for its flagship MBA and B.E. courses.
CMR Institute of Technology offers a wide variety of courses for undergraduate and postgraduate applicants in the fields of Engineering, Management, and Science. During CMR Institute of Technology placements 2023, the highest package and average package stood at INR 22.70 LPA and INR 5.98 LPA, respectively. The institute facilitates its students with a library, auditorium, seminar or conference halls, guest houses, internet & Wi-Fi, hostels, and canteen, among others. The major highlights of the CMR Institute of Technology (CMRIT), Bangalore are tabulated below:
KCET, JEE Main, AIEEE, GATE, CMAT
Check out more on CMR Institute of Technology, Bangalore Highlights in the below videos:

table.details: KCET, JEE Main, AIEEE, GATE, CMAT

college_info_program.intro:
CMRIT popular programmes are MBA and B.E. B.E students are taught the basics of Computer Programming and Networking. They are taught Programming Languages, Computation, Programme Design, Design and Development of Algorithms, Computer Hardware and Software, and others. Students must develop some important skills such as critical thinking, creativity, good programming skills, analytical skills, problem-solving skills, strong data structures, and algorithms skills.
CMRIT MBA students are provided dual specialisations in areas such as Business Analytics, Marketing, Human Resource, and Finance. Below mentioned are some of the courses offered by CMRIT. Along with this, do check the eligibility criteria and CMR Institute of Technology Bangalore fee structure:

CMRIT Bangalore Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: Good enough to enjoy the college life.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 50 percent of students are placed last year. The highest package is 65 LPA, and the lowest is 5.6 LPA. The average is 15 LPA. Zanken Company (Japanese) roles may differ by courses. Others are placed in India-based companies as well, with high packages in roles like support, tester, developer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good Wi-Fi is available. Labs, trainers, classrooms, hygiene, and a peaceful library are present. In the hostel, hygiene and food are good. The mess is okay. Medical facilities, sports, and games are all available. The college trains students with skills to make them ready for the industry.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are well qualified, many are Ph.D. holders. They make students industry-ready. Semester exams are not so difficult, and the passing percentage is above 85 percent. They take extra care of students who learn slowly. Their attitude towards students is good, and I have a good opinion of them.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college to secure my future and improve my skills. The college supports any fests, events, or other activities.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: An overview of my college in all fields.

detailed_review.Placements: The lowest package is 3.6 LPA, and the highest package is 46 LPA. The top recruiters include Bosch, Visteon, and Johnson Controls through my course. Roles offered are Graduate Trainee, Embedded Testing Engineer, and Embedded Design Engineer. Around 80% of students are placed in ECE.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am a day scholar, so I don't have much idea about hostel facilities. But when it comes to classrooms, they have newly added smart boards in most of the classes. Wi-Fi is available in most places on the college campus. There is a stationery shop as well as a canteen for students with seating arrangements.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are all supportive and helpful when it comes to classes as well as projects. The course is relevant and makes students industry-ready by the end of four years. The projects we do also play a part in it. The VTU semester exams are at an intermediate level.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I am very much interested in the core domain. There are events like Aura, Sparda, and cultural events. Here students can take part in multiple activities.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Life of a CMR IT CSE student.

detailed_review.Placements: As far as I know, almost 85 percent of our students are placed in good companies. The lowest package offered was around 4.5 LPA, and the mean is around 8-8.2 LPA, and the highest is around 48 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Capgemini, TCS, Wipro, Phones Pe, etc. Almost 80-85 percent of the students have internships, as per my knowledge. Top roles offered are SDE, associate SDE, embedded system engineer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure in our college is really good. We have good Wi-Fi speed that goes up to 250 Mbps. All the computers are modern, and they have both Windows and Ubuntu operating systems to help students. Classrooms either have a smartboard or a projector. The food quality in the mess is good, the hostel also provides a good experience, but it is slightly costly, ranging from 1.4 lakh to 1.92 lakh. A sports room and gym are present with table tennis and other games.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers have a good experience in teaching, they are highly skilled and qualified, and they are very enthusiastic. The course curriculum is mostly relevant. Our college also provides competitive coding classes from the second sem and verbal and aptitude classes to aid our placements. The semester exams become slightly difficult after the 3rd sem, but most of us pass the exams, around 85 percent of us.
detailed_review.Other: The campus is slightly crowded. It has great connectivity. Plenty of places to explore nearby, good exposure to tech industries. The fest is also good, I would rate it above average. Two major fests occur per year.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college with beautiful location

detailed_review.Placements: I joined the college by mistake. Actually, in my year, I dreamed of DSCE but got CMRIT. At first, it is disappointing, but after joining this college, it seemed to be a very good college. The placements are okay, not so good, but not so bad either. If you work hard, you can easily get around 7–8 LPA. Around 70–80 percent of students get placed every batch, with the highest being around 45 LPA and the lowest around 3–4 LPA. The average is around 7 LPA. Companies like JP Morgan visit the campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is very good. It has all the necessary facilities. Classrooms are equipped with smart projectors and smart boards. All labs are also good with updated computers. The hostel is good but a bit expensive. The food is very decent.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are great. My department faculty members are very friendly and teach with proper guidance. The HOD is also very good. I love my course. Semester exams are very easy, but the marks you get totally, I repeat, totally, depend on your luck.
detailed_review.Other: The course is great, and the campus is very good. But the people are not so good. Everyone has their own life and they don’t interact much. The people here are not very friendly, and the language barrier is always an issue.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Prime location for IT placements with active student life, but the campus size is compact.

detailed_review.Placements: An average number of students get placed in our course. The average package is around 7 LPA. The highest package is around 44 LPA. Top recruiting companies include Infosys, Wipro, TCS, and others. Top roles are Software Developer, Software Engineer, Data Scientist, and so on.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: CMRIT College comes with a Wi-Fi-enabled campus and labs. Classrooms and libraries are well-maintained. Hostel food consists of a variety of items that are suitable for all residents. The campus also has a medical facility and supports participation in sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at CMRIT are helpful and well-qualified. They have good subject knowledge with a good quality of teaching. The college is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University. The course curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are moderately difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I opt for this course because of my interest in the subject and high demand it holds. Improvements in industry-specific projects and campus size would be appreciated. The college hosts various events like Cultural Fest and Spardha, an inter-collegiate sports meet.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of placement and campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: I am a fresher but I talked to so many seniors, and they told me that approximately 88 percent of students were placed in the last placement season. The highest salary is 4 LPA while the average is around 8 LPA. Around 30 percent of students got internships at Dell, Cognizant, and other companies. Top roles offered are data scientist and software engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is okayish while labs are good. Classrooms don't have smart board and library is fine too. Wi-Fi in hostel is poor and there is no speed. There is no connectivity. Food is fine like I mean the usual price curry and idli dosa for breakfast. Canteen is fine too but some foods are overpriced. Sports facilities are good. There are cricket ground, basketball court, and tennis court too.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are quite helpful and knowledgeable. The course curriculum is relevant too plus the dedicated placement cell helps students in building projects for internships and placements. But the semester exams are difficult as it's held by VTU. Pass percentage is around 92.
detailed_review.Other: I chose CSE for placements only, and I think hostel facilities could be better as most of the facilities are below average. Events are extraordinary, I think. Surroundings are good too.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Review on CMRIT as a First year student.

detailed_review.Placements: CMRIT boasts great placement prospects and has solid industry relations. Top organizations frequently arrange visits to campus to recruit students for various available roles. The average package is around 7-8 LPA, while the highest package is around 48 LPA and the lowest is 5 LPA. CMRIT thoroughly prepares students for these opportunities with rigorous training, faculty guidance, and extensive placement support. The college also promotes internships and startups, producing students with real-world experience and providing students with the resources to work on their ideas. Overall, CMRIT ensures students are job-ready, confident, and prepared to begin their careers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The CMRIT hostel is comfortable and convenient for the students to concentrate on their studies and campus life. The food quality is good, and mess hours are reasonable and well-coordinated so they do not interfere with class times. Safety is prioritized and considered an important factor for both students and parents. Plus, there are vending machines providing snacks and light refreshment which is very useful. On the whole, the hostel provides a decent, conducive environment for students living independently.
detailed_review.Faculty: CMRIT's professors are welcoming and always willing to support students, both academically and personally. The program and classes are structured and current, allowing for clarity and understanding in learning rather than memorization of the material for exams. The college promotes engagement in co-curricular activities (CCA) beyond academics through a variety of club workshops and events to help develop creativity, leadership, and teamwork. With supportive professors, a well-organized curriculum, fair assessment, and a high level of CCA activity, learning experiences are smooth, engaging, and well-rounded overall at CMRIT!
detailed_review.Other: CMRIT is situated at a very convenient location for students. There are numerous food places, gyms, supermarkets, religious places, and PG in proximity that help in supplementing daily life. Whether it is grabbing a quick meal, buying daily essentials, or going to the gym, everything is just a short walk or drive away, making student life very comfortable.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Great college with top hackathon wings, supportive faculty, and excellent placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 70-80 percent of students are placed. The lowest is 10 LPA for CSE AIML, and soaring went till 46 LPA in 2025 against, only 26 LPA in 2024. Top recruiters include Amazon, BEL Co Limited, IBM, Huawei, Nestle, Sony, etc. Nearly 85 percent of students get internships, given that even if the students put effort. But the high count is due to even the students wanting to take part due to a lot of encouragement from the faculty members. Roles include software engineer, ML specialists, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are huge and spacious. Every classroom in the college is equipped with a whiteboard and a smart board. I don't have enough words to express my gratitude towards the unwavering support given by the college, not only in academics but also sports and cultural. CMRIT takes a lot of care when it comes to students' health so the food served in canteen is thoroughly inspected and checked so that students are served hygienic and tasty food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in the college are highly qualified. The teaching quality is top-notch. Faculty members are very supportive and encouraging of the welfare of the students, and they make their future secure and job-ready. The difficulty level of exams is moderate, and pass percentage is always above 90 percent.
detailed_review.Other: One of the best point about the college is its location. It is located in heart of Bangalore, it's between the Silicon Valley, so the students have a better opportunity to develop a life beneficial network with working professionals. Fest like aura, cultural, and spardha take place, which bring students together.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Review of CMRIT from the first year's perspective.

detailed_review.Placements: In this college, generally 60-70 percent of students are placed. The top companies, such as Amazon, Microsoft, Intel, Deloitte, HP, Infosys, Wipro, TCS, and Capgemini, come for recruitment. The highest package bagged till now is 48 LPA. The placements happen for on-site too, like in Japan.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure exceed expectations. The food quality is good. Sports grounds are also good. The hostel warden is strict and responsible. As one class of CS (AIML), the learning experience from our faculty is fairly good, and the Wi-Fi is good too.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is helpful. They are preparing us for real market exposure. Yes, this curriculum is relevant. Our batch being in only one class, we have selected faculty, and they are good. The semester exams are fairly hard, but there is a high percentage.
detailed_review.Other: Fees are 3.5 lakhs as per COMEDK.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Review of CMR Institute of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement rate is around 70-75 percent every year, and the average package ranges from 5 LPA to 6 LPA. The median salary is around 10 LPA to 12 LPA, and the highest package this year is around 42 LPA. The companies that come for placements are Deloitte, PhonePe, and Japanese companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: CMRIT has a modern and student-friendly campus that provides a good environment. The infrastructure is well developed. Most classrooms are spacious and equipped with smart boards. Large library with good seating capacity. The college has good canteen facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very knowledgeable and helpful. The teachers uses various to resources to help understand the concepts. The faculty are very a approachable. The teachers take special classes for students who cannot grasp concepts quickly. They conduct tests regularly.
detailed_review.Other: This course is one of the most demanding courses in the current industry. The college plans events every week and sends regular emails about events happening inside and outside the campus. The fellow students in campus are friendly. They are regularly updated on government and private scholarship.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Academically great but decent otherwise.

detailed_review.Placements: CMRIT promises a 80 percent placement percentage. The highest package went up to 44.1LPA in 2025 which is the all time best received from this college. The lowest package can range from 3 LPA to 5 LPA. The 2022 to 2023 placement year had a lowest package of 5 LPA while another source lists 3 LPA as the lowest package in a more recent report. The average package is around 9 to 10 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Bad hostel experience. Wi-Fi and food here are terrible. The hostel is an anti ragging free hostel. Some seniors are very arrogant and demand respect all the time. Hostel rooms are very clumsy and compact. Washrooms are always dirty and dimly lit. Wardens are very friendly.
detailed_review.Faculty: Good teachers with good knowledge and experience. Curriculum is great, and the semester exams are decently competitive. Most of the teachers have great past experience. None of them are strict and are very chill when it comes to bunking and attendance. They provide attendance to everyone who has a valid proof of staying back.
detailed_review.Other: CMRIT offers a great academic environment with good faculty, infrastructure and courses making it an ideal choice for students focused on engineering. It lacks extracurriculars. No major events like freshers or festivals are organized by the college, though hostelers enjoy more freedom and conduct their own. Sports facilities are limited with only a football turf, basketball, volleyball and table tennis courts, no badminton or a proper cricket ground. The huge parking lot can be better utilized for sports or another building. Overall CMRIT is excellent academically but falls short in sports, events and non academic experiences.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good college at a very good place. Definitely recommended to others.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are quite decent here. Almost 7 LPA-9 LPA is the average package offered. The highest this year is 47 LPA in Japan. The college also has subjects related to placements, as well, which give us a head start in our placement journey. And it also has the NAAC A+ certificate.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very modern here. It has a very big ground in the middle, which looks so aesthetic. The hostel rooms have a range of 1-5 sharing rooms. Movie nights, garba nights, etc., also happen in hostels. The food is very good as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty here are very helpful, give answers to all types of doubts very sincerely, and the exam curriculum is also very doable, and teachers also prepare us well for the exams. They take flip classes and video classes to help students understand better.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is better than its competitors and is worth it if you are joining through KCET.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package for this year is 47 LPA, which I believe is very good. A high percentage of students got placed this year, and the CSE average for this year is 7 LPA, which is less considering the fees of the college, the ROI is nearly 50 percent. The college has a placement cell and provides TYL classes, which make the students placement-ready.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the campus is good, it is green, and there is a ground where you can play. The hostel is the worst part of the college. The mess food is very bad, the Wi-Fi is very slow, and the lift does not work when you need it the most. I am disappointed with the hostel, the 2 sharing hostel fees are 1.72 lacs, and it's absolutely not worth taking a PG instead. Labs are well-maintained.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are highly qualified and are very knowledgeable. They are very helpful and are always ready to help you. The college is affiliated with VTU, and that's why it follows the VTU curriculum. The curriculum is good, but it could've been more placement-oriented.
detailed_review.Other: There are a lot of club activities, and the campus is vibrant.

reviews.course: B.E. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Really good college in terms of faculty and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are quite decent compared to many other good colleges in Bangalore. Special classes called TYL (Tie Your Places) are held regularly to train students for placement sessions. College is attracting better and better companies every year. Around 85% students get placed every year. ROI is pretty decent for CMRIT.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels are really good. Well-equipped with modern-day facilities, the college campus is a little compact but still has excellent faculty with wonderful experience. The ambience of the college is superb. The crowd is of all kinds. Attendance is an issue, but that's with most of the colleges, so can't help it.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified and knowledgeable. Teaching quality is as needed. The course curriculum is relevant, which makes the students industry-ready. Semester exams are not that difficult, just like VTU papers. The pass percentage is above 95.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college for BE students

detailed_review.Placements: Good placements are happening for IT and CS-related branches. Many companies are also visiting the campus for recruitment. Since there are no EEE, Mechanical, or Civil branches, all focus is on IT-related courses, and because of that, students get good placement opportunities from the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college and hostel is good. Hostels are available on the college campus. The campus is well-maintained, provides good information, and is quite informative. Overall, the college is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty shows good commitment towards both internal and external work. They maintain a strong student–faculty relationship and have a good reputation in all areas. They also possess instant problem-solving skills, which lead to good communication and commitment between students and teachers.
detailed_review.Other: All events are well organized and enjoyable. The auditorium is also good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a very good college with good education and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 90% of students are placed. The highest might be more than 45 LPA, the lowest is 5 LPA, and the average is 10 LPA. Recruiting companies are VMware, Infosys, Oracle, Accenture, J. P. Morgan, Elusion, and TCS. Almost 80% of students get internships at J. P. Morgan and Infosys. Roles offered are software engineer, software developer, data analyst, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is no lack of any requirements like labs. We have a huge library and classrooms well maintained. We have smart boards that make teaching easier. There are many programming labs or for electrical. We also have workshop like makerspace and for 1st year physics and chemistry labs. Rooms are very good in hostel and it is safe. It is well maintained with good facilities. Food is good in mess and canteens, and it has reasonable prices in canteens. Medical facilities are good. If anything serious occurs, it will be taken to the nearest hospital also. The playground is well-facilitated with many sports to play. It has gym and table tennis also.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and skilled. They help us with our problems. They teach very clearly, using their experience and knowledge. Faculty members are also trying to improve themselves by still learning many courses and getting certification to give us better details while teaching.  The course curriculum is related to web development, full-stack, software engineering, etc. The exams are not that hard if we follow the steps properly. The pass percentage is minimum 40%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Good placements with great learning. Especially the placement classes are highly encouraging.

detailed_review.Placements: The current placements in the AIML department are comparatively more. Offering the greatest packages so far. To be precise, the placements are great with the training they conduct during each semester. Since it's just the beginning of placement for the 3rd year, it's doing great.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The maintenance of the canteen should be improved, but except for that, the facilities provided in the labs, classrooms, and medical areas are good. A very poor Wi-Fi connection within the campus. If we look at sports and games, opportunities are given to everyone to showcase their performance with great availability.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers train the students well to gain all the qualities. To be precise, the faculty members are very interactive and encouraging, motivating us to achieve things. Teachers are knowledgeable about the courses and highly qualified. The exams conducted are also decent with no extra chaos, which helps us have a good course outcome.

reviews.course: B.E. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: CMRIT - A top engineering college in Bangalore.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are decent. Placements will mostly depend on the skill set you carry, and your achievements like winning hackathons, and participating in technical events. The highest package I have noticed is about 25-30 LPA and the lowest should be around 3-4 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have good classroom infrastructure and Wi-Fi in every classroom. Labs are also well-equipped and have resources for every student to work freely. Sports are also another good thing in our college. Since our college conducts VTU tournaments and supports every student to take part.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at CMRIT are qualified for their courses. Teachers are friendly and always reach out to us when we need them. Semester exams are at a decent level of difficulty but it's all within the syllabus and what our teachers have taught us.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Reviewing the changes in CMRIT Bangalore.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are decent. The average package is around 5 LPA. The highest package offered is 55 LPA (international) and 13.5 LPA (domestic). Companies like Accenture, Oracle, Capgemini, Deloitte, electronics, manhattan, IBM, etc came for recruitment. They give a good chance to be placed. Now they are recruiting for 3rd year internship with PPO.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is on 6 acres. There is a big library for all types of study purposes. The library time is 8-8 usually but during exams the time shifts from 8 am to 12 am. Labs are also available for each course. Classrooms are big with digital boards.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very good. They are knowledgeable and helpful. They give proper guidance along with notes. Semester exams are not that tough because of internals. The preparation in internals reflect in the semester exams. The students get a very good exposure of industry.
detailed_review.Other: Fest is an ethnic day. They conduct cultural, aura, and spardha. Now, they are celebrating many festivals. They have upgraded a lot from before.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Excellent academics and largely devoted to the betterment of students.

detailed_review.Placements: About 80% of students get placed in my course. The highest package is 25 LPA. Top recruiters include Japanese companies. Many students get internships in companies. There are regular placement drives from the 3rd year to make students ready for interviews, and special importance is given to communication skills.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities of the college and hostel are very good. Cleanliness is maintained throughout. The hostel is a very comfortable place to reside. All the necessary appliances are provided by the hostel. The security of students is of utmost importance.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is 100% devoted to the betterment of students, and the curriculum is highly focused on competition among peers. The subjects are taught in-depth, and regular tests as well as quizzes. It makes students industry-interested and also helps them get internships.
detailed_review.Other: Fests are held. Every week, there are competitions for coding, technical events, innovation events, and even non-technical events.

admission.title: CMRIT Admission Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: CMR Institute of Technology admission is entrance-based for all courses. CMRIT offers UG, PG, and PhD courses in various streams, including Engineering and Technology, Management, and Computer Applications, across 15 departments (Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, etc.). The mode of application at CMR Institute of Technology is online.

faqs.question: How many marks are required in KCET to get admission in CMR Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: Requirements for admission through KCET are a high score in Class 12 and a good rank in the KCET exam which is not specified in general. Cuts may change depending on the engineering branch selected. When you have a higher rank, your chance of getting chosen for your course becomes better. Students from the reserved category in Karnataka have reduced cutoff criteria.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to CMRIT?
faqs.answer: CMR Institute of Technology admission, to all the programmes offered at the campus, is entrance exam-based. CMRIT admission to the flagship BTech course is provided on the basis of KCET scores and for MTech, candidates need to appear in GATE/ PGCET. Similarly, for MBA admissions, aspirants need to appear for CMAT/ CAT/ MAT/ PGCET/ KMAT exams.

faqs.question: Can I join CMRIT without entrance?
faqs.answer: CMRIT conducts entrance exam for various course admission. Candidates need to sit and appear for entrance exam as per respective courses. Students can check course-wise selection criteria below: Course Selection Criteria BE KCET/ COMEDK/ JEE Main/ AIEEE MTech GATE/ PGCET + Centralised Counseling MBA CMAT/ CAT/ MAT/ PGCET/ KMAT + Centralised Counseling MCA PGCET/ KMAT + Centralised Counseling PhD ULRA Test conducted by the institute

faqs.question: Who is eligible for MCA admission at CMR Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: For admission to MCA programme at CMRIT, candidates must fulfill the following eligibility & selection criteria conditions: Course Eligibility Selection Criteria MCA Graduation with 50% aggregate PGCET/ KMAT + Centralised Counseling

faqs.question: How can I get admission to CMRIT for a MCA?
faqs.answer: CMRIT offers entrance-based admission. Candidates who are interested in MCA can apply for the admission form online on the official website of the institute. Additionally, applicants must follow the basic eligibility criteria to get admission to MCA and must have a graduation degree with 50% aggregate from a recognised board, Further, candidates must appear and apply for the exam accepted by the institute for admission.

faqs.question: What is the admission criteria for MCA admission at CMR Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: Candidates must have three year BCA/ Bachelor degree in Computer Science Engineering or Passed B.Sc/B.Com/B.A with Mathematics at 10+2 level or at Graduation level from a recognised university with not less than 50% aggregate of all the years of the degree examination and 45% in case of candidates from Karnataka belonging to SC/ST and Category-1.

faqs.question: What is the seat intake for MBA at CMR Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: The overall seat intake of MBA courses at CMRT is 120. Candidates having a UG degree with 50% aggregate are eligible to apply for admission. After the fulfillment of the eligibility criteria, candidates have to visit the official website of CMRIT to apply online.

faqs.question: Can I do a MBA with 45% in graduation from CMRIT?
faqs.answer: CMRIT requires at least 50% aggregate in Graduation. Further, candidates belonging to SC/ST and any other groups classified by the Karnataka government required 45% for admission. If any candidates pass another entrance-level exam related to the field, they are also eligible for the course. The institute accepts CMAT/ CAT/MAT/ PGCET/K-MAT exam scores for admission to MBA courses. So if any candidates want admission to CMRIT for an MBA course they must have 50% graduation degree and 45% for SC/ST category students.

faqs.answer: CMR Institute of Technology MBA fees is INR 1.2 lakh. The tuition fee must be paid once the seats are confirmed. The fee structure like tuition fees, exam fees, admission fees, and others. The fee information is sourced from the official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

sections.heading: Introduction
text: CMR Institute of Technology infrastructure includes world-class classrooms, a fully stocked library, a well-equipped gymnasium, hostels, an auditorium, seminar halls, and discussion rooms for conducting placement drives, etc. CMRIT Bangalore offers separate hostel accommodations for boys and girls. It has multiple on-campus Centres of Excellence (CoE) with modern and the latest technologies to meet the academic and research needs of the students. The college also has a sports complex with facilities for both indoor and outdoor games. A medical centre is also available to cater to medical emergencies. CMRIT Bangalore has over 14 departments. To learn more about the CMRIT Bangalore infrastructure , watch the video below.

sections.heading: CMR Institute of Technology Campus Highlights
text: Situated in Whitefield, Bangalore, the institute is well-connected for the students. The campus spans 8 acres of land and surrounded by lush green trees. The campus has centralised fire alarm systems, CCTV surveillance, and an RFID gate, which are installed keeping in mind the safety and security of the students. The college has multiple laboratories that are being customised as per the needs of individual departments. The CMRIT Bangalore campus is also Wi-Fi-enabled to facilitate real-time exchange of academic information. Some of the key campus highlights are tabulated below:

tables.CMRIT Bangalore Campus Highlights: Library, Cafeteria, Hostel, Sports Complex, Auditorium, Research centres, Medical services, etc.

sections.heading: CMR Institute of Technology Hostel Facility
text: The college has two hostels for accommodating boys and girls students separately. CMRIT Bangalore hostels are spacious and well-ventilated. The rooms have single, double, triple and four-person occupancy, depending on the preferences filled by the students. The hostel rooms have all the basic furniture, including a study table, chair, bed, cupboard and basic electrical facilities, such as electricity and fans. The allocation of hostels is done by the hostel committee after the final fee submission. Some of the CMRIT Bangalore hostel facilities are provided below:

sections.heading: CMR Institute of Technology Library
text: CMRIT Bangalore has a central library, with an area of 2400 sq. m. The library provides multiple facilities, including reading-learning resources, Wi-Fi, Internet access, and electrical plug-in facilities. The library infrastructure is such as to allow proper lighting and ventilation to provide a healthy environment for the students who sit for long working hours. The library has all the basic amenities, such as study tables, chairs, centralised air conditioning, lighting, etc. CMR Institute of Technology Library has a seating capacity of 200 readers. The library is open from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. on working days and 9:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. during examination days.

CMRIT Bangalore is using Koha, an open-source integrated library system, for the operations and resource sharing among the CMR Group of Institutes’ libraries. CMRIT Bangalore offers the below library services:

sections.heading: CMR Institute of Technology Sports Facility
text: For the holistic development of the students, the CMR Institute of Technology encourages student involvement in various sports activities. Therefore, the college has proper facilities for both indoor and outdoor sports. CMRIT Bangalore sports facilities include two basketball courts with a seating capacity of 350 students, a football ground with a capacity of 150 students, a volleyball court, a throwball court, a cricket ground, a hockey ground, a kabaddi ground, and indoor and outdoor table tennis. The college has a professional sports coach to guide and train the students in several games. The students of CMRIT have participated in multiple university-level, state, national, and international-level competitions and won a number of competitions.
The college also has two gyms with a wide range of equipment to support the students in maintaining their physical fitness. These gyms can accommodate 20 members at a time.

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description:
The CMRIT Central Library, provides an ideal environment for intellectual inquiry with its multiple Study Spaces, Research Assistance, Reading, Learning and Instructional Resources.
The Central Library, with an area of 2400 sq.m, is designed in such a way it has natural light for the entire day and provides a friendly environment to gain knowledge in an effective manner. Accommodating various facilities such as reading-learning resources, Wi-Fi, Internet access, and electrical plug-in facilities, there are seating arrangements for about 200 users at any point in time.
Digital Learning Resources and online access to major e-Journals and e-Books on Science, Technology, and Management are available from VTU and Developing Library Network (DELNET). KOHA, an Integrated Library Management Software package is used for library operations and resource sharing among the CMR Group of Institutes’ libraries. 

Institutional Repository (IR), a digital repository of CMRIT Central Library Faculty publications provides access to major publications whilst allowing downloads.

Qualified, experienced, and well trained library professionals serve users at any point in time whilst offering assistance in meeting academic and research information needs.

facilities.name: Cafeteria
facilities.description: The cafeteria complex sits at the heart of the campus and consists of a Cafe Coffee Day, a 150 seater covered amphitheater, full fledge canteen facility for 300 students and an exclusive dining area for staff. The cafe area is also equipped with a mini stage and two 42” LCD screens.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: Hostels are well furnished with spacious comfortable rooms, lounges, TV, magazines and recreational facilities. The hygienic, nutritionally balanced food is served. The students form food committees that decide the weekly menu. Resident warden strengthens the student sense of security and helps them feel at home. Counselling and medical facilities are available. Exclusive International hostel caters to foreign students from over 20 countries.

data.description: CMRIT has an experienced faculty members who holds higher degrees in their respective fields. Most of the faculty are PhD holders. Candidates can check the CMIT faculty details in the table provided below:

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: Our college is best, you will definitely choose this college to build your future.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Best college to get the best exposure.

detailed_review.Placements: In my college, approximately 95 percent of students get placed every year with awesome placement records. The highest package offered in this college differs as per the branch. Till now, it is around 55 LPA. Students can also secure their roles in different companies for internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The institute facilities and environment in this college are awesome, with a beautiful environment and campus life. You are provided with a sports room, central library, and medical facilities, along with the best college faculty. The quality of the food in the college is just better.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: Our college is affordable for students.

detailed_review.Placements: There were many students placed each year, receiving good packages through the college placement cell. The college provided excellent placements each year, with several companies visiting. The college offered us many offer letters each year, with salaries ranging from 30 to 35 LPA
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure was good and unique. The college environment was good for students. Hostels were well-maintained, with many boys' and girls' hostels within the same college. There were also several parks, and the college had its auditorium, which was used for events.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of our college was very supportive. Our teachers were experienced and had a lot of knowledge of their subjects. They also provided us with good guidance for our studies. The college conducted regular M.Ed. semester examinations, including MSTs, and provided a clear marking scheme for the questions, step by step.
detailed_review.Other: Our college organized many cultural events like Parivartan, Lohri, Diwali, Holi, and more. They provided a great environment for students. The college offered excellent placement opportunities each year, with many companies visiting, such as Wipro, Microsoft, Google, Amazon, and others. The college also provided a training and placement program, preparing us for future placement drives. These drives were held for a year, and 6th-semester students enrolled in the placement cell. Once we completed our degrees, the college offered us excellent placement opportunities, helping many students fulfill their dreams. The offers ranged from 32 to 45 LPA.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Good placements and strong industry connections, but faculty quality varies.

Companies like Amazon, Google, Infosys, etc., visit my college for placements. Almost 40% of students get placements.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Review of Chandigarh Group of Colleges, Landran.

The pass percentage overall is good. Exams are conducted well, and there are very less chances of cheating.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: This college is value for money and has higher placement records and has a grade of NAAC A+.

detailed_review.Placements: In AI and ML, 70 percent of students get placed in top reputed companies like Amazon, Infosys, etc. The highest package of our college is 80 Lacs last year, and the lowest package is 3 Lacs. The median package is 5 Lacs. Top recruiting companies are Amazon, Infosys, Tata, Tech Mahindra, and more. 70 to 80 percent of students got internships that I have listed here. The roles offered are data analysis, web development, and full-stack developer.
