summary.college_name: Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute

reviews.course: BCA in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: It's a really good infrastructure and facilities. Good for placements in top companies.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 60 to 80 percent of attendance is needed, and they are offering 6 LPA to 16 LPA in top companies. Internship in my course is nearly 60 to 80 percent of students. They offered top companies for placements like IBM, Accenture, Cipla, Deloitte, Wipro, Infosys, and various types of companies are offered in this college. You can learn the top roles about cybersecurity, AI, data analyst, data scientist, and more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: 24/7 Wi-Fi for all hostellers and food for vegetarians and non-vegetarians are both available. There are separate hostels for girls and boys for their privacy. The canteen food is really good, they prefer sports and games, and they have neat classrooms, libraries, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: In Dr. MGR University, the teachers are generally helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable as they clear doubts, are patient, and friendly. They teach well, etc. The semester exams are difficult, as we want to achieve more than you think it's worth it. The pass percentage is 50 percent.
detailed_review.Other: Many students chose this course to learn about AI and the role of machine learning, coding, data analysis, Python, and more. The events, fest, campus crowd, campus surroundings, and scholarship are very good, and they prefer more for the athlete.

reviews.course: LL.B. (Hons.)
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of the good placement.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, every year, 80 to 90 per cent of students get placed in law in high court, district court, cognizant, TCS, and many more. Top recruiting companies are High Court, TCS, Supreme Court and many more, and the roles offered here are trainee roles. The highest package is 12 LPA, the average is 6 LPA, and the lowest is 2 LPA. Every year, 80% of students get an internship in different courts.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and facilities are excellent in this college, plus Wi-Fi, and the labs are good, neat and clean. The quality of food is acceptable, plus hostel rooms are quite good for studying. Different kinds of sports, like cricket and football, are held in this college. Students love to eat delicious food here.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are qualified and knowledgeable. They teach students with full responsibility and make them understand the subject clearly. This course is relevant and makes students industry-ready to get a job in top courts and companies. Plus, semester exams are not so difficult, but it is quite easy to pass the exam. The passing mark is 50 in this course.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course as I have an interest in the law, and this course helps to serve the people. Economics was the subject here, which needs to be improved, as it is a little bit tough. Scholarship is provided to all the students who are eligible. Different technical and cultural fests happen here, which students love to participate in.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS)
reviews.review_title: Very satisfying and trustworthy college.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from the 2021-25 batch. The coaching and placement cell provide proper guidance to get placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college library and hostel fees are really affordable. It is one of the best colleges with a huge playground. The canteen food is really good and hygienic. You can join this college with full confidence as it is truly trustworthy, and you will enjoy the campus. It also has a gym for workouts for hostel students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are conducted in a very disciplined manner. The way of teaching and understanding of concepts by the teaching staff are really great. You should join this college, as you can trust the teaching staff. They will guide you on how to attend examinations and also help you prepare for them.
detailed_review.Other: It is located on the main road. So you can access public transport at the gate. It is an amazing college. It's placements and infrastructure are really good. Faculty members are very good. The college has well equipped instruments for practical knowledge.

reviews.course: LL.B. (Hons.)
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with the placement and faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year, 80 to 90% students get placed in our college in top recruiting companies. Top recruiting companies are Sealdah High Court, Subordinate Courts, TCS, Cognizant, Wipro, and many more. Top roles offered by companies are court trainee and analyst trainee, the highest package is 12 LPA, average is 6 LPA, and the lowest is 2 LPA. Every year, 90% of students get internships in TCS, Sealdah Court.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are quite good and acceptable. Wi-Fi is good for students to work in the lab. Plus, the quality of food in the hostel and canteen is delicious, and students love that food. Hostel rooms are also neat and clean. Different kinds of sports like football and cricket are also held here
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very helpful and knowledgeable. They teach students with dedication and solve all problems of students to make the subject easy. Plus, this course is very relevant and makes students industry ready to get a job in top companies for law. Semester exams are not so difficult, and the passing marks are 50.
detailed_review.Other: I choose this course because I have an interest in law, and the best thing in this course is that it helps the students to learn law and provides an opportunity to serve the country. But as law is difficult, this subject needs to improve. Events and fests related to law are held here so that students can learn something, plus scholarships are also provided to students.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Enjoying the college days with both learning and a set of great friends and faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in my college are very structured. They maintain a placement cell that is very active, with daily updates of companies that are hiring shared via a WhatsApp group. They also conduct job fairs where students can attend interviews with various companies on campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is good. The lab has enough systems with the required configuration and Ethernet connected for each system. Students can access the Wi-Fi if required, but speed can be a little issue as many students connect at the same time. Classrooms and the library are clean and good. As for the hostel, I can't speak because I’m a day scholar.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course is good overall and has 2–3 days of practical sessions in the lab. The faculty members are very good at teaching and helpful in explaining the topics and clearing doubts with interesting real-time examples. Exams are conducted on time, and the exams won’t be too tough. If you write what you listened to in class, you can clear the papers.
detailed_review.Other: The college is good so far, with events like Onam, Diwali, Pongal, and 2Culture. There is a scholarship for the alumni students of this college.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Neutralists are satisfied with the specific faculty members and friends.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement is good. WhatsApp group will be created by the placement cell of the department. Students are asked to join this group, and they update details of the companys vacancy, and also provide the campus drive, free placement, and training opportunity will be provided in the name of placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is good, two laboratories with 70+ systems with the internet connection and 5 ton centralized air conditioning. I am a day scholar. I do not know much about the hostel, but the college canteen food is good, and the prices are slightly high.
detailed_review.Faculty: Semester exams are conducted strictly with the flying squad. Three examinations are conducted for a semester, the CAT Pre University examination, final semester examinations, and the practical examination. The faculty will guide us for the examinations and will have three laboratory sessions for a week.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to gain more proficiency in IT field, and they provided a 15% scholarship for alumni students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, supportive faculty, and decent placements with scope for industry exposure.

detailed_review.Placements: In the last passing batch of B.Tech CSE, around 75% of students were placed. The highest package was 21 LPA, average 4.5-5.2 LPA, and the lowest 3 LPA. Top recruiters included Amazon, TCS, Infosys, and Capgemini. About 70% got internships in tech roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Provide snacks and meals at reasonable prices. Medical facilities include a campus health centre with a visiting doctor. Sports facilities include a cricket ground, volleyball, basketball, and indoor games for student recreation. Hostel food is average, totally.
detailed_review.Faculty: Development, helping students become job-ready. Semester exams are moderately difficult but manageable with regular study. The pass percentage is usually around 85-90%, with support provided for backlog clearance. There are monthly tests for scoring in exams.
detailed_review.Other: Friendly and diverse. College is well-connected to the city, with decent surroundings. Scholarships are available based on merit and EAMCET rank. Extracurricular activities, clubs, and hackathons add to a balanced student life.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Top recruitment companies which offer placements at Gitam University Hyderabad are Amazon, Microsoft, TCS, Intel, etc. The highest package offered here at Gitam University Hyderabad is 50 LPA. The average package offered here at Gitam University Hyderabad is 9.9 LPA. The percentage of students placed is 71%.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure available here is far better compared to other universities. The rooms are neatly maintained with workers cleaning every day. All the classrooms, library, and mess are maintained with air conditioning and cleaned every day.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some faculty present here have very good knowledge of the subject, but they fail at making students understand what they are teaching. Semester exams here are not that tough if you go through the materials and the books recommended by the faculty thoroughly, which will be enough to score well in the exams.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Dr. M.G.R. Educational and Research Institute.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, MCA, around 75-80% of students were placed through campus recruitment. The highest package offered was around 8-10 LPA, the lowest around 3 LPA, and the average around 4.5-5 LPA. Top recruiting companies included TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Cognizant, HCL, and Accenture, along with a few product-based startups. Around 60-65% of students received internships, mainly in companies like Zoho, Virtusa, CTS, and Capgemini, where they worked on real-time projects. The top roles offered were Software Developer, Full Stack Developer, Data Analyst, System Engineer, and Associate Consultant. Overall, the course provided good placement opportunities and strong industry exposure.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our department has good infrastructure facilities such as spacious classrooms, projectors, well-equipped computer labs with high-speed Wi-Fi, and a central library with a wide collection of books and e-resources. The hostel facilities are decent, with proper rooms,  24/7 water and electricity, and security. Mess food is satisfactory with both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options, while the canteen offers snacks and beverages. The campus also provides medical facilities, a health center, and ambulance support. For recreation, there are facilities for sports and games such as cricket, football, volleyball, badminton, and indoor games, ensuring a balanced campus life.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in our course are highly qualified, knowledgeable, and supportive. Most of them explain concepts clearly and are approachable for doubts beyond class hours. The curriculum is regularly updated and covers important subjects in programming, databases, networking, and emerging technologies, which helps students become industry-ready. The teaching quality is good, with practical sessions, projects, and seminars adding more value. The semester exams are of moderate difficulty, focusing more on understanding concepts rather than written learning.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the MCA course because of my interest in programming, software development, and the opportunities it provides in the IT industry. Best things about this course are the practical exposure, supportive faculty, and good placement opportunities with reputed companies. Our campus also conducts technical events, cultural fests, and workshops that give us a chance to learn and showcase our skills.

reviews.course: B.Com. in Accounting and Finanace
reviews.review_title: Fate to join this college.

detailed_review.Placements: There are 38 students in my class morning shift, the highest range will be Rs. 25000, and the lowest will be Rs. 10,000. We didn't know any of the companies yet; they didn't ask us to go for an internship. They are not top roles and will be the bare minimum; placements are very bad.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Most facilities will be more fun and friendly with students, but some make us feel very bad about the infrastructure. Wi-Fi will not be available, and labs do not really help us to work. Classrooms are literally bad, and benches are not good; this will cause back pain. We have only four classes and then one break. The hostel is available, and the food in the canteen is not too good. Medical facilities are available, sports and games are not very motivating in this course, and the ground will not be provided for the commerce group.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are more helpful, and some are qualified, while others don't know the subject matter they teach. This course does not equip us to walk into interviews; we need many skills to be industry-ready. Semester exams will be so much easier to attend; the corrections will be relevant.
detailed_review.Other: Events are not even available, fests will not be celebrated, and there will be campus crowds. The connection is not good; the campus surroundings will not be good, and the bus stop for students will be a significant distance away. Scholarships and extracurricular activities are available.

reviews.course: LL.B. (Hons.)
reviews.review_title: I am absolutely satisfied with the faculty members and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 90% of students got placed in their placement programme. The highest package is 10 LPA, and the average package is 5 LPA. The lowest package is below 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies that offered jobs are Reliance, HCL, TCS, Wipro, etc. Top roles offered are corporate lawyers, associates, legal advisors, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and facilities are good. The campus is sprawling across 250 acres. Smart classrooms, Wi-Fi, a well-stocked library, and seminar halls are available on campus. The quality of food is good. There are separate hostels for both girls and boys on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. They are experienced and are legal professionals. The LL.B. course is of 3 years, and it follows UGC and BCI guidelines, offering a balanced mix of law with the art of commerce and business streams. Semester exams are a little tough, and 40% marks are required for passing in both internal and external exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Students will be satisfied with our college. It has a good campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students get placed in our college. The highest package is 55 LPA, and the lowest package is 6 LPA. The average package is 10 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are Infosys and TCS. 85% of students got internships from our course in mainly companies that are near our college in Chennai. Roles offered are manager, data analyst, and HR.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is good because the government is taking care of our college. In our college, labs and library are also good. We have different labs for different subjects in our course. The quality of facilities in the hostel is good. The food may not be good for Andhra and Telangana state students. Maybe it is good for Tamil students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. Mainly, all teaching faculty members have a doctorate degree. They are knowledgeable. The course curriculum is relevant. They make students industry-ready. They also help students with skills and prepare them for interviews. Semester exams are not very difficult if we understand what teachers are teaching in class. It is very easy to write if we listen carefully to classes.
detailed_review.Other: The course is trending about job vacancies and is helpful in the software side, so I chose it. Nothing should be improved in our course because it is good. Events and fests happen in our college once a week. It has different culbs.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Dr. M.G.R. Educational and Research Institute.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement in our college is not very bad, but it is good. There is a separate placement cell for training students to get placed in the companies. My previous batch of students got a good number of placements with multiple offers for some students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is very good. Our college has a strong building with good infrastructure, including separate blocks for different branches, labs, and a library. The computer labs are equipped with high-tech systems, and classrooms are spacious enough for over 100 students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at our college are very experienced. Their teaching skills are excellent, making it easy for students to understand the material. The curriculum is relevant and regularly updated to keep students industry-ready. Semester exams are not overly difficult.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of the good environment, infrastructure, and faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: This college has a good name in placements, Many engineering students got placed during the third year or fourth year by the end you can get a job. A minimum 8 CGPA is required. 50 LPA is the highest and 8 LPA is the lowest package. Wipro, Amaran, and Intel are recruiting companies. 60% of students got placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The labs and classrooms are very good. There is a big library where you can get the books that you want. There is a washing machine and hot water facility. Good and hygienic quality of food is available. There is a hospital near to the hostel. We can play so many sports, we have big grounds.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. They are good. The course curriculum is relevant and it makes students industry-ready. Exams are not that difficult they are easy only. The pass percentage is 50%, if we get that we will pass.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: The college has good faculty and good teachers.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 60% of students are placed in our course. The highest package is 6 LPA, the average is 4 LPA, and the lowest is 2.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Hexaware, Cognizant, and TCS. 50% of students get an internship. The roles offered are web developer and data analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure available in my course are good. They provide Wi-Fi, good labs, classrooms, and a library, which are good. The food quality is also so good, students can get both veg and non-veg food, and the food changes on a daily basis.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is good, and I would rate it 7 out of 10. Students have to study on their own, as the curriculum is not good that it can make students industry-ready. Students shouldn't depend only on the college, they have to do something on their own. Semester exams are not too difficult, but are easy. The pass percentage is 50%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I thought that if I did this course, I would get some technical knowledge. The best thing about this course is that you can explore lots of things. I can say to our education system that they need to change their syllabus, they are only focusing on theory and not showing a lot of practical. In my college, they conduct events and fests. The campus crowd is good, and students can do extracurricular activities too.

reviews.course: LL.B. (Hons.)
reviews.review_title: This place is very clean and enjoyable. Teachers are nice.

detailed_review.Placements: Dr. MGR University has decent placements with companies like Zoho, TCS, and Wipro recruiting students. This is a better option for highly skilled students. Plus two students in science and more than 80% got admission to this college. This course is in high demand.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: MGR University is well-maintained and very clean. This place is very beautiful and has very calm surroundings which helps to easily study. Large and neat classrooms. The library is near the classroom. Hostel near the college and ladies have separate hostels.
detailed_review.Faculty: This university's teachers are very friendly and provide excellent classes this college provides teachers to study classes. The exams are tough but help to achieve the semester in an easy way. The university faculty is very calm-minded. I easily passed the all semesters.
detailed_review.Other: I passed science with 92%.

reviews.course: M.A. in English
reviews.review_title: Dr. M.G.R. Education and Research Institute in M.A. English course admission query.

detailed_review.Placements: In this course, very good placement facilities are available. There are many IT companies involved every year. Companies are providing 3 LPA to 8 LPA, the highest package of this college. Company conditions require communication and coding skills to be important.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In this course, infrastructure and facilities are very good. They use high-quality infrastructure and materials. This college provides facilities like classrooms, bathrooms, labs, fast Wi-Fi, AC, etc. Facilities are available. In this college, canteen food is very tasty and hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: This course curriculum is relevant and good. In this course, teachers are very knowledgeable. Best quality of teaching is provided. In this course, total 2 years course duration. This course is very difficult to clear because 45% marks are required to pass the exam.

reviews.course: B.A. LL.B. (Hons.)
reviews.review_title: A great level of satisfaction with the university’s infrastructure, faculty, & facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: About 60% of students got placed by the college. The placement packages ranged from up to 2 LPA to 12 LPA. Companies like Infosys, Tech Mahindra, Tata, Amazon, Meesho, Flipkart, and Google came here. Students in the college also got chances to do internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The M. G. R. Institute and Technological Research University had a huge infrastructure with top-quality facilities. The hostel facility in the college was also excellent, as expected.
detailed_review.Faculty: Absolutely. Teachers in the college were very helpful, well-trained, highly qualified, and gave career guidance to students. The semester exams were of an average level and easy to pass. Supportive faculty members helped us very much.
detailed_review.Other: I selected LLB (Hons.) because I wanted to become a lawyer in the future. My arguing skills were very good to win a case, so I wanted to become a lawyer. M. G. R. University did not need any improvement, but if needed, it could be done in the future. This university had events, fests, placement drives, and a good environment. Scholarships for students from poor backgrounds. It was a very good college, just as I had thought before admission.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: It is the best college for my experience.

detailed_review.Placements: They offer various types of internships, including many good internships that offer a very good stipend. Major students get placed in the top teaching companies here, the placement policy is very good and designed such that major students get placed. Around 50% of the students got placed in the course. The highest package was 17 lacs, and the lowest was around 3 lacs. The companies that visit the campus are Delloite, Wipro, TCS, Adani etc. The college offered good placement opportunities for students interested in getting employed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It's a good 3-year course, but most of the time has been spent on COVID, so I spent 2 years in online classes. In online structure was good and I like it. They also did the practice and project in a good way. I love my course. Food was good, no doubt, and even the rooms are fully furnished. It was three sharing and too spacious. We always submitted the feedback on the mess, and they always try to improve their menu. The most noticeable thing is that they provide North Indian food for North Indians.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is highly qualified, chosen through a rigorous selection process by MGREEE (MGR Engineering Entrance Examination). This committee evaluates faculty members' qualifications, requires them to pass an exam to become educators, and conducts personal interviews before finalizing appointments. As a result, the teaching standards are very high. The MCA course covers a range of subjects related to Computer Science and Applications, including Operating Systems, Networking, DBMS, C, C++, Java, and several management-related topics.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)
reviews.review_title: The college tour of MGR University.

detailed_review.Placements: In my college placements are so worst. They say they will provide placements in big companies but they end up offering placements in random unknown companies that are not relevant to our studies and offer low packages like Rs. 10,000 to 12,000 per month. The placement percentage of students is 20 percent.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My college's infrastructure is very good. They clean the building every week and every classroom has Wi Fi facility. The lab is super good with air conditioning and classrooms are spacious and very clean. The library has a lots of collection of books and comfortable chairs for reading. Our college canteen is also super good with a lots of variety of food that is super tasty and yummy.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college faculty members are very good. They are very knowledgeable and provide to us. They are super friendly and don't seem like teachers they feel like our friends. This course is making students industry-ready. The semester exams in college are quite difficult, but the faculty members makes it easier to study. The minimum passing mark is 35.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to pursue my career in the computer sector. The course is super good, and I don't want to change it, it's totally fine. But, in my college, events, fests, and cultural activities happen less. My college also offers sports scholarships.

faqs.question: What is the last date for Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute admission?
faqs.answer: Dr. M.G.R. Educational and Research Institute admissions are open online for various courses. Till now, no schedule has been released by the university. faqs.question: Can I join Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute directly?
faqs.answer: That depends on what you mean by "Directly" I suppose that you mean without JEE/ NEET, and if thats so, then yes you surely can based upon your 12th percentage. But its highly recommendable that you appear for JEE/NEET as it opens doors for other Nationally Recognized colleges like NITs and GFTIs and if you have already given and not getting any college than yes you can surely gain an admission by 12th percentage basis  in this college.

faqs.question: Is admission open for LLB (Hons) at Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute?
faqs.answer: Yes, LLB (Hons) admissions is open and interested candidate need to apply at the official website. Aspirants who are looking for LLB (Hons) need to complete Class 12 and selection process is MGR Engineering Entrance Examination (MGREEE) + Counselling.

faqs.question: What is the entrance exam for M.Tech at Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute?
faqs.answer: The entrance exam for M.Tech course at Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute is All India Common Entrance Examination, MGR Engineering Entrance Examination (MGREEE) . Apart from this, aspirants should complete Class 12 years of formal education at school and Bachelor's Degree of at least three years duration.

ranking_section.description: Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute has been ranked well by the NIRF under the 'Overall' category. Through the years, the NIRF rankings for Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute indicate the institute's strong performance in crucial areas such as the Quality of Education, Conducting Impactful Research, the Expertise of Faculty members, and Overall Institutional Management. These good rankings not only prove the institute's positive reputation but also highlight its excellence across di Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute has been ranked well by the NIRF under the 'Overall' category. Through the years, the NIRF rankings for Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute indicate the institute's strong performance in crucial areas such as the Quality of Education, Conducting Impactful Research, the Expertise of Faculty members, and Overall Institutional Management. These good rankings not only prove the institute's positive reputation but also highlight its excellence across diverse domains, evaluated against the standards established by the NIRF. When evaluated against the ranking of the past years, it has been noticed that in the 'Overall' category, the institute's ranks have shown stability in trend. In 2025, Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute's rank is #151 , the same as last year's rank in the 'Overall' category by the NIRF ranking. It has been seen that within the category of 'University' , the institute's ranking has fluctuation when compared with the previous year's ranking. In 2025, Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute's rank is #101 , the same as last year's rank in the 'University' category by the NIRF ranking. The institute has displayed an increasing trend in the 'Engineering' category when compared with the ranking of preceding years. In 2025, Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute climbed 50 ranks to #151 rank in the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF ranking. In the 'Architecture and Planning' category, the institute's ranks have shown a fluctuation when compared with the previous year's ranking. In 2025, Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute fell 10 ranks to #32 rank in the 'Architecture and Planning' category by the NIRF ranking. Explore the most recent rankings from other ranking bodies and their respective categories below. Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute secured #151-200 rank in the 'Overall' category of NIRF 2025 rankings. Its status is comparable to top institutions such as Ashoka University Sonipat and Avinashilingam. sections.heading: Introduction
text: Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute has a state-of-the-art infrastructure. Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute has a big cafeteria, labs, hostel, and others. Dr MGR Educational and Research Institute offers a big library, conference halls, and provides various facilities to students.
For more information check out the below video:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: Library includes facilities which includes E-Library with a collection of more than 1,51,577  books, thousands of journals both national and international and eBooks, weekly and monthly magazines, daily newspapers in English, Tamil and Hindi. Library Automation and Digital Library software are also available. The Library is equipped with latest state of "3M" SECURITY systems. E-Library is available 24hrs a day and 7days a week.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: Hostel facilities can accommodate more then 1500 students both male and female. Separate hostel for boys and girls with all modern facilities. Hostels are located in serene atmosphere and with greenery surroundings at Ambattur Main Road easily accessible to the Metropolitan Transport Services. Facilities include study room, uninterrupted power supply and separate generator for students. Movies are screened in the Entertainment Theatres for students on Holidays. Separate Hostel Committee to look into the grievances of the students.

paragraphs: Dr. MGR Educational and Research Institute offers scholarships to students as financial assistance. Dr. MGR Educational and Research Institute offers Central Sector Scheme Scholarship for College and University Students 2009-10. This scholarship scheme is being implemented by the MHRD, Government of India. This scholarship is for economically weaker students from SC, ST, and General communities. The scholarship also includes physically handicapped students. This scholarship is awarded on the basis of the results of the Senior Secondary Examination.
